original: Aśvaghoṣa: Buddhacarita

analyzed: tasmāt pramāṇam na vayaḥ na vaṃśaḥ kaścid kvacid śraiṣṭhyam upaiti loke

analyzed: rājñām ṛṣīṇām ca hi tāni tāni kṛtāni putraiḥ akṛtāni pūrvaiḥ

original: evaṃ nṛpaḥ pratyayitairdvijaistairāśvāsitaścāpyabhinanditaśca /
analyzed: evam nṛpaḥ pratyayitaiḥ dvijaiḥ taiḥ āśvāsitaḥ ca api abhinanditaḥ ca

original: prītaśca tebhyo dvijasattamebhyaḥ satkārapūrva pradadau dhanāni /
analyzed: prītaḥ ca tebhyaḥ dvijasattamebhyaḥ satkāra pūrva pradadau dhanāni

original: bhūyādayaṃ bhūmipatiryathokto yāyājjarāmetya vanāni ceti // Bc_1.48 //
analyzed: bhūyāt ayam bhūmipatiḥ yathā uktaḥ yāyāt jarām etya vanāni ca iti

analyzed: atho nimittaiḥ ca tapaḥ balāt ca tat janma janma anta karasya buddhvā

original: śākyeśvarasyālayamājagāma saddharmatarṣādasito maharṣiḥ // Bc_1.49 //
analyzed: śākya īśvarasya ālayam ājagāma saddharma tarṣāt asitaḥ mahā ṛṣiḥ

analyzed: tam brahma vid brahma vidam jvalantam brāhmyā śriyā ca eva tapaḥ śriyā ca

original: rājño gururgauravasatkriyābhyāṃ praveśāyāmāsa narendrasadma // Bc_1.50 //
analyzed: rājñaḥ guruḥ gaurava satkriyābhyām praveśāyāmāsa narendra sadma

original: sa pārthivāntaḥpurasaṃnikarṣa kumārajanmāgataharṣavegaḥ /
analyzed: sa pārthiva antaḥpura saṃnikarṣa kumāra janma āgata harṣa vegaḥ

original: viveśa dhīro vanasaṃjñayeva tapaḥprakarṣācca jarāśrayācca // Bc_1.51 //
analyzed: viveśa dhīraḥ vana saṃjñayā iva tapaḥ prakarṣāt ca jarā āśrayāt ca

original: tato nṛpastaṃ munimāsanasthaṃ pādyārdhyapūrvaṃ pratipūjya samyak /
analyzed: tatas nṛpaḥ tam munim āsana stham pādya ardhya pūrvam pratipūjya samyak

original: nimantrayāmāsa yathopacāraṃ purā vasiṣṭhaṃ sa ivāntidevaḥ // Bc_1.52 //
analyzed: nimantrayāmāsa yathopacāram purā vasiṣṭham saḥ iva antidevaḥ

original: dhanyo 'smyanugrāhyamidaṃ kulaṃ me /
analyzed: dhanyaḥ smi anugrāhyam idam kulam me

original: yanmāṃ didṛkṣurbhagavānupetaḥ /
analyzed: yat mām didṛkṣuḥ bhagavān upetaḥ

original: ājñāpyatāṃ kiṃ karavāṇi saumya śiṣyo 'smi viśrambhitumarhasīti // Bc_1.53 //
analyzed: ājñāpyatām kim karavāṇi saumya śiṣyaḥ smi viśrambhitum arhasi iti

original: evaṃ nṛpeṇopanimantritaḥ sansarveṇa bhāvena muniryathāvat /
analyzed: evam nṛpeṇa upanimantritaḥ san sarveṇa bhāvena muniḥ yathāvat

original: sa vismayotphullaviśāladṛṣṭirgambhīradhīrāṇi vacāṃsyuvāca // Bc_1.54 //
analyzed: sa vismaya utphulla viśāla dṛṣṭiḥ gambhīra dhīrāṇi vacāṃsi uvāca

original: mahātmani tvayyupapannametatpriyātithau tyāgini dharmakāme /
analyzed: mahātmani tvayi upapannam etat priya atithau tyāgini dharma kāme

original: sattvānvayajñānavayo 'nurūpā snigdhā yadevaṃ mayi me matiḥ syāt // Bc_1.55 //
analyzed: sattva anvaya jñāna vayaḥ nurūpā snigdhā yat evam mayi me matiḥ syāt

original: etacca tadyena nṛparṣayaste /
analyzed: etat ca tat yena nṛpa ṛṣayaḥ te

original: dharmeṇa sūkṣmeṇa dhanānyavāpya /
analyzed: dharmeṇa sūkṣmeṇa dhanāni avāpya

analyzed: nityam tyajantaḥ vidhivat babhūvuḥ tapobhiḥ āḍhyāḥ vibhavaiḥ daridrāḥ

analyzed: prayojanam yat tu mama upayāne tat me śṛṇu prītim upehi ca tvam

original: divyā mayādityapathe śrutā vāgbodhāya jātastanayastaveti // Bc_1.57 //
analyzed: divyā mayā āditya pathe śrutā vāc bodhāya jātaḥ tanayaḥ tava iti

analyzed: didṛkṣayā śākya kula dhvajasya śakra dhvajasya iva samucchritasya

analyzed: sa ūrṇa bhruvam vāraṇa vasti kośam sa vismayam rāja sutam dadarśa

analyzed: dhātrī aṅka saṃviṣṭam avekṣya ca enam devī aṅka saṃviṣṭam iva agni sūnum

original: babhūva pakṣmāntavicañcitāśrurniśvasya caiva tridivonmukho 'bhūt // Bc_1.61 //
analyzed: babhūva pakṣma anta vicañcita aśruḥ niśvasya ca eva tridiva unmukhaḥ bhūt

original: dṛṣṭvāsitaṃ tvaśrupariplutākṣaṃ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā asitam tu aśru paripluta akṣam

original: snehāttanūjasya nṛpaścakampe /
analyzed: snehāt tanūjasya nṛpaḥ cakampe

original: sagadgadaṃ bāṣpakaṣāyakaṇṭhaḥ papraccha sa prāñjalirānatāṅgaḥ // Bc_1.62 //
analyzed: sa gadgadam bāṣpa kaṣāya kaṇṭhaḥ papraccha sa prāñjaliḥ ānata aṅgaḥ

original: alpāntaraṃ yasya vapuḥ surebhyo bavhadbhutaṃ yasya ca janma dīptam /
analyzed: alpa antaram yasya vapuḥ surebhyaḥ bavhadbhutam yasya ca janma dīptam

original: yasyottamaṃ bhāvinamāttha cārtha taṃ prekṣya kasmāttava dhīra bāṣpaḥ // Bc_1.63 //
analyzed: yasya uttamam bhāvinam āttha ca artha tam prekṣya kasmāt tava dhīra bāṣpaḥ

original: api sthirāyurbhagavan kumāraḥ kaccinna śokāya mama prasūtaḥ /
analyzed: api sthira āyuḥ bhagavan kumāraḥ kaccit na śokāya mama prasūtaḥ

analyzed: labdhaḥ kathaṃcid salila añjaliḥ me na khalu imam pātum upaiti kālaḥ

original: apyakṣayaṃ me yaśaso nidhānaṃ kacciddhruvo me kulahastasāraḥ /
analyzed: api akṣayam me yaśasaḥ nidhānam kaccit dhruvaḥ me kula hasta sāraḥ

original: api prayāsyāmi sukhaṃ paratra supto 'pi putre 'nimiṣaikacakṣuḥ // Bc_1.65 //
analyzed: api prayāsyāmi sukham paratra suptaḥ u pi putre nimiṣa eka cakṣuḥ

analyzed: kaccit na me jātam aphullam eva kula pravālam pariśoṣa bhāgi

analyzed: kṣipram vibho brūhi na me sti śāntiḥ sneham sute vetsi hi bāndhavānām

original: ityāgatāvegamaniṣṭabuddhyā buddhvā narendraṃ sa munirbabhāṣe /
analyzed: iti āgata āvegam aniṣṭa buddhyā buddhvā narendram sa muniḥ babhāṣe

original: mā bhūnmatiste nṛpa kācidanyā niḥsaṃśayaṃ tadyadavocamasmi // Bc_1.67 //
analyzed: mā bhūt matiḥ te nṛpa kācid anyā niḥsaṃśayam tat yat avocam asmi

original: nāsyānyathātvaṃ prati vikriyā me svāṃ vañcanāṃ tu prati viklavo 'smi /
analyzed: na asya anyathātvam prati vikriyā me svām vañcanām tu prati viklavaḥ smi

original: kālo hi me yātumayaṃ ca jāto jātikṣayasyāsulabhasya boddhā // Bc_1.68 //
analyzed: kālaḥ hi me yātum ayam ca jātaḥ jāti kṣayasya a sulabhasya boddhā

original: vihāya rājyaṃ viṣayeṣvanāsthastīvraiḥ prayatnairadhigamya tattvam /
analyzed: vihāya rājyam viṣayeṣu an āsthaḥ tīvraiḥ prayatnaiḥ adhigamya tattvam

original: jagatyayaṃ mohatamo nihantuṃ jvaliṣyati jñānamayo hi sūryaḥ // Bc_1.69 //
analyzed: jagati ayam moha tamaḥ nihantum jvaliṣyati jñāna mayaḥ hi sūryaḥ

analyzed: duḥkha arṇavāt vyādhi vikīrṇa phenāt jarā taraṅgāt maraṇa ugra vegāt

original: uttārayiṣyatyayamuhyamānamārta jagajjñānamahāplavena // Bc_1.70 //
analyzed: uttārayiṣyati ayam uhyamānam ārta jagat jñāna mahā plavena

original: prajñāmbuvegāṃ sthiraśīlavaprāṃ samādhiśītāṃ vratacakravākām /
analyzed: prajñā ambu vegām sthira śīla vaprām samādhi śītām vrata cakravākām

analyzed: tṛṣṇā arditaḥ pāsyati jīva lokaḥ

analyzed: duḥkha arditebhyaḥ viṣaya āvṛtebhyaḥ saṃsāra kāntāra patha sthitebhyaḥ

analyzed: ākhyāsyati hi eṣa vimokṣa mārga mārga pranaṣṭebhyaḥ iva adhvagebhyaḥ

analyzed: vidahyamānāya janāya loke rāga agninā ayam viṣaya indhanena

original: pralhādamādhāsyati dharmavṛṣṭyā vṛṣṭyā mahāmegha ivātapānte // Bc_1.73 //
analyzed: pralhādam ādhāsyati dharma vṛṣṭyā vṛṣṭyā mahā meghaḥ iva ātapa ante

analyzed: tṛṣṇā argalam moha tamaḥ kapāṭam dvāram prajānām apayāna hetoḥ

analyzed: vipāṭayiṣyati ayam uttamena saddharma tāḍena durāsadena

analyzed: svaiḥ moha pāśaiḥ pariveṣṭitasya duḥkha abhibhūtasya nirāśrayasya

analyzed: lokasya saṃbudhya ca dharmarājaḥ kariṣyate bandhana mokṣam eṣaḥ

analyzed: mohena vā kāma sukhaiḥ madāt vā yaḥ naiṣṭhikam śroṣyati na asya dharmam

original: bhraṣṭasya tasmācca guṇādato me dhyānāni labdhvāpyakṛtārthataiva /
analyzed: bhraṣṭasya tasmāt ca guṇāt atas me dhyānāni labdhvā api akṛtārtha tā eva

analyzed: dharmasya tasya a śravaṇāt aham hi manye vipattim tridive vāsam

analyzed: evaṃvidhaḥ yam tanayaḥ mama iti mene sa hi svām api sāravat tām

original: sabahumatumudīkṣyamāṇarūpaḥ pavanapathena yathāgataṃ jagāma // Bc_1.80 //
analyzed: sa bahu matum udīkṣyamāṇa rūpaḥ pavana pathena yathāgatam jagāma

analyzed: kṛta mitiḥ anujā sutam ca dṛṣṭvā muni vacana śravaṇe ca tad matau ca

original: bahuvidhamanukampayā sa sādhuḥ priyasutavadviniyojayāṃcakāra // Bc_1.81 //
analyzed: bahuvidham anukampayā sa sādhuḥ priya suta vat viniyojayāṃcakāra

original: kulasadṛśamacīrakaradyathāvatpriyatanayastanayasya jātakarma // Bc_1.82 //

analyzed: akuruta japa homa maṅgala ādyāḥ parama bhavāya sutasya devatā ijyāḥ

analyzed: api ca śata sahasra pūrṇa saṃkhyāḥ sthira balavat tanayāḥ sa hema śṛṅgīḥ

analyzed: an upagata jarāḥ payasvinīḥ gāḥ svayam adadāt suta vṛddhaye dvijebhyaḥ

analyzed: bahuvidha viṣayāḥ tatas yata ātmā sva hṛdaya toṣa karīḥ kriyāḥ vidhāya

original: guṇavati niyate śive muhūrte matimakaronmuditaḥ purapraveśe // Bc_1.85 //
analyzed: guṇavati niyate śive muhūrte matim akarot muditaḥ pura praveśe

analyzed: dvirada rada mayīm atho mahārhā sita sitapuṣpa bhṛtām maṇi pradīpām

analyzed: abhajata śivikām śivāya devī tanayavatī praṇipatya devatābhyaḥ

analyzed: puram atha puratas praveśya patnīm sthavira jana anugatām apatya nāthām

original: nṛpatirapi jagāma paurasaṃghairdivamamarairmaghavānivārcyamānaḥ // Bc_1.87 //
analyzed: nṛpatiḥ api jagāma paura saṃghaiḥ divam amaraiḥ maghavān iva arcyamānaḥ

analyzed: bhavanam atha vigāhya śākya rājaḥ bhave iva ṣaṇmukha janmanā pratītaḥ

analyzed: idam idam iti harṣa pūrṇa vaktraḥ bahuvidha puṣṭi yaśaskaram vyadhatta

original: iti narapatiputrajanmavṛddhyā sajanapadaṃ kapilāvhayaṃ puraṃ tat /
analyzed: iti narapati putra janma vṛddhyā sa janapadam kapilāvhayam puram tat

original: dhanadapuramivāpsaro 'vakīrṇa muditamabhūnnalakūbaraprasūtau // Bc_1.89 //
analyzed: dhanada puram iva apsaraḥ muditam abhūt nalakūbara prasūtau

original: iti buddhacarite mahākāvye bhagavatprasūtirnāma prathamaḥ sargaḥ // 1 //
analyzed: iti buddhacarite mahākāvye bhagavatprasūtiḥ nāma prathamaḥ sargaḥ

original: ā janmano janmajarāntakasya tasyātmajasyātmajitaḥ sa rājā /
analyzed: ā janmanaḥ janma jarā antakasya tasya ātmajasya ātmajitaḥ sa rājā

original: ahanyahanyarthagajāśvamitrairvṛddhiṃ yayau sindhurivāmbuvegaiḥ // Bc_2.1 //
analyzed: ahani ahani artha gaja aśva mitraiḥ vṛddhim yayau sindhuḥ iva ambu vegaiḥ

original: dhanasya ratnasya ca tasya tasya kṛtākṛtasyaiva ca kāñcanasya /
analyzed: dhanasya ratnasya ca tasya tasya kṛta akṛtasya eva ca kāñcanasya

original: tadā hi naikānsa nidhīnavāpa manorathasyāpyatibhārabhūtān // Bc_2.2 //
analyzed: tadā hi nā ekān sa nidhīn avāpa manorathasya api atibhāra bhūtān

original: ye padmakalpairapi ca dvipendrairna maṇḍalaṃ śakyamihābhinetum /
analyzed: ye padma kalpaiḥ api ca dvipa indraiḥ na maṇḍalam śakyam iha abhinetum

original: madotkaṭā haimavatā gajāste vināpi yatnādupatasthurenam // Bc_2.3 //
analyzed: mada utkaṭāḥ haimavatāḥ gajāḥ te vinā api yatnāt upatasthuḥ enam

original: nānāṅkacinhairnavahemabhāṇḍairvibhūṣitairlambasaṭaistathānyaiḥ /
analyzed: nānā aṅka cinhaiḥ nava hema bhāṇḍaiḥ vibhūṣitaiḥ lamba saṭaiḥ tathā anyaiḥ

original: saṃcukṣubhe cāsya puraṃ turaṅgairbalena maitryā ca dhanena cāptaiḥ // Bc_2.4 //
analyzed: saṃcukṣubhe ca asya puram turaṅgaiḥ balena maitryā ca dhanena ca āptaiḥ

original: puṣṭāśca tuṣṭāśca tathāsya rājye sādhvyo 'rajaskā guṇavatpayaskāḥ /
analyzed: puṣṭāḥ ca tuṣṭāḥ ca tathā asya rājye sādhvyaḥ rajaskāḥ guṇavat payaskāḥ

original: udagravatsaiḥ sahitā babhūvurbavhyo bahukṣīraduhaśca gāvaḥ // Bc_2.5 //
analyzed: udagra vatsaiḥ sahitāḥ babhūvuḥ bavhyaḥ bahu kṣīra duhaḥ ca gāvaḥ

original: madhyasthatāṃ tasya ripurjagāma madhyasthabhāvaḥ prayayau suhṛttvam /
analyzed: madhyastha tām tasya ripuḥ jagāma madhyastha bhāvaḥ prayayau suhṛd tvam

original: viśeṣato dārḍhyamiyāya mitraṃ dvāvasya pakṣāvaparastu nāsa // Bc_2.6 //
analyzed: viśeṣataḥ dārḍhyam iyāya mitram dvau asya pakṣau aparaḥ tu nā āsa

original: tathāsya mandānilameghaśabdaḥ saudāminīkuṇḍalamaṇḍitābhraḥ /
analyzed: tathā asya manda anila megha śabdaḥ saudāminī kuṇḍala maṇḍita abhraḥ

original: vināśmavarṣāśanipātadoṣaiḥ kāle ca deśe pravavarṣa devaḥ // Bc_2.7 //
analyzed: vinā aśma varṣa aśani pāta doṣaiḥ kāle ca deśe pravavarṣa devaḥ

original: ruroha sasyaṃ phalavadyathartu tadākṛtenāpi kṛṣiśrameṇa /
analyzed: ruroha sasyam phalavat yathartu tadā akṛtena api kṛṣi śrameṇa

original: tā eva cāsyauṣadhayo rasena sāreṇa caivābhyadhikā babhūvuḥ // Bc_2.8 //
analyzed: tāḥ eva ca asya oṣadhayaḥ rasena sāreṇa ca eva abhyadhikāḥ babhūvuḥ

original: śarīrasaṃdehakare 'pi kāle saṃgrāmasaṃmarda iva pravṛte /
analyzed: śarīra saṃdeha kare pi kāle saṃgrāma saṃmarde iva pravṛte

original: svasthāḥ sukhaṃ caiva nirāmayaṃ ca prajajñire kālavaśena nāryaḥ // Bc_2.9 //
analyzed: svasthāḥ sukham ca eva nirāmayam ca prajajñire kāla vaśena nāryaḥ

original: pṛthagvratibhyo vibhave 'pi garhye na prārthayanti sma narāḥ parebhyaḥ /
analyzed: pṛthak vratibhyaḥ vibhave pi garhye na prārthayanti sma narāḥ parebhyaḥ

original: abhyarthitaḥ sūkṣmadhano 'pi cāryastadā na kaścidvimukho babhūva // Bc_2.10 //
analyzed: abhyarthitaḥ cāryaḥ tadā na kaścid vimukhaḥ babhūva

original: nāgauravo bandhuṣu nāpyadātā naivāvrato nānṛtiko na hiṃsraḥ /
analyzed: na a gauravaḥ bandhuṣu na api a dātā na eva a vrataḥ na anṛtikaḥ na hiṃsraḥ

original: āsīttadā kaścana tasya rājye rājño yayāteriva nāhuṣasya // Bc_2.11 //
analyzed: āsīt tadā kaścana tasya rājye rājñaḥ yayāteḥ iva nāhuṣasya

original: udyānadevāyatanāśramāṇāṃ kūpaprapāpuṣkariṇīvanānām /
analyzed: udyāna devāyatana āśramāṇām kūpa prapā puṣkariṇī vanānām

original: cakruḥ kriyāstatra ca dharmakāmāḥ pratyakṣataḥ svargīmavopalabhya // Bc_2.12 //
analyzed: cakruḥ kriyāḥ tatra ca dharma kāmāḥ pratyakṣataḥ

original: muktaśca durbhikṣabhayāmayebhyo hṛṣṭo janaḥ svarga ivābhireme /
analyzed: muktaḥ ca durbhikṣa bhaya āmayebhyaḥ hṛṣṭaḥ janaḥ svarge iva abhireme

original: patnīṃ patirvā mahiṣī patiṃ vā parasparaṃ na vyabhiceratuśca // Bc_2.13 //
analyzed: patnīm patiḥ vā mahiṣī patim vā parasparam na vyabhiceratuḥ ca

original: kaścitsiṣeve rataye na kāmaṃ kāmārthamarthaṃ na jugopa kaścit /
analyzed: kaścid siṣeve rataye na kāmam kāma artham artham na jugopa kaścid

original: kaściddhanārthaṃ na cacāra dharma dharmāya kaścinna cakāra hiṃsām // Bc_2.14 //
analyzed: kaścid dhana artham na cacāra dharma dharmāya kaścid na cakāra hiṃsām

original: steyādibhiścāpyaribhiśca naṣṭaṃ svasthaṃ svacakraṃ paracakramuktam /
analyzed: steya ādibhiḥ ca api aribhiḥ ca naṣṭam svastham sva cakram para cakra muktam

original: kṣemaṃ subhikṣaṃ ca babhūva tasya purānaraṇyasya yathaiva rāṣṭre // Bc_2.15 //
analyzed: kṣemam subhikṣam ca babhūva tasya purā an araṇyasya yathā eva rāṣṭre

original: tadā hi tajjanmani tasya rājño manorivādityasutasya rājye /
analyzed: tadā hi tad janmani tasya rājñaḥ manoḥ iva āditya sutasya rājye

original: cacāra harṣaḥ praṇanāśa pāpmā jajvāla dharmaḥ kaluṣaḥ śaśāma // Bc_2.16 //
analyzed: cacāra harṣaḥ praṇanāśa pāpmā jajvāla dharmaḥ kaluṣaḥ śaśāma

original: evaṃvidhā rājakulasya saṃpatsarvārthasiddhiśca yato babhūva /
analyzed: evaṃvidhā rāja kulasya saṃpad sarva artha siddhiḥ ca yatas babhūva

original: tato nṛpastasya sutasya nāma sarvārthasiddhi 'yamiti pracakre // Bc_2.17 //
analyzed: tatas nṛpaḥ tasya sutasya nāma yam iti pracakre

original: devī tu māyā vibudharṣikalpaṃ dṛṣṭvā viśālaṃ tanayaprabhāvam /
analyzed: devī tu māyā vibudha ṛṣi kalpam dṛṣṭvā viśālam tanaya prabhāvam

original: jātaṃ praharṣa na śaśāka soḍhuṃ tato nivāsāya divaṃ jagāma // Bc_2.18 //
analyzed: jātam praharṣa na śaśāka soḍhum tatas nivāsāya divam jagāma

original: tataḥ kumāraṃ suragarbhakalpaṃ snehena bhāvena ca nirviśeṣam /
analyzed: tatas kumāram sura garbha kalpam snehena bhāvena ca nirviśeṣam

original: mātṛṣvasā mātṛsamaprabhāvā saṃvardhayāmātmajavadbabhūva // Bc_2.19 //
analyzed: mātṛṣvasā mātṛ sama prabhāvā saṃvardhayāma ātmaja vat babhūva

original: tataḥ sa bālārka ivodayasthaḥ samīrito vanhirivānilena /
analyzed: tatas sa bāla arkaḥ iva udaya sthaḥ samīritaḥ vanhiḥ iva anilena

original: krameṇa samyagvavṛdhe kumārastārādhipaḥ pakṣa ivātamaske // Bc_2.20 //
analyzed: krameṇa samyak vavṛdhe kumāraḥ tārādhipaḥ pakṣe iva atamaske

original: tato mahārhāṇi ca candanāni ratnāvalīścauṣadhibhiḥ sagarbhāḥ /
analyzed: tatas mahārhāṇi ca candanāni ratna āvalīḥ ca oṣadhibhiḥ sa garbhāḥ

original: mṛgaprayuktān rathakāṃśca haimānācakrire 'smai suhṛdālayebhyaḥ // Bc_2.21 //
analyzed: mṛga prayuktān rathakān ca haimān ācakrire smai suhṛd ālayebhyaḥ

original: vayo 'nurūpāṇi ca bhūṣaṇāni hiraṇmayān hastimṛgāśvakāṃśca /
analyzed: vayaḥ nurūpāṇi ca bhūṣaṇāni hiraṇmayān hasti mṛga aśvakān ca

original: rathāṃśca goputrakasaṃprayuktān putrīśca cāmīkararūpyacitrāḥ // Bc_2.22 //
analyzed: rathān ca goputraka saṃprayuktān putrīḥ ca cāmīkara rūpya citrāḥ

original: evaṃ sa taistairviṣayopacārairvayo 'nurūpairupacaryamāṇaḥ /
analyzed: evam sa taiḥ taiḥ viṣaya upacāraiḥ vayaḥ nurūpaiḥ upacaryamāṇaḥ

original: bālo 'pyabālapratimo babhūva dhṛtyā ca śaucena dhiyā śriyā ca // Bc_2.23 //
analyzed: bālaḥ u pi abāla pratimaḥ babhūva dhṛtyā ca śaucena dhiyā śriyā ca

original: vayaśca kaumāramatītya samyak saṃprāpya kāle pratipattikarma /
analyzed: vayaḥ ca kaumāram atītya samyak saṃprāpya kāle pratipatti karma

original: alpairahobhirbahuvarṣagāmyā jagrāha vidyāḥ svakulānurūpāḥ // Bc_2.24 //
analyzed: alpaiḥ ahobhiḥ bahu varṣa gāmyāḥ jagrāha vidyāḥ sva kula anurūpāḥ

original: naiḥśreyasaṃ tasya tu bhavyamarthaṃ śrutvā purastādasitānmaharṣeḥ /
analyzed: naiḥśreyasam tasya tu bhavyam artham śrutvā purastāt asitāt mahā ṛṣeḥ

original: kāmeṣu saṅgaṃ janayāṃbabhūva vanāni yāyāditi śākyarājaḥ // Bc_2.25 //
analyzed: kāmeṣu saṅgam janayāṃbabhūva vanāni yāyāt iti śākyarājaḥ

original: kulāttato 'smai sthiraśīlayuktātsādhvīṃ vapurhrīvinayopapannām /
analyzed: kulāt tatas smai sthira śīla yuktāt sādhvīm vapuḥ hrī vinaya upapannām

original: yaśodharāṃ nāma yaśoviśālāṃ vāmābhidhānāṃ śriyamājuhāva // Bc_2.26 //
analyzed: yaśodharām nāma yaśaḥ viśālām vāma abhidhānām śriyam ājuhāva

original: vidyotamāno vapuṣā pareṇa sanatkumārapratimaḥ kumāraḥ /
analyzed: vidyotamānaḥ vapuṣā pareṇa sanatkumāra pratimaḥ kumāraḥ

original: sārdha tayā śākyanarendravadhvā śacyā sahasrākṣa ivābhireme // Bc_2.27 //
analyzed: sārdha tayā śākya narendra vadhvā śacyā sahasrākṣaḥ iva abhireme

original: kiṃcinmanaḥkṣobhakaraṃ pratīpaṃ kathaṃ na paśyediti so 'nucintya /
analyzed: kiṃcid manaḥ kṣobha karam pratīpam katham na paśyet iti saḥ nu cintya

original: vāsaṃ nṛpo vyādiśati sma tasmai harmyodareṣveva na bhūpracāram // Bc_2.28 //
analyzed: vāsam nṛpaḥ vyādiśati sma tasmai harmya udareṣu eva na bhū pracāram

original: tataḥ śarattoyadapāṇḍareṣu bhūmau vimāneṣviva rañjiteṣu /
analyzed: tatas śarad toyada pāṇḍareṣu bhūmau vimāneṣu iva rañjiteṣu

original: harmyeṣu sarvartusukhāśrayeṣu strīṇāmudārairvijahāra tūryaiḥ // Bc_2.29 //
analyzed: harmyeṣu sarva ṛtu sukha āśrayeṣu strīṇām udāraiḥ vijahāra tūryaiḥ

original: kalairhi cāmīkarabaddhakakṣairnārīkarāgrābhihatairmṛdaṅgaiḥ /
analyzed: kalaiḥ hi cāmīkara baddha kakṣaiḥ nārī kara agra abhihataiḥ mṛdaṅgaiḥ

original: varāpsaronṛtyasamaiśca nṛtyaiḥ kailāsavattadbhavanaṃ rarāja // Bc_2.30 //
analyzed: vara apsaraḥ nṛtya samaiḥ ca nṛtyaiḥ kailāsa vat tat bhavanam rarāja

original: vāgbhiḥ kalābhirlīlataiśca hāvairmadaiḥ sakhelairmadhuraiśca hāsaiḥ /
analyzed: vāgbhiḥ kalābhiḥ līlataiḥ ca hāvaiḥ madaiḥ sa khelaiḥ madhuraiḥ ca hāsaiḥ

original: taṃ tatra nāryo ramayāṃbabhūvurbhūvañcitairardhīnarīkṣitaiśca // Bc_2.31 //
analyzed: tam tatra nāryaḥ ramayāṃbabhūvuḥ bhū vañcitaiḥ ardhīnarīkṣitaiḥ ca

original: tataḥ sa kāmāśrayapaṇḍitābhiḥ strībhirgṛhīto ratikarkaśābhiḥ /
analyzed: tatas sa kāma āśraya paṇḍitābhiḥ strībhiḥ gṛhītaḥ rati karkaśābhiḥ

original: vimānapṛṣṭhānna mahīṃ jagāma vimānapṛṣṭhādiva puṇyakarmā // Bc_2.32 //
analyzed: vimāna pṛṣṭhāt na mahīm jagāma vimāna pṛṣṭhāt iva puṇya karmā

original: nṛpastu tasyaiva vivṛddhihetostadbhāvinārthena ca codyamānaḥ /
analyzed: nṛpaḥ tu tasya eva vivṛddhi hetoḥ tad bhāvinā arthena ca codyamānaḥ

original: śame 'bhireme virarāma pāpādbheje damaṃ saṃvibabhāja sādhūn // Bc_2.33 //
analyzed: śame bhireme virarāma pāpāt bheje damam saṃvibabhāja sādhūn

original: nādhīravatkāmasukhe sasañje na saṃrarañje viṣamaṃ jananyām /
analyzed: na adhīra vat kāma sukhe sasañje na saṃrarañje viṣamam jananyām

original: dhṛtyendriyāśvāṃścapalānvijigye bandhūṃśca paurāṃśca guṇairjigāya // Bc_2.34 //
analyzed: dhṛtya indriya aśvān capalān vijigye bandhūn ca paurān ca guṇaiḥ jigāya

original: nādhyaiṣṭa duḥkhāya parasya vidyāṃ jñānaṃ śivaṃ yattu tadadhyagīṣṭa /
analyzed: na adhyaiṣṭa duḥkhāya parasya vidyām jñānam śivam yat tu tat adhyagīṣṭa

original: svābhyaḥ prajābhyo hi yathā tathaiva sarvaprajābhyaḥ śivamāśaśaṃse // Bc_2.35 //
analyzed: svābhyaḥ prajābhyaḥ hi yathā tathā eva sarva prajābhyaḥ śivam āśaśaṃse

original: bhaṃ bhāsuraṃ cāṅgirasādhidevaṃ yathāvadānarca tadāyuṣe saḥ /
analyzed: bham bhāsuram ca aṅgirasa adhidevam yathāvat ānarca tad āyuṣe saḥ

original: juhāva havyānyakṛśe kṛśānau dadau dvijebhyaḥ kṛśanaṃ ca gāśca // Bc_2.36 //
analyzed: juhāva havyāni akṛśe kṛśānau dadau dvijebhyaḥ kṛśanam ca gāḥ ca

original: sasnau śarīraṃ pavituṃ manaśca tīrthāmbubhiścaiva guṇāmbubhiśca /
analyzed: sasnau śarīram pavitum manaḥ ca tīrtha ambubhiḥ ca eva guṇa ambubhiḥ ca

original: vedopadiṣṭaṃ samamātmajaṃ ca somaṃ papau śāntisukhaṃ ca hārdam // Bc_2.37 //
analyzed: veda upadiṣṭam samam ātmajam ca somam papau śānti sukham ca hārdam

original: sāntvaṃ babhāṣe na ca nārthavadyajjajalpa tattvaṃ na ca vipriyaṃ yat /
analyzed: sāntvam babhāṣe na ca na arthavat yat jajalpa tattvam na ca vipriyam yat

original: sāntvaṃ hyatattvaṃ paruṣaṃ ca tattvaṃ hriyāśakannātmana eva vaktum // Bc_2.38 //
analyzed: sāntvam hi atattvam paruṣam ca tattvam hriyā aśakan ātmanaḥ eva vaktum

original: iṣṭeṣvaniṣṭeṣu ca kāryavatsu na rāgadoṣāśrayatāṃ prapede /
analyzed: iṣṭeṣu aniṣṭeṣu ca kāryavatsu na rāga doṣa āśraya tām prapede

original: śivaṃ siṣeve vyavahāraśuddhaṃ yajñaṃ hi mene na tathā yathā tat // Bc_2.39 //
analyzed: śivam siṣeve vyavahāra śuddham yajñam hi mene na tathā yathā tat

original: āśāvate cāhigatāya sadyo deyāmbubhistarṣamacecchidiṣṭa /
analyzed: āśāvate ca ahi gatāya sadyas deya ambubhiḥ tarṣam acecchidiṣṭa

original: yuddhādṛte vṛttaparaśvadhena dviḍdarpamudvṛttamabebhidiṣṭa // Bc_2.40 //
analyzed: yuddhāt ṛte vṛtta paraśvadhena dviṣ darpam udvṛttam abebhidiṣṭa

original: ekaṃ vininye sa jugopa sapta saptaiva tatyāja rarakṣa pañca /
analyzed: ekam vininye sa jugopa sapta sapta eva tatyāja rarakṣa pañca

original: prāpa trivarga bubudhe trivarga jajñe dvivarga prajahau dvivargam // Bc_2.41 //
analyzed: prāpa trivarga bubudhe trivarga jajñe dvivarga prajahau dvivargam

original: kṛtāgaso 'pi pratipādya vadhyānnājīghanannāpi ruṣā dadarśa /
analyzed: kṛta āgasaḥ pi pratipādya vadhyān na ajīghanat na api ruṣā dadarśa

original: babandha sāntvena phalena caitāṃstyāgo 'pi teṣāṃ hyanayāya dṛṣṭaḥ // Bc_2.42 //
analyzed: babandha sāntvena phalena ca etān teṣām hi anayāya dṛṣṭaḥ

original: ārṣāṇyacārītparamavratāni vairāṇyahāsīccirasaṃbhṛtāni /
analyzed: ārṣāṇi acārīt parama vratāni vairāṇi ahāsīt cira saṃbhṛtāni

original: yaśāṃsi cāpadguṇagandhavanti rajāṃsyahārṣīnmalinīkarāṇi // Bc_2.43 //
analyzed: yaśāṃsi ca āpad guṇa gandhavanti rajāṃsi ahārṣīt malinīkarāṇi

original: na cājihīrṣidvalimapravṛttaṃ na cācikīrṣitparavastvabhidhyām /
analyzed: na ca ajihīrṣit valim apravṛttam na ca acikīrṣit para vastu abhidhyām

original: na cāvivakṣīd dviṣatāmadharma na cāvivākṣīddhṛdayena manyum // Bc_2.44 //
analyzed: na ca avivakṣīt dviṣatām adharma na ca avivākṣīt hṛdayena manyum

original: tasmiṃstathā bhūmipatau pravṛtte bhṛtyāśca paurāśca tathaiva ceruḥ /
analyzed: tasmin tathā bhūmipatau pravṛtte bhṛtyāḥ ca paurāḥ ca tathā eva ceruḥ

original: śamātmake cetasi viprasanne prayuktayogasya yathendriyāṇi // Bc_2.45 //
analyzed: śama ātmake cetasi viprasanne prayukta yogasya yathā indriyāṇi

original: kāle tataścārupayodharāyāṃ yaśodharāyāṃ svayaśodharāyām /
analyzed: kāle tatas cāru payodharāyām yaśodharāyām sva yaśodharāyām

original: śauddhodane rāhusapatnavaktro jajñe suto rāhula eva nāmnā // Bc_2.46 //
analyzed: śauddhodane rāhu sapatna vaktraḥ jajñe sutaḥ rāhulaḥ eva nāmnā

original: atheṣṭaputraḥ paramapratītaḥ kulasya vṛddhiṃ prati bhūmipālaḥ /
analyzed: atha iṣṭa putraḥ parama pratītaḥ kulasya vṛddhim prati bhūmipālaḥ

original: yathaiva putraprasave nananda tathaiva pautraprasave nananda // Bc_2.47 //
analyzed: yathā eva putra prasave nananda tathā eva pautra prasave nananda

original: putrasya me putragato mameva snehaḥ kathaṃ syāditi jātaharṣaḥ /
analyzed: putrasya me putra gataḥ mama iva snehaḥ katham syāt iti jāta harṣaḥ

original: kāle sa taṃ taṃ vidhimālalambe putrapriyaḥ svargamivārurukṣan // Bc_2.48 //
analyzed: kāle sa tam tam vidhim ālalambe putra priyaḥ svargam iva ārurukṣan

original: sthitvā pathi prāthamakalpikānāṃ rājavarṣabhāṇāṃ yaśasānvitānām /
analyzed: sthitvā pathi prāthamakalpikānām rājava ṛṣabhāṇām yaśasā anvitānām

original: śuklānyamuktvāpi tapāṃsyatapta yajñaiśca hiṃsārahitairayaṣṭa // Bc_2.49 //
analyzed: śuklāni a muktvā api tapāṃsi atapta yajñaiḥ ca hiṃsā rahitaiḥ ayaṣṭa

original: ajājvaliṣṭātha sa puṇyakarmā nṛpaśriyā caiva tapaḥśriyā ca /
analyzed: ajājvaliṣṭā atha sa puṇya karmā nṛpa śriyā ca eva tapaḥ śriyā ca

original: kulena vṛttena dhiyā ca dīptastejaḥ sahasrāṃśurivotsisṛkṣuḥ // Bc_2.50 //
analyzed: kulena vṛttena dhiyā ca dīptaḥ tejaḥ sahasrāṃśuḥ iva utsisṛkṣuḥ

original: svāyaṃbhuvaṃ cārcikamarcayitvā jajāpa putrasthitaye sthitaśrīḥ /
analyzed: svāyaṃbhuvam ca ārcikam arcayitvā jajāpa putra sthitaye sthita śrīḥ

original: cakāra karmāṇi ca duṣkarāṇi prajāḥ sisṛkṣuḥ ka ivādikāle // Bc_2.51 //
analyzed: cakāra karmāṇi ca duṣkarāṇi prajāḥ sisṛkṣuḥ kaḥ iva ādi kāle

original: tatyāja śastraṃ vimamarśa śāstraṃ śamaṃ siṣeve niyamaṃ viṣehe /
analyzed: tatyāja śastram vimamarśa śāstram śamam siṣeve niyamam viṣehe

original: vaśīva kaṃcidviṣayaṃ na bheje piteva sarvānviṣayāndadarśa // Bc_2.52 //
analyzed: vaśī iva kaṃcid viṣayam na bheje pitā iva sarvān viṣayān dadarśa

original: babhāra rājyaṃ sa hi putrahetoḥ putraṃ kulārthaṃ yaśase kulaṃ tu /
analyzed: babhāra rājyam sa hi putra hetoḥ putram kula artham yaśase kulam tu

original: svargāya śabdaṃ divamātmahetordharmārthamātmasthitimācakāṅkṣa // Bc_2.53 //
analyzed: svargāya śabdam divam ātma hetoḥ dharma artham ātma sthitim ācakāṅkṣa

original: evaṃ sa dharma vividhaṃ cakāra sidbhirnipātaṃ śrutitaśca siddham /
analyzed: evam sa dharma vividham cakāra sidbhiḥ nipātam śrutitaḥ ca siddham

original: dṛṣṭvā kathaṃ putramukhaṃ suto me vanaṃ na yāyāditi nāthamānaḥ // Bc_2.54 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā katham putra mukham sutaḥ me vanam na yāyāt iti nāthamānaḥ

original: rirakṣiṣantaḥ śriyamātmasaṃsthāṃ rakṣanti putrān bhuvi bhūmipālāḥ /
analyzed: rirakṣiṣantaḥ śriyam ātma saṃsthām rakṣanti putrān bhuvi bhūmipālāḥ

original: putraṃ narendraḥ sa tu dharmakāmo rarakṣa dharmādviṣayeṣu muñcan // Bc_2.55 //
analyzed: putram narendraḥ sa tu dharma kāmaḥ rarakṣa dharmāt viṣayeṣu muñcan

original: vanamanupamasattvā bodhisattvāstu sarve viṣayasukharasajñā jagmurutpannaputrāḥ /
analyzed: vanam anupama sattvāḥ bodhisattvāḥ tu sarve viṣaya sukha rasa jñāḥ jagmuḥ utpanna putrāḥ

original: ata upacitakarmā rūḍhamūle 'pi hetau sa ratimupasiṣeve bodhimāpanna yāvat // Bc_2.56 //
analyzed: atas upacita karmā rūḍha mūle pi hetau sa ratim upasiṣeve bodhim āpanna yāvat

original: iti buddhacarite mahākāvye antaḥpuravihāro nāma dvitīyaḥ sargaḥ // 2 //
analyzed: iti buddhacarite mahākāvye antaḥpuravihāraḥ nāma dvitīyaḥ sargaḥ

original: tataḥ kadācinmṛduśādvalāni puṃskokilonnāditapādapāni /
analyzed: tatas kadācid mṛdu śādvalāni puṃskokila unnādita pādapāni

original: śuśrāva padmākaramaṇḍitāni gītairnibaddhāni sa kānanāni // Bc_3.1 //
analyzed: śuśrāva padma ākara maṇḍitāni gītaiḥ nibaddhāni sa kānanāni

original: śrutvā tataḥ strījanavallabhānāṃ manojñabhāvaṃ purakānanānām /
analyzed: śrutvā tatas strī jana vallabhānām manojña bhāvam pura kānanānām

original: bahiḥprayāṇāya cakāra buddhimantargṛhe nāga ivāvarūddhaḥ // Bc_3.2 //
analyzed: bahis prayāṇāya cakāra buddhim antargṛhe nāgaḥ iva avarūddhaḥ

original: tato nṛpastasya niśamya bhāvaṃ putrābhidhānasya manorathasya /
analyzed: tatas nṛpaḥ tasya niśamya bhāvam putra abhidhānasya manorathasya

original: snehasya lakṣmyā vayasaśca yogyāmājñāpayāmāsa vihārayātrām // Bc_3.3 //
analyzed: snehasya lakṣmyāḥ vayasaḥ ca yogyām ājñāpayāmāsa vihāra yātrām

original: nivartayāmāsa ca rājamārge saṃpātamārtasya pṛthagjanasya /
analyzed: nivartayāmāsa ca rājamārge saṃpātam ārtasya pṛthagjanasya

original: mā bhūtkumāraḥ sukumāracittaḥ saṃvignacetā iti manyamānaḥ // Bc_3.4 //
analyzed: mā bhūt kumāraḥ su kumāra cittaḥ saṃvigna cetāḥ iti manyamānaḥ

original: pratyaṅgahīnānvikalendriyāṃśca jīrṇāturādīn kṛpaṇāṃśca dikṣu /
analyzed: pratyaṅga hīnān vikala indriyān ca jīrṇa ātura ādīn kṛpaṇān ca dikṣu

original: tataḥ samutsārya pareṇa sāmnā śobhāṃ parāṃ rājapathasya cakuḥ // Bc_3.5 //
analyzed: tatas samutsārya pareṇa sāmnā śobhām parām rāja pathasya cakuḥ

original: tataḥ kṛte śrīmati rājamārge śrīmānvinītānucaraḥ kumāraḥ /
analyzed: tatas kṛte śrīmati rājamārge śrīmān vinīta anucaraḥ kumāraḥ

original: prāsādapṛṣṭhādavatīrya kāle kṛtābhyanujño nṛpamabhyagacchat // Bc_3.6 //
analyzed: prāsāda pṛṣṭhāt avatīrya kāle kṛta abhyanujñaḥ nṛpam abhyagacchat

original: atho narendraḥ sutamāgatāśruḥ śirasyupāghrāya ciraṃ nirīkṣya /
analyzed: atho narendraḥ sutam āgata aśruḥ śirasi upāghrāya ciram nirīkṣya

original: gaccheti cājñāpayati sma vācā snehānna cainaṃ manasā mumoca // Bc_3.7 //
analyzed: gaccha iti ca ājñāpayati sma vācā snehāt na ca enam manasā mumoca

original: tataḥ sa jāmbūnadabhāṇḍabhṛdbhiryuktaṃ caturbhirnibhṛtaisturaṅgaiḥ /
analyzed: tatas sa jāmbūnada bhāṇḍa bhṛdbhiḥ yuktam caturbhiḥ nibhṛtaiḥ turaṅgaiḥ

original: aklībavidvacchuciraśmidhāraṃ hiraṇmayaṃ syandanamāruroha // Bc_3.8 //
analyzed: aklība vidvat śuci raśmi dhāram hiraṇmayam syandanam āruroha

original: tataḥ prakīrṇojjvalapuṣpajālaṃ viṣaktamālyaṃ pracalatpatākam /
analyzed: tatas prakīrṇa ujjvala puṣpa jālam viṣakta mālyam pracalat patākam

original: mārgaṃ prapede sadṛśānuyātraścandraḥ sanakṣatra ivāntarīkṣam // Bc_3.9 //
analyzed: mārgam prapede sadṛśa anuyātraḥ candraḥ sa nakṣatraḥ iva antarīkṣam

original: kautūhalātsphītataraiśca netrairnīlotpalārdhairiva kīryamāṇam /
analyzed: kautūhalāt sphītataraiḥ ca netraiḥ nīlotpala ardhaiḥ iva kīryamāṇam

original: śanaiḥ śanai rājapathaṃ jagāhe pauraiḥ samantādabhivīkṣyamāṇaḥ // Bc_3.10 //
analyzed: śanais śanais rāja patham jagāhe pauraiḥ samantāt abhivīkṣyamāṇaḥ

original: taṃ tuṣṭuvuḥ saumyaguṇena kecidvavandire dīptatayā tathānye /
analyzed: tam tuṣṭuvuḥ saumya guṇena kecid vavandire dīpta tayā tathā anye

original: saumukhyatastu śriyamasya kecidvaipulyamāśaṃsiṣurāyuṣaśca // Bc_3.11 //
analyzed: saumukhyataḥ tu śriyam asya kecid vaipulyam āśaṃsiṣuḥ āyuṣaḥ ca

original: niḥsṛtya kubjāśca mahākulebhyo vyūhāśca kairātakavāmanānām /
analyzed: niḥsṛtya kubjāḥ ca mahā kulebhyaḥ vyūhāḥ ca kairātaka vāmanānām

original: nāryaḥ kṛśebhyaśca niveśanebhyo devānuyānadhvajavatpraṇemuḥ // Bc_3.12 //
analyzed: nāryaḥ kṛśebhyaḥ ca niveśanebhyaḥ deva anuyāna dhvaja vat praṇemuḥ

original: tataḥ kumāraḥ khalu gacchatīti śrutvā striyaḥ preṣyajanātpravṛttim /
analyzed: tatas kumāraḥ khalu gacchati iti śrutvā striyaḥ preṣya janāt pravṛttim

original: didṛkṣayā harmyatalāni jagmurjanena mānyena kṛtābhyanujñāḥ // Bc_3.13 //
analyzed: didṛkṣayā harmya talāni jagmuḥ janena mānyena kṛta abhyanujñāḥ

original: tāḥ srastakāñcīguṇavighnitāśca suptaprabuddhākulalocanāśca /
analyzed: tāḥ srasta kāñcī guṇa vighnitāḥ ca supta prabuddha ākula locanāḥ ca

original: vṛttāntavinyastavibhūṣaṇāśca kautūhalenānibhṛtāḥ parīyuḥ // Bc_3.14 //
analyzed: vṛttānta vinyasta vibhūṣaṇāḥ ca kautūhalena a nibhṛtāḥ parīyuḥ

original: prāsādasopānatalapraṇādaiḥ kāñcīravairnūpuranisvanaiśca /
analyzed: prāsāda sopāna tala praṇādaiḥ kāñcī ravaiḥ nūpura nisvanaiḥ ca

original: vitrāsayantyo gṛhapakṣisaṅghānanyonyavegāṃśca samākṣipantyaḥ // Bc_3.15 //
analyzed: vitrāsayantyaḥ gṛha pakṣi saṅghān anyonya vegān ca samākṣipantyaḥ

original: kāsāṃcidāsāṃ tu varāṅganānāṃ jātatvarāṇāmapi sotsukānām /
analyzed: kāsāṃcid āsām tu vara aṅganānām jāta tvarāṇām api sa utsukānām

original: gatiṃ gurutvājjagṛhurviśālāḥ śroṇīrathāḥ pīnapayodharāśca // Bc_3.16 //
analyzed: gatim guru tvāt jagṛhuḥ viśālāḥ śroṇī rathāḥ pīna payodharāḥ ca

original: śīghraṃ samarthāpi tu gantumanyā gatiṃ nijagrāha yayau na tūrṇam /
analyzed: śīghram samarthā api tu gantum anyā gatim nijagrāha yayau na tūrṇam

original: hriyāpragalbhā vinigūhamānā rahaḥprayuktāni vibhūṣaṇāni // Bc_3.17 //
analyzed: hriyā a pragalbhāḥ vinigūhamānāḥ rahaḥ prayuktāni vibhūṣaṇāni

original: parasparotpīḍanapiṇḍitānāṃ saṃmardasaṃkṣobhikuṇḍalānām /
analyzed: paraspara utpīḍana piṇḍitānām saṃmarda saṃkṣobhi kuṇḍalānām

original: tāsāṃ tadā sasvanabhūṣaṇānāṃ vātayaneṣvapraśamo babhūva // Bc_3.18 //
analyzed: tāsām tadā sa svana bhūṣaṇānām vātayaneṣu apraśamaḥ babhūva

original: vātāyanebhyastu viniḥsṛtāni parasparāyāsitakuṇḍalāni /
analyzed: vātāyanebhyaḥ tu viniḥsṛtāni

original: strīṇāṃ virejurmukhapaṅkajāni saktāni harmyeṣviva paṅkajāni // Bc_3.19 //
analyzed: strīṇām virejuḥ mukha paṅkajāni saktāni harmyeṣu iva paṅkajāni

original: tato vimānairyuvatīkarālaiḥ kautūhalodghāṭitavātayānaiḥ /
analyzed: tatas vimānaiḥ yuvatī karālaiḥ kautūhala udghāṭita vāta yānaiḥ

original: śrīmatsamantānnagaraṃ babhāse viyadvimānairiva sāpsarobhiḥ // Bc_3.20 //
analyzed: śrīmat samantāt nagaram babhāse viyat vimānaiḥ iva sa apsarobhiḥ

original: vātāyanānāmaviśālabhāvādanyonyagaṇḍārpitakuṇḍalānām /
analyzed: vātāyanānām aviśāla bhāvāt anyonya gaṇḍa arpita kuṇḍalānām

original: mukhāni rejuḥ pramodottamānāṃ baddhāḥ kalāpā iva paṅkajānām // Bc_3.21 //
analyzed: mukhāni rejuḥ pramoda uttamānām baddhāḥ kalāpāḥ iva paṅkajānām

original: taṃ tāḥ kumāraṃ pathi vīkṣamāṇāḥ striyo babhurgāmiva gantukāmāḥ /
analyzed: tam tāḥ kumāram pathi vīkṣamāṇāḥ striyaḥ babhuḥ gām iva gantu kāmāḥ

original: ūrdhvonmukhāścainamudīkṣamāṇā narā babhurdyāmiva gantukāmāḥ // Bc_3.22 //
analyzed: ūrdhva unmukhāḥ ca enam udīkṣamāṇāḥ narāḥ babhuḥ dyām iva gantu kāmāḥ

original: dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ rājasutaṃ striyastā jājvalyamānaṃ vapuṣā śriyā ca /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca tam rāja sutam striyaḥ tāḥ jājvalyamānam vapuṣā śriyā ca

original: dhanyāsya bhāryeti śanairavocañśuddhairmanobhiḥ khalu nānyabhāvāt // Bc_3.23 //
analyzed: dhanyā asya bhāryā iti śanais avocan śuddhaiḥ manobhiḥ khalu na anya bhāvāt

original: ayaṃ kila vyāyatapīnabāhū rūpeṇa sākṣādiva puṣpaketuḥ /
analyzed: ayam kila vyāyata pīna bāhū rūpeṇa sākṣāt iva puṣpaketuḥ

original: tyaktvā śriyaṃ dharmamupaiṣyatīti tasmin hi tā gauravameva cakruḥ // Bc_3.24 //
analyzed: tyaktvā śriyam dharmam upaiṣyati iti tasmin hi tāḥ gauravam eva cakruḥ

original: kīrṇa tathā rājapathaṃ kumāraḥ paurairvinītaiḥ śucidhīraveṣaiḥ /
analyzed: tathā rāja patham kumāraḥ pauraiḥ vinītaiḥ śuci dhīra veṣaiḥ

original: tatpūrvamālokya jaharṣa kiṃcinmene punarbhāvamivātmanaśca // Bc_3.25 //
analyzed: tat pūrvam ālokya jaharṣa kiṃcid mene punarbhāvam iva ātmanaḥ ca

original: puraṃ tu tatsvargamiva prahṛṣṭaṃ śuddhādhivāsāḥ samavekṣya devāḥ /
analyzed: puram tu tat svargam iva prahṛṣṭam śuddha adhivāsāḥ samavekṣya devāḥ

original: jīrṇaṃ naraṃ nirmamire prayātuṃ saṃcodanārthaṃ kṣitipātmajasya // Bc_3.26 //
analyzed: jīrṇam naram nirmamire prayātum saṃcodana artham kṣitipa ātmajasya

original: tataḥ kumāro jarayābhibhūtaṃ dṛṣṭvā narebhyaḥ pṛthagākṛtiṃ tam /
analyzed: tatas kumāraḥ jarayā abhibhūtam dṛṣṭvā narebhyaḥ pṛthak ākṛtim tam

original: uvāca saṃgrāhakamāgatāsthastatraiva niṣkampaniviṣṭadṛṣṭiḥ // Bc_3.27 //
analyzed: uvāca saṃgrāhakam āgata āsthaḥ tatra eva niṣkampa niviṣṭa dṛṣṭiḥ

original: ka eṣa bhoḥ sūta naro 'bhyupetaḥ keśaiḥ sitairyaṣṭiviṣaktahaṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ eṣa bhoḥ sūta naraḥ bhyupetaḥ keśaiḥ sitaiḥ yaṣṭi viṣakta haṣṭaḥ

original: bhrūsaṃvṛtākṣaḥ śithilānatāṅgaḥ kiṃ vikriyaiṣā prakṛtiryadṛcchā // Bc_3.28 //
analyzed: bhrū saṃvṛta akṣaḥ śithila ānata aṅgaḥ kim vikriyā eṣā prakṛtiḥ yadṛcchā

original: ityevamuktaḥ sa rathapraṇetā nivedayāmāsa nṛpātmajāya /
analyzed: iti evam uktaḥ sa ratha praṇetā nivedayāmāsa nṛpa ātmajāya

original: saṃrakṣyamapyarthamadoṣadarśī taireva devaiḥ kṛtabuddhimohaḥ // Bc_3.29 //
analyzed: saṃrakṣyam api artham adoṣa darśī taiḥ eva devaiḥ kṛta buddhi mohaḥ

original: rūpasya hantrī vyasanaṃ balasya śokasya yonirnidhana ratīnām /
analyzed: rūpasya hantrī vyasanam balasya śokasya yoniḥ nidhana ratīnām

original: nāśaḥ smṛtīnāṃ ripurindriyāṇāmeṣā jarā nāma yayaiṣa bhagnaḥ // Bc_3.30 //
analyzed: nāśaḥ smṛtīnām ripuḥ indriyāṇām eṣā jarā nāma yayā eṣa bhagnaḥ

original: pītaṃ hyanenāpi payaḥ śiśutve kālena bhūyaḥ parisṛptamurvyām /
analyzed: pītam hi anena api payaḥ śiśu tve kālena bhūyas parisṛptam urvyām

original: krameṇa bhūtvā ca yuvā vapuṣmān krameṇa tenaiva jarāmupetaḥ // Bc_3.31 //
analyzed: krameṇa bhūtvā ca yuvā vapuṣmān krameṇa tena eva jarām upetaḥ

original: ityevamukte calitaḥ sa kiṃcidrājātmajaḥ sūtamidaṃ babhāṣe /
analyzed: iti evam ukte calitaḥ sa kiṃcid rāja ātmajaḥ sūtam idam babhāṣe

original: kimeṣa doṣo bhavitā mamāpītyasmai tataḥ sārathirabhyuvāca // Bc_3.32 //
analyzed: kim eṣa doṣaḥ bhavitā mama api iti asmai tatas sārathiḥ abhyuvāca

original: āyuṣmato 'pyeṣa vayaḥprakarṣo niḥsaṃśayaṃ kālavaśena bhāvī /
analyzed: āyuṣmataḥ pi eṣa vayaḥ prakarṣaḥ niḥsaṃśayam kāla vaśena bhāvī

original: evaṃ jarāṃ rūpavināśayitrīṃ jānāti caivecchati caiva lokaḥ // Bc_3.33 //
analyzed: evam jarām rūpa vināśayitrīm jānāti ca eva icchati ca eva lokaḥ

original: tataḥ sa pūrvāśayaśuddhabuddhirvistīrṇakalpācitapuṇyakarmā /
analyzed: tatas sa pūrva āśaya śuddha buddhiḥ vistīrṇa kalpa ācita puṇya karmā

original: śrutvā jarāṃ savivije mahātmā mahāśanerghoṣamivāntike gauḥ // Bc_3.34 //
analyzed: śrutvā jarām sa vivije mahātmā mahā aśaneḥ ghoṣam iva antike gauḥ

original: niḥśvasya dīrghaṃ svaśiraḥ prakampya tasmiṃśca jīrṇe viniveśya cakṣuḥ /
analyzed: niḥśvasya dīrgham sva śiraḥ prakampya tasmin ca jīrṇe viniveśya cakṣuḥ

original: tāṃ caiva dṛṣṭvā janatāṃ saharṣāṃ vākyaṃ sa saṃvigna idaṃ jagāda // Bc_3.35 //
analyzed: tām ca eva dṛṣṭvā janatām sa harṣām vākyam sa saṃvignaḥ idam jagāda

original: evaṃ jarā hanti ca nirviśeṣaṃ smṛtiṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parākramaṃ ca /
analyzed: evam jarā hanti ca nirviśeṣam smṛtim ca rūpam ca parākramam ca

original: na caiva saṃvegamupaiti lokaḥ pratyakṣato 'pīdṛśamīkṣamāṇaḥ // Bc_3.36 //
analyzed: na ca eva saṃvegam upaiti lokaḥ pi īdṛśam īkṣamāṇaḥ

original: evaṃ gate sūta nivartayāśvān śīghraṃ gṛhāṇyeva bhavānprayātu /
analyzed: evam gate sūta nivartaya aśvān śīghram gṛhāṇi eva bhavān prayātu

original: udyānabhūmau hi kuto ratirme jarābhaye cetasi vartamāne // Bc_3.37 //
analyzed: udyāna bhūmau hi kutas ratiḥ me jarā bhaye cetasi vartamāne

original: athājñayā bhartusutasya tasya nivartayāmāsa rathaṃ niyantā /
analyzed: athā ājñayā bhartu sutasya tasya nivartayāmāsa ratham niyantā

original: tataḥ kumāro bhavanaṃ tadeva cintāvaśaḥ śūnyamiva prapede // Bc_3.38 //
analyzed: tatas kumāraḥ bhavanam tat eva cintā vaśaḥ śūnyam iva prapede

original: yadā tu tatraiva na śarma lebhe jarā jareti praparīkṣamāṇaḥ /
analyzed: yadā tu tatra eva na śarma lebhe jarā jarā iti praparīkṣamāṇaḥ

original: tato narendrānumataḥ sa bhūyaḥ krameṇa tenaiva bahirjagāma // Bc_3.39 //
analyzed: tatas narendra anumataḥ sa bhūyas krameṇa tena eva bahis jagāma

original: athāparaṃ vyādhiparītadehaṃ ta eva devāḥ sasṛjurmanuṣyam /
analyzed: atha aparam vyādhi parīta deham te eva devāḥ sasṛjuḥ manuṣyam

original: dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ sārathimābabhāṣe śauddhodanistadgatadṛṣṭireva // Bc_3.40 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca tam sārathim ābabhāṣe śauddhodaniḥ tad gata dṛṣṭiḥ eva

original: sthūlodaraḥ śvāsacalaccharīraḥ srastāṃsabāhuḥ kṛśapāṇḍugātraḥ /
analyzed: sthūla udaraḥ śvāsa calat śarīraḥ srasta aṃsa bāhuḥ kṛśa pāṇḍu gātraḥ

original: ambeti vācaṃ karuṇaṃ bruvāṇaḥ paraṃ samāśritya naraḥ ka eṣaḥ // Bc_3.41 //
analyzed: ambā iti vācam karuṇam bruvāṇaḥ param samāśritya naraḥ kaḥ eṣaḥ

original: tato 'bravītsārathirasya saumya dhātuprakopaprabhavaḥ pravṛddhaḥ /
analyzed: tatas bravīt sārathiḥ asya saumya dhātu prakopa prabhavaḥ pravṛddhaḥ

original: rogābhidhānaḥ sumahānanarthaḥ śakto 'pi yenaiṣa kṛto 'svatantraḥ // Bc_3.42 //
analyzed: roga abhidhānaḥ su mahān anarthaḥ yena eṣa svatantraḥ

original: ityūcivān rājasutaḥ sa bhūyastaṃ sānukampo naramīkṣamāṇaḥ /
analyzed: iti ūcivān rāja sutaḥ sa bhūyas tam sa anukampaḥ naram īkṣamāṇaḥ

original: asyaiva jāto pṛthageṣa doṣaḥ sāmānyato rogabhayaṃ prajānām // Bc_3.43 //
analyzed: asya eva pṛthak eṣa doṣaḥ sāmānyatas roga bhayam prajānām

original: tato babhāṣe sa rathapraṇetā kumāra sādhāraṇa eṣa doṣaḥ /
analyzed: tatas babhāṣe sa ratha praṇetā kumāra sādhāraṇaḥ eṣa doṣaḥ

original: evaṃ hi rogaiḥ paripīḍyamāno rujāturo harṣamupaiti lokaḥ // Bc_3.44 //
analyzed: evam hi rogaiḥ paripīḍyamānaḥ rujā āturaḥ harṣam upaiti lokaḥ

original: iti śrutārthaḥ sa viṣaṇṇacetāḥ prāvepatāmbūrmigataḥ śaśīva /
analyzed: iti śruta arthaḥ sa viṣaṇṇa cetāḥ prāvepata ambu ūrmi gataḥ śaśī iva

original: idaṃ ca vākyaṃ karuṇāyamānaḥ provāca kiṃcinmṛdunā svareṇa // Bc_3.45 //
analyzed: idam ca vākyam karuṇāyamānaḥ provāca kiṃcid mṛdunā svareṇa

original: idaṃ ca rogavyasanaṃ prajānāṃ paśyaṃśca viśrambhamupaiti lokaḥ /
analyzed: idam ca roga vyasanam prajānām paśyan ca viśrambham upaiti lokaḥ

original: vistīrṇamajñānamaho narāṇāṃ hasanti ye rogabhayairamuktāḥ // Bc_3.46 //
analyzed: vistīrṇam ajñānam ahar narāṇām hasanti ye roga bhayaiḥ amuktāḥ

original: nivartyatāṃ sūta bahiḥprayāṇānnarendrasadmaiva rathaḥ prayātu /
analyzed: nivartyatām sūta bahis prayāṇāt narendra sadma eva rathaḥ prayātu

original: śrutvā ca me rogabhayaṃ ratibhyaḥ pratyāhataṃ saṃkucatīva cetaḥ // Bc_3.47 //
analyzed: śrutvā ca me roga bhayam ratibhyaḥ pratyāhatam saṃkucati iva cetaḥ

original: tato nivṛttaḥ sa nivṛttaharṣaḥ pradhyānayuktaḥ praviveśa veśma /
analyzed: tatas nivṛttaḥ sa nivṛtta harṣaḥ pradhyāna yuktaḥ praviveśa veśma

original: taṃ dvistathā prekṣya ca saṃnivṛttaṃ paryeṣaṇaṃ bhūmipatiścakāra // Bc_3.48 //
analyzed: tam dvis tathā prekṣya ca saṃnivṛttam paryeṣaṇam bhūmipatiḥ cakāra

original: śrutvā nimittaṃ tu nivartanasya saṃtyaktamātmānamanena mene /
analyzed: śrutvā nimittam tu nivartanasya saṃtyaktam ātmānam anena mene

original: mārgasya śaucādhikṛtāya caiva cukrośa ruṣṭo 'pi ca nogradaṇḍaḥ // Bc_3.49 //
analyzed: mārgasya śauca adhikṛtāya ca eva cukrośa ruṣṭaḥ ca na ugra daṇḍaḥ

original: bhūyaśca tasmai vidadhe sutāya viśeṣayuktaṃ viṣayapracāram /
analyzed: bhūyas ca tasmai vidadhe sutāya viśeṣa yuktam viṣaya pracāram

original: calendriyatvādapi nāma sakto nāsmānvijahyāditi nāthamānaḥ // Bc_3.50 //
analyzed: cala indriya tvāt api nāma saktaḥ na asmān vijahyāt iti nāthamānaḥ

original: yadā ca śabdādibhirindriyārthairantaḥpure naiva suto 'sya reme /
analyzed: yadā ca śabda ādibhiḥ indriya arthaiḥ antaḥpure nā eva reme

original: tato bahirvyādiśati sma yātrāṃ rasāntaraṃ syāditi manyamānaḥ // Bc_3.51 //
analyzed: tatas bahis vyādiśati sma yātrām rasa antaram syāt iti manyamānaḥ

original: snehācca bhāvaṃ tanayasya buddhvā sa rāgadoṣānavicintya kāṃścit /
analyzed: snehāt ca bhāvam tanayasya buddhvā sa rāga doṣān a vicintya kāṃścid

original: yogyāḥ samājñāpayati sma tatra kalāsvabhijñā iti vāramukhyāḥ // Bc_3.52 //
analyzed: yogyāḥ samājñāpayati sma tatra kalāsu abhijñāḥ iti vāramukhyāḥ

original: tato viśeṣeṇa narendramārge svalaṃkṛte caiva parīkṣite ca /
analyzed: tatas viśeṣeṇa narendra mārge su alaṃkṛte ca eva parīkṣite ca

original: vyatyasya sūtaṃ ca rathaṃ ca rājā prasthāpayāmāsa bahiḥ kumāram // Bc_3.53 //
analyzed: vyatyasya sūtam ca ratham ca rājā prasthāpayāmāsa bahis kumāram

original: tatastathā gacchati rājaputre taireva devairvihito gatāsuḥ /
analyzed: tatas tathā gacchati rāja putre taiḥ eva devaiḥ vihitaḥ gatāsuḥ

original: taṃ caiva mārge mṛtamuhyamānaṃ sūtaḥ kumāraśca dadarśa nānyaḥ // Bc_3.54 //
analyzed: tam ca eva mārge mṛtam uhyamānam sūtaḥ kumāraḥ ca dadarśa na anyaḥ

original: athabravīdrājasutaḥ sa sūtaṃ naraiścaturbhihriyate ka eṣaḥ /
analyzed: atha bravīt rāja sutaḥ sa sūtam naraiḥ caturbhiḥ hriyate kaḥ eṣaḥ

original: dīnairmanuṣyairanugamyamāno yo bhūṣitaścāpyavarudyate ca // Bc_3.55 //
analyzed: dīnaiḥ manuṣyaiḥ anugamyamānaḥ yaḥ bhūṣitaḥ ca api avarudyate ca

original: tataḥ sa śuddhātmabhireva devaiḥ śuddhādhivāsairabhibhūtacetāḥ /
analyzed: tatas sa śuddha ātmabhiḥ eva devaiḥ śuddhādhivāsaiḥ abhibhūta cetāḥ

original: avācyamapyathīmimaṃ niyantā pravyājahārārthavadīśvarāya // Bc_3.56 //
analyzed: avācyam api athīm imam niyantā pravyājahāra arthavat īśvarāya

original: buddhīndriyaprāṇaguṇairviyuktaḥ supto visaṃjñastṛṇakāṣṭhabhūtaḥ /
analyzed: buddhīndriya prāṇa guṇaiḥ viyuktaḥ suptaḥ visaṃjñaḥ tṛṇa kāṣṭha bhūtaḥ

original: saṃvardhya saṃrakṣya ca yatnavadbhiḥ priyapriyaistyajyata eṣa ko 'pi // Bc_3.57 //
analyzed: saṃvardhya saṃrakṣya ca yatnavadbhiḥ priya priyaiḥ tyajyate eṣa

original: iti praṇetuḥ sa niśamya vākyaṃ saṃcukṣubhe kiṃciduvāca cainam /
analyzed: iti praṇetuḥ sa niśamya vākyam saṃcukṣubhe kiṃcid uvāca ca enam

original: kiṃ kevalo 'syaiva janasya dharmaḥ sarvaprajānāmayamīdṛśo 'ntaḥ // Bc_3.58 //
analyzed: kim kevalaḥ sya eva janasya dharmaḥ sarva prajānām ayam īdṛśaḥ ntaḥ

original: tataḥ praṇetā vadati sma tasmai sarvaprajānāmidamantakarma /
analyzed: tatas praṇetā vadati sma tasmai sarva prajānām idam anta karma

original: hīnasya madhyasya mahātmano vā sarvasya loke niyato vināśaḥ // Bc_3.59 //
analyzed: hīnasya madhyasya mahātmanaḥ vā sarvasya loke niyataḥ vināśaḥ

original: tataḥ sa dhīro 'pi narendrasūnuḥ śrutvaiva mṛtyuṃ viṣasāda sadyaḥ /
analyzed: tatas sa dhīraḥ pi narendra sūnuḥ śrutvā eva mṛtyum viṣasāda sadyas

original: aṃsena saṃśliṣya ca kūbarāgraṃ provāca nihrādavatā svareṇa // Bc_3.60 //
analyzed: aṃsena saṃśliṣya ca kūbara agram provāca nihrādavatā svareṇa

original: iyaṃ ca niṣṭhā niyatā prajānāṃ pramādyati tyaktabhayaśca lokaḥ /
analyzed: iyam ca niṣṭhā niyatā prajānām pramādyati tyakta bhayaḥ ca lokaḥ

original: manāṃsi śaṅke kaṭhināni nṝṇāṃ svasthāstathā hyadhvani vartamānāḥ // Bc_3.61 //
analyzed: manāṃsi śaṅke kaṭhināni nṝṇām svasthāḥ tathā hi adhvani vartamānāḥ

original: tasmādrathaḥ sūta nivartyatā no vihārabhūmerna hi deśakālaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt rathaḥ sūta nivartyatā naḥ vihāra bhūmeḥ na hi deśa kālaḥ

original: jānanvināśaṃ kathamartikāle sacetanaḥ syādiha hi pramattaḥ // Bc_3.62 //
analyzed: jānan vināśam katham arti kāle sa cetanaḥ syāt iha hi pramattaḥ

original: iti bruvāṇe 'pi narādhipātmaje nivartayāmāsa sa naiva taṃ ratham /
analyzed: iti bruvāṇe pi narādhipa ātmaje nivartayāmāsa sa nā eva tam ratham

original: viśeṣayuktaṃ tu narendraśāsanātsa padmaṣaṇḍaṃ vanameva niryayau // Bc_3.63 //
analyzed: viśeṣa yuktam tu narendra śāsanāt sa padma ṣaṇḍam vanam eva niryayau

original: tataḥ śivaṃ kusumitabālapādapaṃ paribhramatpramuditamattakokilam /
analyzed: tatas śivam kusumita bāla pādapam paribhramat pramudita matta kokilam

original: vimānavatsa kamalacārudīrghikaṃ dadarśa tadvanamiva nandanaṃ vanam // Bc_3.64 //
analyzed: vimāna vat sa kamala cāru dīrghikam dadarśa tat vanam iva nandanam vanam

original: varāṅganāgaṇakalilaṃ nṛpātmajastato balādvanamatinīyate sma tat /
analyzed: vara aṅganā gaṇa kalilam nṛpa ātmajaḥ tatas balāt vanam atinīyate sma tat

original: varāpsarovṛtamalakādhipālayaṃ navavrato muniriva vighnakātaraḥ // Bc_3.65 //
analyzed: vara apsaraḥ vṛtam alakādhipa ālayam nava vrataḥ muniḥ iva vighna kātaraḥ

original: iti buddhacarite mahākāvye saṃvegotpattirnāma tṛtīyaḥ sargaḥ // 3 //
analyzed: iti buddhacarite mahākāvye saṃvegotpattiḥ nāma tṛtīyaḥ sargaḥ  /

original: tatastasmātpurodyānātkautūhalacalekṣaṇāḥ /
analyzed: tatas tasmāt pura udyānāt kautūhala cala īkṣaṇāḥ

original: pratyujjagmurnṛpasutaṃ prāptaṃ varamiva striyaḥ // Bc_4.1 //
analyzed: pratyujjagmuḥ nṛpa sutam prāptam varam iva striyaḥ

original: abhigamya ca tāstasmai vismayotphullalocanāḥ /
analyzed: abhigamya ca tāḥ tasmai vismaya utphulla locanāḥ

original: cakrire samudācāraṃ padmakośanibhaiḥ karaiḥ // Bc_4.2 //
analyzed: cakrire samudācāram padma kośa nibhaiḥ karaiḥ

original: tasthuśca parivāryainaṃ manmathākṣiptacetasaḥ /
analyzed: tasthuḥ ca parivārya enam manmatha ākṣipta cetasaḥ

original: niścalaiḥ prītivikacaiḥ pibantya iva locanaiḥ // Bc_4.3 //
analyzed: niścalaiḥ prīti vikacaiḥ pibantyaḥ iva locanaiḥ

original: taṃ hi tā menire nāryaḥ kāmo vigrahavāniti /
analyzed: tam hi tāḥ menire nāryaḥ kāmaḥ vigrahavān iti

original: śobhitaṃ lakṣaṇairdīptaiḥ sahajairbhūṣāṇairiva // Bc_4.4 //
analyzed: śobhitam lakṣaṇaiḥ dīptaiḥ sahajaiḥ bhūṣāṇaiḥ iva

original: saumyatvāccaiva dhairyācca kāścidenaṃ prajajñire /
analyzed: saumya tvāt ca eva dhairyāt ca kāścid enam prajajñire

original: avatīrṇo mahī sākṣād guḍhāṃśuścandramā iti // Bc_4.5 //
analyzed: avatīrṇaḥ mahī sākṣāt guḍhāṃśuḥ candramāḥ iti

original: tasya tā vapuṣākṣiptā nigṛhītaṃ jajṛmbhire /
analyzed: tasya tāḥ vapuṣā ākṣiptāḥ nigṛhītam jajṛmbhire

original: anyonyaṃ dṛṣṭibhirhatvā śanaiśca viniśaśvasuḥ // Bc_4.6 //
analyzed: anyonyam dṛṣṭibhiḥ hatvā śanais ca viniśaśvasuḥ

original: evaṃ tā dṛṣṭimātreṇa nāryo dadṛśureva tam /
analyzed: evam tāḥ dṛṣṭi mātreṇa nāryaḥ dadṛśuḥ eva tam

original: na vyājahurna jahasuḥ prabhāveṇāsya yantritāḥ // Bc_4.7 //
analyzed: na vyājahuḥ na jahasuḥ prabhāveṇa asya yantritāḥ

original: tāstathā nu nirārambhā dṛṣṭvā praṇayaviklavāḥ /
analyzed: tāḥ tathā nu nirārambhāḥ dṛṣṭvā praṇaya viklavāḥ

original: purohitasuto dhīmānudāyī vākyamabravīt // Bc_4.8 //
analyzed: purohita sutaḥ dhīmān udāyī vākyam abravīt

original: sarvāḥ sarvakalājñāḥ stha bhāvagrahaṇapaṇḍitāḥ /
analyzed: sarvāḥ sarva kalā jñāḥ stha bhāva grahaṇa paṇḍitāḥ

original: rupacāturyasaṃpannāḥ svaguṇairmukhyatāṃ gatāḥ // Bc_4.9 //
analyzed: rupa cāturya saṃpannāḥ sva guṇaiḥ mukhya tām gatāḥ

original: śobhayeta guṇairebhirapi tānuttarān kurūn /
analyzed: śobhayeta guṇaiḥ ebhiḥ api tān uttarān kurūn

original: kuberasyāpi cākrīḍaṃ prāgeva vasudhāmimām // Bc_4.10 //
analyzed: kuberasya api ca ākrīḍam prāk eva vasudhām imām

original: śaktāścaliyituṃ yūyaṃ vitarāgānuṣīnapi /
analyzed: śaktāḥ caliyitum yūyam

original: apsarobhiśca kalitān grahītuṃ vibudhānapi // Bc_4.11 //
analyzed: apsarobhiḥ ca kalitān grahītum vibudhān api

original: bhāvajñānena hāvena rūpacāturyasaṃpadā /
analyzed: bhāva jñānena hāvena rūpa cāturya saṃpadā

original: strīṇāmeva ca śaktāḥ stha saṃrāge kiṃ punarnṛṇām // Bc_4.12 //
analyzed: strīṇām eva ca śaktāḥ stha saṃrāge kim punar nṛṇām

original: tāsāmevaṃvidhānāṃ vo viyuktānāṃ svagocare /
analyzed: tāsām evaṃvidhānām vaḥ viyuktānām sva gocare

original: iyamevaṃvidhā ceṣṭā na tuṣṭo 'smyārjavena vaḥ // Bc_4.13 //
analyzed: iyam evaṃvidhā ceṣṭā na tuṣṭaḥ smi ārjavena vaḥ

original: idaṃ navavadhūnāṃ vo hrīnīkuñcitacakṣuṣām /
analyzed: idam nava vadhūnām vaḥ hrī nīkuñcita cakṣuṣām

original: sadṛśaṃ ceṣṭitaṃ hi syādapi vā gopāyoṣitām // Bc_4.14 //
analyzed: sadṛśam ceṣṭitam hi syāt api vā gopā yoṣitām

original: yadapi syādayaṃ dhīraḥ śriprabhāvānmahāniti /
analyzed: yat api syāt ayam dhīraḥ śri prabhāvāt mahān iti

original: strīṇāmapi mahatteja itaḥ kāryo 'tra niścayaḥ // Bc_4.15 //
analyzed: strīṇām api mahat tejaḥ itas kāryaḥ tra niścayaḥ

original: purā hi kāśisundaryā veśavadhvā mahānṛṣiḥ /
analyzed: purā hi kāśi sundaryā veśa vadhvā mahān ṛṣiḥ

original: tāḍito 'bhūtpadā vyāso durdharṣo devatairapi // Bc_4.16 //
analyzed: tāḍitaḥ bhūtpadā vyāsaḥ durdharṣaḥ devataiḥ api

original: manthālagautamo bhikṣurjaṅghayā vāramukhyayā /
analyzed: manthāla gautamaḥ bhikṣuḥ jaṅghayā vāramukhyayā

original: piprīṣuśca tadarthārthaṃ vyasūnniraharatpurā // Bc_4.17 //
analyzed: piprīṣuḥ ca tad artha artham vyasūn niraharat purā

original: gautamaṃ dīrghatapasaṃ maharṣi dīrghajīvinam /
analyzed: gautamam dīrghatapasam mahā ṛṣi dīrgha jīvinam

original: yoṣitsaṃtoṣayāmāsa varṇasthānāvarā satī // Bc_4.18 //
analyzed: yoṣit saṃtoṣayāmāsa varṇa sthāna avarā satī

original: ṛṣyaśṛṅgaṃ munisutaṃ tathaiva strīṣvapaṇḍitam /
analyzed: ṛṣyaśṛṅgam muni sutam tathā eva strīṣu apaṇḍitam

original: upāyairvividhaiḥ śāntā jagrāha ca jahāra ca // Bc_4.19 //
analyzed: upāyaiḥ vividhaiḥ śāntā jagrāha ca jahāra ca

original: viśvāmitro maharṣiśca vigāḍho 'pi mahattapaḥ /
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ mahā ṛṣiḥ ca mahat tapaḥ

original: daśa varṣāṇyaharmene ghṛtācyāpsarasā hṛtaḥ // Bc_4.20 //
analyzed: daśa varṣāṇi ahar mene ghṛtācyā apsarasā hṛtaḥ

original: evamādīnṛṣīstāṃstānanayanvikriyāṃ striyaḥ /
analyzed: evamādīn ṛṣīḥ tān tān anayan vikriyām striyaḥ

original: lalitaṃ pūrvavayasaṃ kiṃ punarnṛpateḥ sutam // Bc_4.21 //
analyzed: lalitam pūrvavayasam kim punar nṛpateḥ sutam

original: tadevaṃ sati viśrabdhaṃ prayatadhvaṃ tathā yathā /
analyzed: tat evam sati viśrabdham prayatadhvam tathā yathā

original: iyaṃ nṛpasya vaṃśaśrīrito na syātparāṅmukhī // Bc_4.22 //
analyzed: iyam nṛpasya vaṃśa śrīḥ itas na syāt parāṅmukhī

original: yā hi kāścidyuvatayo haranti sadṛśaṃ janam /
analyzed: yāḥ hi kāścid yuvatayaḥ haranti sadṛśam janam

original: nikṛṣṭotkṛṣṭayorbhāvaṃ yā gṛhṇanti tu tāḥ striyaḥ // Bc_4.23 //
analyzed: nikṛṣṭa utkṛṣṭayoḥ bhāvam yāḥ gṛhṇanti tu tāḥ striyaḥ

original: ityudāyivacaḥ śrutvā tā viddhā iva yoṣitaḥ /
analyzed: iti udāyi vacaḥ śrutvā tāḥ viddhāḥ iva yoṣitaḥ

original: samāruruhurātmānaṃ kumāragrahaṇaṃ prati // Bc_4.24 //
analyzed: samāruruhuḥ ātmānam kumāra grahaṇam prati

original: tā bhrūmiḥ prekṣitairhāvairhasitailīḍitairgataiḥ /
analyzed: tāḥ bhrūmiḥ prekṣitaiḥ hāvaiḥ hasitaiḥ līḍitaiḥ gataiḥ

original: cakrurākṣepikāśceṣṭā bhītabhītā ivāṅganāḥ // Bc_4.25 //
analyzed: cakruḥ ākṣepikāḥ ceṣṭāḥ bhīta bhītāḥ iva aṅganāḥ

original: rājñastu viniyogena kumārasya ca mārdavāt /
analyzed: rājñaḥ tu viniyogena kumārasya ca mārdavāt

original: jahuḥ kṣipramaviśrambhaṃ madena madanena ca // Bc_4.26 //
analyzed: jahuḥ kṣipram aviśrambham madena madanena ca

original: atha nārījanavṛtaḥ kumāro vyacaradvanam /
analyzed: atha nārī jana vṛtaḥ kumāraḥ vyacarat vanam

original: vāsitāyūthasahitaḥ karīva himavadvanam // Bc_4.27 //

analyzed: kṣayam akṣaya dharma jāta rāgaḥ śaśi siṃha ānana vikramaḥ prapede

analyzed: samitau marutām iva jvalantam maghavantam tridive sanatkumāraḥ

analyzed: viṣayeṣu kutūhala indriyasya vrata khedeṣu asamarthī niścayasya

analyzed: taruṇasya manaḥ calati araṇyāt anabhijñaḥ ca viśeṣataḥ viveke

analyzed: mama tu priya dharma dharma kālaḥ tvayi lakṣmīm avasṛjya lakṣma bhūte

original: sthiravikrama vikrameṇa dharmastava hitvā tu guruṃ bhavedadharmaḥ // Bc_5.32 //
analyzed: sthira vikrama vikrameṇa dharmaḥ tava hitvā tu gurum bhavet adharmaḥ

original: tadimaṃ vyavasāyamutsṛja tvaṃ bhava tāvannirato gṛhasthadharme /
analyzed: tat imam vyavasāyam utsṛja tvam bhava tāvat nirataḥ gṛhastha dharme

analyzed: puruṣasya vayaḥ sukhāni bhuktvā ramaṇīyaḥ hi tapaḥ vana praveśaḥ

original: iti vākyamidaṃ niśamya rājñaḥ kalaviṅkasvara uttaraṃ babhāṣe /
analyzed: iti vākyam idam niśamya rājñaḥ kalaviṅka svaraḥ uttaram babhāṣe

original: yadi me pratibhūtaścaturṣu rājan bhavasi tvaṃ na tapovanaṃ śrayiṣye // Bc_5.34 //
analyzed: yadi me pratibhūtaḥ caturṣu rājan bhavasi tvam na tapaḥ vanam śrayiṣye

original: na bhavenmaraṇāya jīvitaṃ me viharetsvāsthyamidaṃ ca me na rogaḥ /
analyzed: na bhavet maraṇāya jīvitam me viharet svāsthyam idam ca me na rogaḥ

original: na ca yauvanamākṣipejjarā me na ca saṃpattimimāṃ haredvipattiḥ // Bc_5.35 //
analyzed: na ca yauvanam ākṣipet jarā me na ca saṃpattim imām haret vipattiḥ

original: iti durlabhamarthamūcivāṃsaṃ tanayaṃ vākyamuvāca śākyarājaḥ /
analyzed: iti durlabham artham ūcivāṃsam tanayam vākyam uvāca śākya rājaḥ

original: tyaja buddhimimāmatipravṛttāmavahāsyo 'timanoratho 'kramaśca // Bc_5.36 //
analyzed: tyaja buddhim imām atipravṛttām avahāsyaḥ ti manorathaḥ kramaḥ ca

original: atha merugururguruṃ babhāṣe yadi nāsti krama eṣa nāsmi vāryaḥ /
analyzed: atha meru guruḥ gurum babhāṣe yadi nā asti kramaḥ eṣa nā asmi vāryaḥ

original: śaraṇājjvalanena dahyamānānna hi niścikramiṣuḥ kṣamaṃ grahītum // Bc_5.37 //
analyzed: śaraṇāt jvalanena dahyamānāt na hi niścikramiṣuḥ kṣamam grahītum

original: jagataśca yadā dhruvo viyogo nanu dharmāya varaṃ svayaviyogaḥ /
analyzed: jagataḥ ca yadā dhruvaḥ viyogaḥ nanu dharmāya varam svaya viyogaḥ

original: avaśaṃ nanu viprayojayenmāmakṛtasvārthamatṛptameva mṛtyuḥ // Bc_5.38 //
analyzed: avaśam nanu viprayojayet mām akṛta sva artham atṛptam eva mṛtyuḥ

original: iti bhūmipatirniśamya tasya vyavasāyaṃ tanayasya nirmumukṣoḥ /
analyzed: iti bhūmipatiḥ niśamya tasya vyavasāyam tanayasya nirmumukṣoḥ

original: abhidhāya na yāsyatīti bhūyo vidadhe rakṣaṇamuttamāṃśca kāmān // Bc_5.39 //
analyzed: abhidhāya na yāsyati iti bhūyas vidadhe rakṣaṇam uttamān ca kāmān

original: sacivaistu nidarśito yathāvad bahumānātpraṇayācca śāstrapūrvam /
analyzed: sacivaiḥ tu nidarśitaḥ yathāvat bahu mānāt praṇayāt ca śāstra pūrvam

original: guruṇā ca nivārito 'śrupātaiḥ praviveśāvasathaṃ tataḥ sa śocan // Bc_5.40 //
analyzed: guruṇā ca śru pātaiḥ praviveśa āvasatham tatas sa śocan

original: calakuṇḍalacumbitānanābhirghananiśvāsavikampitastanībhiḥ /
analyzed: cala kuṇḍala cumbita ānanābhiḥ ghana niśvāsa vikampita stanībhiḥ

original: vanitābhiradhīralocanābhimṛrgaśāvābhirivābhyudīkṣyamāṇaḥ // Bc_5.41 //
analyzed: vanitābhiḥ adhīra locanābhiḥ mṛrga śāvābhiḥ iva abhyudīkṣyamāṇaḥ

original: sa hi kāñcanaparvatāvadāto hṛdayenmādakaro varāṅganānām /
analyzed: sa hi kāñcana parvata avadātaḥ hṛdaya id māda karaḥ vara aṅganānām

original: śravaṇāṅgavilocanātmabhāvānvacanasparśavapurguṇairjahāra // Bc_5.42 //
analyzed: śravaṇa aṅga vilocana ātma bhāvān vacana sparśa vapuḥ guṇaiḥ jahāra

original: vigate divase tato vimānaṃ vapuṣā sūrya iva pradīpyamānaḥ /
analyzed: vigate divase tatas vimānam vapuṣā sūryaḥ iva pradīpyamānaḥ

original: timiraṃ vijighāṃsurātmabhāsā ravirudyanniva merumāruroha // Bc_5.43 //
analyzed: timiram vijighāṃsuḥ ātma bhāsā raviḥ udyan iva merum āruroha

original: kanakojjvaladīptadīpavṛkṣaṃ varakālāgurudhūpapūrṇagarbham /
analyzed: kanaka ujjvala dīpta dīpavṛkṣam vara kālāguru dhūpa pūrṇa garbham

original: adhiruhya sa vajrabhakticitraṃ pravaraṃ kāñcanamāsanaṃ siṣeve // Bc_5.44 //
analyzed: adhiruhya sa vajra bhakti citram pravaram kāñcanam āsanam siṣeve

original: tata uttamamuttamāṅganāstaṃ niśi tūryairupatasthurindrakalpam /
analyzed: tatas uttamam uttama aṅganāḥ tam niśi tūryaiḥ upatasthuḥ indra kalpam

original: himavacchirasīva candragaure draviṇendrātmajamapsarogaṇaughāḥ // Bc_5.45 //
analyzed: himavat śirasi iva candra gaure draviṇa indra ātmajam apsaraḥ gaṇa oghāḥ

original: paramairapi divyatūryakalpaiḥ sa tu tairnaiva ratiṃ yayau na harṣam /
analyzed: paramaiḥ api divya tūrya kalpaiḥ sa tu taiḥ nā eva ratim yayau na harṣam

original: paramārthasukhāya tasya sādhorabhiniścikramiṣā yato na reme // Bc_5.46 //
analyzed: parama artha sukhāya tasya sādhoḥ abhiniścikramiṣā yatas na reme

original: atha tatra suraistapovariṣṭhairakaniṣṭhairvyavasāyamasya buddhvā /
analyzed: atha tatra suraiḥ tapaḥ variṣṭhaiḥ akaniṣṭhaiḥ vyavasāyam asya buddhvā

original: yugapatpramadājanasya nidrā vihitāsīdvikṛtāśca gātraceṣṭāḥ // Bc_5.47 //
analyzed: yugapad pramadā janasya nidrā vihitā āsīt vikṛtāḥ ca gātra ceṣṭāḥ

original: abhavacchayitā hi tatra kācidviniveśya pracale kare kapolam /
analyzed: abhavat śayitā hi tatra kācid viniveśya pracale kare kapolam

original: dayitāmapi rukmapattracitrāṃ kupitevāṅkagatāṃ vihāya vīṇām // Bc_5.48 //
analyzed: dayitām api rukma pattra citrām kupitā iva aṅka gatām vihāya vīṇām

original: vibabhau karalagnaveṇuranyā stanavisrastasitāṃśukā śayānā /
analyzed: vibabhau kara lagna veṇuḥ anyā stana visrasta sita aṃśukā śayānā

original: ṛjuṣaṭpadapaṅktijuṣṭapadmā jalaphenaprahasattaṭā nadīva // Bc_5.49 //
analyzed: ṛju ṣaṭpada paṅkti juṣṭa padmā jala phena prahasat taṭā nadī iva

original: navapuṣkaragarbhakomalābhyāṃ tapanīyojjvalasaṃgatāṅgadābhyām /
analyzed: nava puṣkara garbha komalābhyām tapanīya ujjvala saṃgata aṅgadābhyām

original: svapiti sma tathāparā bhujābhyāṃ parirabhya priyavanmṛdaṅgameva // Bc_5.50 //
analyzed: svapiti sma tathā aparā bhujābhyām parirabhya priya vat mṛdaṅgam eva

original: navahāṭakabhūṣaṇāstathānyā vasanaṃ pītamanuttamaṃ vasānāḥ /
analyzed: nava hāṭaka bhūṣaṇāḥ tathā anyāḥ vasanam pītam anuttamam vasānāḥ

original: avaśā ghananidrayā nipeturgajabhagnā iva karṇikāraśākhāḥ // Bc_5.51 //
analyzed: avaśāḥ ghana nidrayā nipetuḥ gaja bhagnāḥ iva karṇikāra śākhāḥ

original: avalambya gavākṣapārśvamanyā śayitā cāpavibhugnagātrayaṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: avalambya gavākṣa pārśvam anyā śayitā cāpa vibhugna gātrayaṣṭiḥ

original: virarāja vilambicāruhārā racitā toraṇāśālabhañjikeva // Bc_5.52 //
analyzed: virarāja vilambi cāru hārā racitā toraṇā śālabhañjikā iva

original: maṇikuṇḍaladaṣṭapattralekhaṃ mukhapadmaṃ vinataṃ tathāparasyāḥ /
analyzed: maṇi kuṇḍala daṣṭa pattra lekham mukha padmam vinatam tathā aparasyāḥ

original: śatapattramivārdhavakranāḍaṃ sthitakāraṇḍavaghaṭṭitaṃ cakāśe // Bc_5.53 //
analyzed: śatapattram iva ardha vakranāḍam sthita kāraṇḍava ghaṭṭitam cakāśe

original: aparāḥ śayitā yathopaviṣṭāḥ stanabhārairavanamyamānagātrāḥ /
analyzed: aparāḥ śayitāḥ yathā upaviṣṭāḥ stana bhāraiḥ avanamyamāna gātrāḥ

original: upaguhya parasparaṃ virejurbhujapāśaistapanīyaparihāryaiḥ // Bc_5.54 //
analyzed: upaguhya parasparam virejuḥ bhuja pāśaiḥ tapanīya parihāryaiḥ

original: mahatī parivādinī ca kācidvanitāliṅgya sakhīmiva prasuptā /
analyzed: mahatī parivādinī ca kācid vanitā āliṅgya sakhīm iva prasuptā

original: vijughūrṇa calatsuvarṇasūtrā vadanenākulakarṇikojjvalena // Bc_5.55 //
analyzed: vijughūrṇa calat suvarṇa sūtrā vadanena ākula karṇikā ujjvalena

original: paṇavaṃ yuvatirbhujāṃsadeśādavavisraṃsitacārūpāśamanyā /
analyzed: paṇavam yuvatiḥ bhuja aṃsa deśa ādava visraṃsita cāru pāśam anyā

original: savilāsaratāntatāntamūrvorvivare kāntamivābhinīya śiśye // Bc_5.56 //
analyzed: sa vilāsa rata anta tāntam ūrvoḥ vivare kāntam iva abhinīya śiśye

original: aparā babhūvurnimīlitākṣyo vipulākṣyo 'pi śubhabhruvo 'pi satyaḥ /
analyzed: aparāḥ babhūvuḥ nimīlita akṣyaḥ vipula akṣyaḥ pi śubha bhruvaḥ pi satyaḥ

original: pratisaṃkucitāravindakośāḥ savitaryastamite yathā nalinyaḥ // Bc_5.57 //
analyzed: pratisaṃkucita aravinda kośāḥ savitari astamite yathā nalinyaḥ

original: śithilākulamūrdhajā tathānyā jaghanasrastavibhūṣaṇāṃśukāntā /
analyzed: śithila ākula mūrdhajā tathā anyā jaghana srasta vibhūṣaṇa aṃśuka antā

original: aśayiṣṭa vikīrṇakaṇṭhasūtrā gajabhagnā pratiyātanāṅganeva // Bc_5.58 //
analyzed: aśayiṣṭa vikīrṇa kaṇṭha sūtrā gaja bhagnā pratiyātanā aṅganā iva

original: aparāstvavaśā hriyā viyuktā dhṛtimatyo 'pi vapurguṇairupetāḥ /
analyzed: aparāḥ tu avaśāḥ hriyā viyuktāḥ dhṛtimatyaḥ pi vapuḥ guṇaiḥ upetāḥ

original: viniśaśvasurulbaṇaṃ śayānā vikṛtāḥ kṣiptabhūjā jajṛmbhire ca // Bc_5.59 //
analyzed: viniśaśvasuḥ ulbaṇam śayānāḥ vikṛtāḥ kṣipta bhūjāḥ jajṛmbhire ca

original: vyapaviddhavibhūṣaṇasrajo 'nyā visṛtāgranthanavāsaso visaṃjñāḥ /
analyzed: vyapaviddha vibhūṣaṇa srajaḥ nyāḥ visṛta āgranthana vāsasaḥ visaṃjñāḥ

original: animīlitaśuklaniścalākṣyo na virejuḥ śayitā gatāsukalpāḥ // Bc_5.60 //
analyzed: a nimīlita śukla niścala akṣyaḥ na virejuḥ śayitāḥ gatāsu kalpāḥ

original: vivṛtāsyapuṭā vivṛddhagātrī prapatadvaktrajalā prakāśaguhyā /
analyzed: vivṛta āsya puṭā vivṛddha gātrī prapatat vaktra jalā prakāśa guhyā

original: aparā madaghūrṇiteva śiśye na babhāse vikṛtaṃ vapuḥ pupoṣa // Bc_5.61 //
analyzed: aparā mada ghūrṇitā iva śiśye na babhāse vikṛtam vapuḥ pupoṣa

original: iti sattvakulānvayānurūpaṃ vividhaṃ sa pramadājanaḥ śayānaḥ /
analyzed: iti sattva kula anvaya anurūpam vividham sa pramadā janaḥ śayānaḥ

original: sarasaḥ sadṛśaṃ babhāra rūpaṃ pavanāvarjitarugnapuṣkarasya // Bc_5.62 //
analyzed: sarasaḥ sadṛśam babhāra rūpam

original: samavekṣya tathā tathā śayānā vikṛtāstā yuvatīradhīraceṣṭāḥ /
analyzed: samavekṣya tathā tathā śayānāḥ vikṛtāḥ tāḥ yuvatīḥ adhīra ceṣṭāḥ

original: guṇavadvapuṣo 'pi valgubhāṣā nṛpasūnuḥ sa vigarhayāṃbabhūva // Bc_5.63 //
analyzed: valgu bhāṣāḥ nṛpa sūnuḥ sa vigarhayāṃbabhūva

original: aśucirvikṛtaśca jīvaloke vanitānāmayamīdṛśaḥ svabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: aśuciḥ vikṛtaḥ ca jīva loke vanitānām ayam īdṛśaḥ svabhāvaḥ

original: vasanābharaṇaistu vañcyamānaḥ puruṣaḥ strīviṣayeṣu rāgameti // Bc_5.64 //
analyzed: vasana ābharaṇaiḥ tu vañcyamānaḥ puruṣaḥ strī viṣayeṣu rāgam eti

original: vimṛśedyadi yoṣitāṃ manuṣyaḥ prakṛtiṃ svapnavikāramīdṛśaṃ ca /
analyzed: vimṛśet yadi yoṣitām manuṣyaḥ prakṛtim svapna vikāram īdṛśam ca

original: dhruvamatra na vardhayetpramādaṃ guṇasaṃkalpahatastu rāgameti // Bc_5.65 //
analyzed: dhruvam atra na vardhayet pramādam guṇa saṃkalpa hataḥ tu rāgam eti

original: iti tasya tadantaraṃ viditvā niśi niścikramiṣā samudbabhūva /
analyzed: iti tasya tat antaram viditvā niśi niścikramiṣā samudbabhūva

original: avagamya manastato 'sya devairbhavanadvāramapāvṛtaṃ babhūva // Bc_5.66 //
analyzed: avagamya manaḥ tatas sya devaiḥ bhavana dvāram apāvṛtam babhūva

original: atha so 'vatatāra harmyapṛṣṭhādyuvatīstāḥ śayitā vigarhamāṇaḥ /
analyzed: atha saḥ vatatāra harmya pṛṣṭhāt yuvatīḥ tāḥ śayitāḥ vigarhamāṇaḥ

original: avatīrya tataśca nirviśaṅko gṛhakakṣyāṃ prathamāṃ vinirjagāma // Bc_5.67 //
analyzed: avatīrya tatas ca nirviśaṅkaḥ gṛha kakṣyām prathamām vinirjagāma

original: turagāvacaraṃ sa bodhayitvā javinaṃ chandakamitthamityuvāca /
analyzed: turaga avacaram sa bodhayitvā javinam chandakam ittham iti uvāca

original: hayamānaya kanthakaṃ tvarāvānamṛtaṃ prāptumito 'dya me yiyāsā // Bc_5.68 //
analyzed: hayam ānaya kanthakam tvarāvān amṛtam prāptum itas dya me yiyāsā

original: hṛdi yā mama tuṣṭiradya jātā vyavasāyaśca yathā matau niviṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: hṛdi yā mama tuṣṭiḥ adya jātā vyavasāyaḥ ca yathā matau niviṣṭaḥ

original: vijane 'pi ca nāthavānivāsmi dhruvamartho 'bhimukhaḥ sameta iṣṭaḥ // Bc_5.69 //
analyzed: vijane ca nāthavān iva asmi dhruvam arthaḥ bhimukhaḥ sametaḥ iṣṭaḥ

original: hriyameva ca saṃnatiṃ ca hitvā śayitā matpramukhe yathā yuvatyaḥ /
analyzed: hriyam eva ca saṃnatim ca hitvā śayitāḥ mad pramukhe yathā yuvatyaḥ

original: vivṛte ca yathā svayaṃ kapāṭe niyataṃ yātumato mamādya kālaḥ // Bc_5.70 //
analyzed: vivṛte ca yathā svayam kapāṭe niyatam yātum atas mama adya kālaḥ

original: pratigṛhya tataḥ sa bharturājñāṃ viditārtho 'pi narendraśāsanasya /
analyzed: pratigṛhya tatas sa bhartuḥ ājñām vidita arthaḥ narendra śāsanasya

original: manasīva pareṇa codyamānasturagasyānayane matiṃ cakāra // Bc_5.71 //
analyzed: manasi iva pareṇa codyamānaḥ turagasya ānayane matim cakāra

original: atha hemakhalīnapūrṇavaktraṃ laghuśayyāstaraṇopagūḍhapṛṣṭham /
analyzed: atha hema khalīna pūrṇa vaktram laghu śayyā āstaraṇa upagūḍha pṛṣṭham

original: balasattvajavānvayopapannaṃ sa varāśvaṃ tamupānināya bhartre // Bc_5.72 //
analyzed: bala sattva java anvaya upapannam sa vara aśvam tam upānināya bhartre

original: pratatrikapucchamūlapārṣṇi nibhṛtahṛsvatanūjapucchakarṇam /
analyzed: pratatrika puccha mūla pārṣṇi nibhṛta hṛsva tanūja puccha karṇam

original: vinatonnatapṛṣṭhakukṣipārśva vipulaprothalalāṭakaṭyuraskam // Bc_5.73 //
analyzed: vinata unnata pṛṣṭha kukṣi pārśva vipula protha lalāṭa kaṭi uraskam

original: upaguhya sa taṃ viśālavakṣāḥ kamalābhena ca sāntvayan kareṇa /
analyzed: upaguhya sa tam viśāla vakṣāḥ kamala ābhena ca sāntvayan kareṇa

original: madhurākṣarayā girā śaśāsa dhvajinīmadhyamiva praveṣṭukāmaḥ // Bc_5.74 //
analyzed: madhura akṣarayā girā śaśāsa dhvajinī madhyam iva praveṣṭu kāmaḥ

original: bahuśaḥ kila śatravo nirastāḥ samare tvāmadhiruhya pārthivena /
analyzed: bahuśas kila śatravaḥ nirastāḥ samare tvām adhiruhya pārthivena

original: ahamapyamṛtaṃ padaṃ yathāvatturagaśreṣṭha labheya tatkuruṣva // Bc_5.75 //
analyzed: aham api amṛtam padam yathāvat turaga śreṣṭha labheya tat kuruṣva

original: sulabhāḥ khalu saṃyuge sahāyā viṣayāvāptasukhe dhanārjane vā /
analyzed: sulabhāḥ khalu saṃyuge sahāyāḥ viṣaya avāpta sukhe dhana arjane vā

original: puruṣasya tu durlabhāḥ sahāyāḥ patitasyāpadi dharmasaṃśraye vā // Bc_5.76 //
analyzed: puruṣasya tu durlabhāḥ sahāyāḥ patitasya āpadi dharma saṃśraye vā

original: iha caiva bhavanti ye sahāyāḥ kaluṣe karmaṇi dharmasaṃśraye vā /
analyzed: iha ca eva bhavanti ye sahāyāḥ kaluṣe karmaṇi dharma saṃśraye vā

original: avagacchati me yathāntarātmā niyataṃ te 'pi janāstadaṃśabhājaḥ // Bc_5.77 //
analyzed: avagacchati me yathā antarātmā niyatam te janāḥ tad aṃśa bhājaḥ

original: tadidaṃ parigamya dharmayuktaṃ mama niryāṇamito jagaddhitāya /
analyzed: tat idam parigamya dharma yuktam mama niryāṇam itas jagat hitāya

original: turagottama vegavikramābhyāṃ prayatasvātmahite jagaddhite ca // Bc_5.78 //
analyzed: turaga uttama vega vikramābhyām prayatasva ātma hite jagat hite ca

original: iti suhṛdamivānuśiṣya kṛtye turagavaraṃ nṛvaro vanaṃ yiyāsuḥ /
analyzed: iti suhṛdam iva anuśiṣya kṛtye turaga varam nṛvaraḥ vanam yiyāsuḥ

original: sitamasitagatidyutirvapuṣmān raviriva śāradamabhramāruroha // Bc_5.79 //
analyzed: sitam asita gati dyutiḥ vapuṣmān raviḥ iva śāradam abhram āruroha

original: atha sa pariharanniśīthacaṇḍaṃ parijanabodhakaraṃ dhvanīṃ sadaśvaḥ /
analyzed: atha sa pariharat niśītha caṇḍam parijana bodha karam dhvanīm sat aśvaḥ

original: vigatahanuravaḥ praśāntaheṣaścakitavimuktapadakramo jagāma // Bc_5.80 //
analyzed: vigata hanu ravaḥ praśānta heṣaḥ cakita vimukta pada kramaḥ jagāma

original: kanakavalayabhūṣitaprakoṣṭhaiḥ kamalanibhaiḥ kamalāniva pravidhya /
analyzed: kanaka valaya bhūṣita prakoṣṭhaiḥ kamala nibhaiḥ kamalān iva pravidhya

original: avanatatanavastato 'sya yakṣāścakitagatairdīdhare khurān karāgraiḥ // Bc_5.81 //
analyzed: avanata tanavaḥ tatas sya yakṣāḥ cakita gataiḥ dīdhare khurān kara agraiḥ

original: guruparighakapāṭasaṃvṛtā yā na sukhamapi dviradairapāvriyante /
analyzed: guru parigha kapāṭa saṃvṛtāḥ yāḥ na sukham api dviradaiḥ apāvriyante

original: pitaramabhimukhaṃ sutaṃ ca bālaṃ janamanuraktamanuttamāṃ ca lakṣmīm /
analyzed: pitaram abhimukham sutam ca bālam janam anuraktam anuttamām ca lakṣmīm

analyzed: hutavaha vapuṣoḥ divaukasaḥ nye vyavasitam asya su duṣkaram viditvā

original: akṛṣata tuhine pathi prakāśaṃ ghanavivaraprasṛtā ivendupādāḥ // Bc_5.86 //

analyzed: hari turaga turaṅga vat turaṅgaḥ sa tu vicaran manasi iva codyamānaḥ

analyzed: aruṇa paruṣa tāram antarikṣam sa ca su bahūni jagāma yojanāni

analyzed: darśitā saumya mad bhaktiḥ vikramaḥ ca ayam ātmanaḥ

original: bhartusnehaśca yasyāyamīdṛśaḥ śaktireva ca // Bc_6.6 //

analyzed: mukuṭāt dīpa karmāṇam maṇīm ādāya bhāsvaram

original: bruvanvākyamidaṃ tasthau sāṃditya iva mandaraḥ // Bc_6.13 //

analyzed: anena maṇinā chanda praṇamya bahuśas nṛpaḥ

original: janmamaraṇanāśārtha praviṣṭo 'smi tapovanam /
analyzed: janma maraṇa nāśa artha praviṣṭaḥ smi tapaḥ vanam

original: na khalu svargatarṣeṇa nāsnehena na manyunā // Bc_6.15 //
analyzed: na khalu svarga tarṣeṇa na asnehena na manyunā

original: dhruvo yasmācca viśleṣastasmānmokṣāya me matiḥ /
analyzed: dhruvaḥ yasmāt ca viśleṣaḥ tasmāt mokṣāya me matiḥ

analyzed: viprayogaḥ katham na syāt sva janāt iti

analyzed: śoka tyāgāya niṣkrāntam na mām śocitum arhasi

analyzed: śoka hetuṣu kāmeṣu saktāḥ śocyāḥ tu rāgiṇaḥ

original: ayaṃ ca kila pūrveṣāmasmākaṃ niścayaḥ sthiraḥ /
analyzed: ayam ca kila pūrveṣām asmākam niścayaḥ sthiraḥ

analyzed: iti dāyādya bhūtena na śocyaḥ smi pathā vrajan

original: bhavanti hyarthadāyādāḥ puruṣasya viparyaye /
analyzed: bhavanti hi artha dāyādāḥ puruṣasya viparyaye

original: yadapi syādasamaye yāto vanamasāviti /
analyzed: yat api syāt asamaye yātaḥ vanam asau iti

original: akālo nāsti dharmasya jīvite cañcale sati // Bc_6.21 //
analyzed: akālaḥ nā asti dharmasya jīvite cañcale sati

original: evamādi tvayā saumya vijñāpyo vasudhādhipaḥ /
analyzed: evamādi tvayā saumya vijñāpyaḥ vasudhādhipaḥ

analyzed: prayatethāḥ tathā ca eva yathā mām na smaret āpi

original: iti vākyamidaṃ śrutvā chandaḥ saṃtāpaviklavaḥ /
analyzed: iti vākyam idam śrutvā chandaḥ saṃtāpa viklavaḥ

analyzed: ayaḥ maye pi hṛdaye kim punar sneha viklave

analyzed: upānayeyam turagam śokam kapilavāstunaḥ

analyzed: devīm nā arhasi vismartu kṛtaghnaḥ iva satkriyām

analyzed: bāla putrām guṇa vartī kula ślādhyām pativratām

analyzed: devīm arhasi na tyaktum klībaḥ prāptām iva śriyam

original: tvāmaraṇye parityajya sumantra iva rāghavam // Bc_6.36 //
analyzed: tvām araṇye parityajya sumantraḥ iva rāghavam

analyzed: vakṣyāmi ucita darśi tvāt kim tava antaḥpurāṇi vā

analyzed: yat api āttha api nairguṇyam vācyam narapatau iti

original: kiṃ tadvakṣyāmyabhūtaṃ te nirdoṣasya muneriva // Bc_6.38 //
analyzed: kim tat vakṣyāmi abhūtam te nirdoṣasya muneḥ iva

original: hṛdayena salajjena jivhayā sajjamānayā /

original: sa doṣāṃstava doṣajña kathayecchraddadhīta vā // Bc_6.40 //
analyzed: sa doṣān tava doṣa jña kathayet śraddadhīta vā

original: sānukrośasya satataṃ nityaṃ karuṇavedinaḥ /

analyzed: iti śoka abhibhūtasya śrutvā chandasya bhāṣitam

original: svasthaḥ paramayā dhṛtyā jagāda vadatāṃ varaḥ // Bc_6.42 //
analyzed: svasthaḥ paramayā dhṛtyā jagāda vadatām varaḥ

original: madviyogaṃ prati cchanda saṃtāpastyajyatāmayam /

original: nānābhāvo hi niyataṃ pṛthagjātiṣu dehiṣu // Bc_6.43 //

original: mṛtyuranyonyamavaśānasmān saṃtyājayiṣyati // Bc_6.44 //

original: tasyā niṣphalayatnāyāḥ kvāhaṃ mātuḥ kva sā mama // Bc_6.45 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ niṣphala yatnāyāḥ kva aham mātuḥ kva sā mama

original: vāsavṛkṣe samāgamya vigacchanti yathāṇḍajāḥ /
analyzed: vāsa vṛkṣe samāgamya vigacchanti yathā aṇḍajāḥ

original: niyataṃ viprayogāntastathā bhūtasamāgamaḥ // Bc_6.46 //
analyzed: niyatam viprayoga antaḥ tathā bhūta samāgamaḥ

original: sametya ca yathā bhūyo vyapayānti balāhakāḥ /

original: saṃyogo viprayogaśca tathā me prāṇināṃ mataḥ // Bc_6.47 //
analyzed: saṃyogaḥ viprayogaḥ ca tathā me prāṇinām mataḥ

analyzed: yasmāt yāti ca lokaḥ yam vipralabhya paraṃparam

original: mamattvaṃ na kṣamaṃ tasmātsvapnabhūte samāgame // Bc_6.48 //
analyzed: mamattvam na kṣamam tasmāt svapna bhūte samāgame

original: sahajena viyujyante parṇarāgeṇa pādapāḥ /
analyzed: sahajena viyujyante parṇa rāgeṇa pādapāḥ

original: anyenānyasya viśleṣaḥ kiṃ punarna bhaviṣyati // Bc_6.49 //
analyzed: anyena anyasya viśleṣaḥ kim punar na bhaviṣyati

original: tadevaṃ sati saṃtāpaṃ mā kārṣī saumya gamyatām /
analyzed: tat evam sati saṃtāpam mā kārṣī saumya gamyatām

original: lambate yadi tu sneho gatvāpi punarāvraja // Bc_6.50 //
analyzed: lambate yadi tu snehaḥ gatvā api punar āvraja

original: brūyāścāsmatkṛtāpekṣaṃ janaṃ kapilavāstuni /
analyzed: brūyāḥ ca asmad kṛta apekṣam janam kapilavāstuni

original: tyajyatāṃ tagdataḥ snehaḥ śrūyatāṃ cāsya niścayaḥ // Bc_6.51 //
analyzed: tyajyatām snehaḥ śrūyatām ca asya niścayaḥ

analyzed: kṣipram eṣyati vā kṛtvā janma mṛtyu kṣayam kila

original: akṛtārtho nirārambho nidhanaṃ yāsyatīti vā // Bc_6.52 //
analyzed: akṛtārthaḥ nirārambhaḥ nidhanam yāsyati iti vā

original: iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā kanthakasturagottamaḥ /
analyzed: iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā kanthakaḥ turaga uttamaḥ

original: jivhayā lilihe pādau bāṣpamuṣṇaṃ mumoca ca // Bc_6.53 //
analyzed: jivhayā lilihe pādau bāṣpam uṣṇam mumoca ca

original: jālinā svastikāṅkena cakramadhyena pāṇinā /
analyzed: jālinā svastika aṅkena cakra madhyena pāṇinā

original: āmamarśa kumārastaṃ babhāṣe ca vayasyavat // Bc_6.54 //
analyzed: āmamarśa kumāraḥ tam babhāṣe ca vayasya vat

original: muñca kanthaka mā bāṣpaṃ darśiteyaṃ sadaśvatā /
analyzed: muñca kanthaka mā bāṣpam darśitā iyam sat aśva tā

original: mṛṣyatāṃ saphalaḥ śīghraṃ śramaste 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati // Bc_6.55 //
analyzed: mṛṣyatām sa phalaḥ śīghram śramaḥ te yam bhaviṣyati

original: maṇitsaruṃ chandakahastasaṃsthaṃ tataḥ sa dhīro niśitaṃ gṛhītvā
analyzed: maṇi tsarum chandaka hasta saṃstham tatas sa dhīraḥ niśitam gṛhītvā

original: kośādasiṃ kañcanabhakticitraṃ bilādivaśīviṣamudbabarha // Bc_6.56 //
analyzed: kośāt asim kañcana bhakti citram bila ādi vaśīviṣam

original: niṣkāsya taṃ cotpalapattranīlaṃ ciccheda citraṃ mukuṭaṃ sakeśam /
analyzed: niṣkāsya tam ca utpala pattra nīlam ciccheda citram mukuṭam sa keśam

original: vikīryamāṇāṃśukamantarīkṣe cikṣepa cainaṃ sarasīva haṃsam // Bc_6.57 //
analyzed: vikīryamāṇa aṃśukam antarīkṣe cikṣepa ca enam sarasi iva haṃsam

original: pūjābhilāṣeṇa ca bāhumānyāddivaukasastaṃ jagṛhuḥ praviddham /
analyzed: pūjā abhilāṣeṇa ca bāhumānyāt divaukasaḥ tam jagṛhuḥ praviddham

original: yathāvadenaṃ divi devasaṅghā divyairviśeṣairmahayāṃ ca cakruḥ // Bc_6.58 //
analyzed: yathāvat enam divi deva saṅghāḥ divyaiḥ viśeṣaiḥ mahayām ca cakruḥ

original: muktvā tvalaṃkārakalatravattāṃ śrīvipravāsaṃ śirasaśca kṛtvā /
analyzed: muktvā tu alaṃkāra kalatravat tām śrī vipravāsam śirasaḥ ca kṛtvā

original: dṛṣṭvāṃśukaṃ kāñcanahaṃsacinhaṃ vanyaṃ sa dhīro 'bhicakāṅkṣa vāsaḥ // Bc_6.59 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā aṃśukam kāñcana haṃsa cinham vanyam sa dhīraḥ vāsaḥ

original: tato mṛgavyādhanapurdivaukā bhāvaṃ viditvāsya viśuddhabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tatas mṛgavyādha napuḥ divaukāḥ bhāvam viditvā asya viśuddha bhāvaḥ

original: kāṣāyavastro 'bhiyayau samīpaṃ taṃ śākyarājaprabhavo 'bhyuvāca // Bc_6.60 //
analyzed: kāṣāya vastraḥ bhiyayau samīpam tam śākya rāja prabhavaḥ bhyuvāca

original: śivaṃ ca kāṣāyamṛṣidhvajaste na yujyate hiṃsramidaṃ dhanuśca /
analyzed: śivam ca kāṣāyam ṛṣi dhvajaḥ te na yujyate hiṃsram idam dhanuḥ ca

original: tatsaumya yadyasti na saktiratra mahyaṃ prayacchedamidaṃ gṛhāṇa // Bc_6.61 //
analyzed: tat saumya yadi asti na saktiḥ atra mahyam prayaccha idam idam gṛhāṇa

original: vyādho 'bravītkāmada kāmamārādanena viśvāsya mṛgāgnihanmi /
analyzed: vyādhaḥ bravīt kāma da viśvāsya

original: arthastu śakropama yadyanena hanta pratīcchānaya śuklametat // Bc_6.62 //
analyzed: arthaḥ tu śakra upama yadi anena hanta pratīccha ānaya śuklam etat

original: pareṇa harṣeṇa tataḥ sa vanyaṃ jagrāha vāso 'śukamutsasarja /
analyzed: pareṇa harṣeṇa tatas sa vanyam jagrāha vāso śukam utsasarja

original: vyādhastu divyaṃ vapureva bibhrattacchuklamādāya divaṃ jagāma // Bc_6.63 //
analyzed: vyādhaḥ tu divyam vapuḥ eva bibhrat tat śuklam ādāya divam jagāma

original: tataḥ kumāraśca sa cāśvagopastasmiṃstathā yāti visismiyāte /
analyzed: tatas kumāraḥ ca sa ca aśva gopaḥ tasmin tathā visismiyāte

original: āraṇyake vāsasi caiva bhūyastasminnakārṣṭā bahumānamāśu // Bc_6.64 //
analyzed: āraṇyake vāsasi ca eva bhūyas tasmin akārṣṭā bahu mānam āśu

original: chandaṃ tataḥ sāśrumukhaṃ visṛjya kāṣāyasaṃbhṛddhṛtikīrtibhṛtsaḥ /
analyzed: chandam tatas sa aśru mukham visṛjya kāṣāya saṃbhṛt dhṛti kīrti bhṛt saḥ

original: yenāśramastena yayau mahātmā saṃdhyābhrasaṃvīta ivoḍurājaḥ // Bc_6.65 //
analyzed: yena āśramaḥ tena yayau mahātmā saṃdhyā abhra saṃvītaḥ iva uḍurājaḥ

original: tatastathā bhartari rājyaniḥspṛhe tapovanaṃ yāti vivarṇavāsasi /
analyzed: tatas tathā bhartari rājya niḥspṛhe tapovanam yāti vivarṇa vāsasi

original: bhujau samutkṣipya tataḥ sa vājibhṛd bhṛśaṃ vicukrośa papāta ca kṣitau // Bc_6.66 //
analyzed: bhujau samutkṣipya tatas sa vāji bhṛt bhṛśam vicukrośa papāta ca kṣitau

original: vilokya bhūyaśca ruroda sasvaraṃ hayaṃ bhujābhyāmupaguhya kanthakam /
analyzed: vilokya bhūyas ca ruroda sa svaram hayam bhujābhyām upaguhya kanthakam

original: tato nirāśo vilapananmuhurmuhuryayau śarīreṇa puraṃ na cetasā // Bc_6.67 //
analyzed: tatas nirāśaḥ muhur muhur yayau śarīreṇa puram na cetasā

original: kvacitpradadhyau vilalāpa ca kvacit kvacitpracaskhāla papāta ca kvacit /
analyzed: kvacid pradadhyau vilalāpa ca kvacid kvacid pracaskhāla papāta ca kvacid

original: ato vrajan bhaktivaśena duḥkhitaścacāra bavhīravaśaḥ pathi kriyāḥ // Bc_6.68 //
analyzed: atas vrajan bhakti vaśena duḥkhitaḥ cacāra bavhīra vaśaḥ pathi kriyāḥ

original: iti buddhacarite mahākāvye chandakanivartano nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ sargaḥ // 6 //
analyzed: iti buddhacarite mahākāvye chandakanivartanaḥ nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ sargaḥ  /

original: tato visṛjyāśrumukhaṃ rudantaṃ chandaṃ vanacchandatayā nirāsthaḥ /
analyzed: tatas visṛjya aśru mukham rudantam chandam vana chanda tayā nirāsthaḥ

original: sarvārthasiddho vapuṣābhibhūya tamāśramaṃ siddha iva prapede // Bc_7.1 //
analyzed: sarvārthasiddhaḥ vapuṣā abhibhūya tam āśramam siddhaḥ iva prapede

original: sa rājasūnurmṛgarājagāmī mṛgājiraṃ tanmṛgavatpraviṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: sa rāja sūnuḥ mṛgarāja gāmī mṛga ajiram tat mṛga vat praviṣṭaḥ
