original: lakṣmīviyukto 'pi śarīralakṣmyā cakṣūṃṣi sarvāśramiṇāṃ jahāra // Bc_7.2 //
analyzed: lakṣmī viyuktaḥ u pi śarīra lakṣmyā cakṣūṃṣi sarva āśramiṇām jahāra

original: sthitā hi hastasthayugāstathaiva kautūhalāccakradharāḥ sadārāḥ /
analyzed: sthitāḥ hi hasta stha yugāḥ tathā eva kautūhalāt cakradharāḥ sa dārāḥ

original: tamindrakalpaṃ dadṛśurna jagmurdhuryā ivārdhāvanataiḥ śirobhiḥ // Bc_7.3 //
analyzed: tam indra kalpam dadṛśuḥ na jagmuḥ dhuryāḥ iva ardha avanataiḥ śirobhiḥ

original: viprāśca gatvā bahiridhmahetoḥ prāptāḥ samitpuṣpavitrahastāḥ /
analyzed: viprāḥ ca gatvā bahis idhma hetoḥ prāptāḥ samidh puṣpa vitra hastāḥ

original: tapaḥpradhānāḥ kṛtabuddhayo 'pi taṃ draṣṭumīyurna maṭhānabhīyuḥ // Bc_7.4 //
analyzed: tapaḥ pradhānāḥ kṛtabuddhayaḥ pi tam draṣṭum īyuḥ na maṭhān abhīyuḥ

original: hṛṣṭāśca kekā mumucurmayūrā dṛṣṭvāmbudaṃ nīlamivonnamantaḥ /
analyzed: hṛṣṭāḥ ca kekāḥ mumucuḥ mayūrāḥ dṛṣṭvā ambudam nīlam iva unnamantaḥ

original: śaṣpāṇi hitvābhimukhāśca tasthurmṛgāścalākṣā mṛgacāriṇaśca // Bc_7.5 //
analyzed: śaṣpāṇi hitvā abhimukhāḥ ca tasthuḥ mṛgāḥ cala akṣāḥ mṛga cāriṇaḥ ca

original: dṛṣṭvā tamikṣvākukulapradīpaṃ jvalantamudyantamivāṃśumantam /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tam ikṣvāku kula pradīpam jvalantam udyantam iva aṃśumantam

original: kṛte 'pi dohe janitapramodāḥ prasusruvurhomaduhaśca gāvaḥ // Bc_7.6 //
analyzed: kṛte pi dohe janita pramodāḥ prasusruvuḥ homa duhaḥ ca gāvaḥ

original: kaścidvasūnāmayamaṣṭamaḥ syātsyādāviśvanoranyataraścyuto vā /
analyzed: kaścid vasūnām ayam aṣṭamaḥ syāt syāt ā viśvanoḥ anyataraḥ cyutaḥ vā

original: ucceruruccairiti tatra vācastaddarśanādvismayajā munīnām // Bc_7.7 //
analyzed: ucceruḥ uccais iti tatra vācaḥ tad darśanāt vismaya jāḥ munīnām

original: lekharṣabhasyeva vapurdvitīyaṃ dhāmeva lokasya carācarasya /
analyzed: lekha ṛṣabhasya iva vapuḥ dvitīyam dhāma iva lokasya carācarasya

original: sa dyotayāmāsa vanaṃ hi kṛtsnaṃ yadṛcchayā sūrya ivāvatīrṇaḥ // Bc_7.8 //
analyzed: sa dyotayāmāsa vanam hi kṛtsnam yadṛcchayā sūryaḥ iva avatīrṇaḥ

original: tataḥ sa tairāśramibhiryathāvadabhyarcitaścopanimantritaśca /
analyzed: tatas sa taiḥ āśramibhiḥ yathāvat abhyarcitaḥ ca upanimantritaḥ ca

original: pratyarcayāṃ dharmabhṛto babhūva svareṇa sāmbho 'mbudharopamena // Bc_7.9 //
analyzed: dharma bhṛtaḥ babhūva svareṇa sa ambhaḥ mbudhara upamena

original: kīrṇaṃ tathā puṇyakṛtā janena svargābhikāmena vimokṣakāmaḥ /
analyzed: kīrṇam tathā puṇya kṛtā janena svarga abhikāmena vimokṣa kāmaḥ

original: tamāśramaṃ so 'nucacāra dhirastapāṃsi citrāṇi nirīkṣamāṇaḥ // Bc_7.10 //
analyzed: tam āśramam saḥ nucacāra dhiras tapāṃsi citrāṇi nirīkṣamāṇaḥ

original: tapovikārāṃśca nirīkṣya saumyastapovane tatra tapodhanānām /
analyzed: tapaḥ vikārān ca nirīkṣya saumyaḥ tapaḥ vane tatra tapodhanānām

original: tapasvinaṃ kaṃcidanuvrajantaṃ tattvaṃ vijijñāsuridaṃ babhāṣe // Bc_7.11 //
analyzed: tapasvinam kaṃcid anuvrajantam tattvam vijijñāsuḥ idam babhāṣe

original: tatpūrvamadyāśramadarśanaṃ me yāsmādimaṃ dharmavidhiṃ na jāne /
analyzed: tat pūrvam adya āśrama darśanam me yā asmāt imam dharma vidhim na jāne

original: tasmādbhavānarhati bhāṣituṃ me yo niścayo yatprati vaḥ pravṛttaḥ // Bc_7.12 //
analyzed: tasmāt bhavān arhati bhāṣitum me yaḥ niścayaḥ yat prati vaḥ pravṛttaḥ

original: tato dvijātiḥ sa tapovihāraḥ śākyarṣabhāyarṣabhavikramāya /
analyzed: tatas dvijātiḥ sa tapaḥ vihāraḥ śākya ṛṣabhāya ṛṣabha vikramāya

original: krameṇa tasmai kathayāṃcakāra tapoviśeṣāṃstapasaḥ phalaṃ ca // Bc_7.13 //
analyzed: krameṇa tasmai kathayāṃcakāra tapaḥ viśeṣān tapasaḥ phalam ca

original: agrāmyamannaṃ salile prarūḍhaṃ parṇīna toyaṃ phalamūlameva /
analyzed: agrāmyam annam salile prarūḍham toyam phala mūlam eva

original: yathāgamaṃ vṛttiriyaṃ munīnāṃ bhinnāstu te te tapasāṃ vikalpāḥ // Bc_7.14 //
analyzed: yathāgamam vṛttiḥ iyam munīnām bhinnāḥ tu te te tapasām vikalpāḥ

original: uñchena jīvanti khagā ivānye tṛṇāni kecinmṛgavaccaranti /
analyzed: uñchena jīvanti khagāḥ iva anye tṛṇāni kecid mṛga vat caranti

original: kecidbhujaṅgaiḥ saha vartayanti valmīkabhūtā vanamārutena // Bc_7.15 //
analyzed: kecid bhujaṅgaiḥ saha vartayanti valmīka bhūtāḥ vana mārutena

original: āśmaprayatnārjitavṛttayo 'nye kecitsvadantāpahatānnabhakṣāḥ /
analyzed: āśma prayatna arjita vṛttayaḥ nye kecid svadanta apahata anna bhakṣāḥ

original: kṛtvā parārtha śrapaṇaṃ tathānye kurvanti kāryaṃ yadi śeṣamasti // Bc_7.16 //
analyzed: kṛtvā śrapaṇam tathā anye kurvanti kāryam yadi śeṣam asti

original: kecijjalaklinnajaṭākalāpā dviḥ pāvakaṃ juvhati mantrapūrvam /
analyzed: kecid jala klinna jaṭā kalāpāḥ dvis pāvakam juvhati mantra pūrvam

original: mīnaiḥ samaṃ kecidapo vigāhya vasanti kūrmollikhitaiḥ śarīraiḥ // Bc_7.17 //
analyzed: mīnaiḥ samam kecid apaḥ vigāhya vasanti kūrma ullikhitaiḥ śarīraiḥ

original: evaṃvidhaiḥ kālacitaistapobhiḥ parairdivaṃ yāntyaparairnṛlokam /
analyzed: evaṃvidhaiḥ kāla citaiḥ tapobhiḥ paraiḥ divam yānti aparaiḥ nṛ lokam

original: duḥkhena mārgeṇa sukhaṃ hyupaiti sukhaṃ hi dharmasya vadanti mūlam // Bc_7.18 //
analyzed: duḥkhena mārgeṇa sukham hi upaiti sukham hi dharmasya vadanti mūlam

original: ityevamādi dvipadendravatsaḥ śrutvā vacastasya tapodhanasya /
analyzed: iti evamādi dvipada indra vatsaḥ śrutvā vacaḥ tasya tapodhanasya

original: adṛṣṭatattvo 'pi na saṃtutoṣa /
analyzed: adṛṣṭa tattvaḥ pi na saṃtutoṣa

original: śanairidaṃ cātmagataṃ babhāṣe // Bc_7.19 //
analyzed: śanais idam ca ātma gatam babhāṣe

original: duḥkhātmakaṃ naikavidhaṃ tapaśca svargapradhānaṃ tapasaḥ phalaṃ ca /
analyzed: duḥkha ātmakam na ekavidham tapaḥ ca svarga pradhānam tapasaḥ phalam ca

original: lokāśca sarve pariṇāmavantaḥ svalpe śramaḥ khalvayamāśramāṇām // Bc_7.20 //
analyzed: lokāḥ ca sarve pariṇāmavantaḥ su alpe śramaḥ khalu ayam āśramāṇām

original: priyāṃśca bandhūnviṣayāṃśca hitvā ye svargahetorniyamaṃ caranti /
analyzed: priyān ca bandhūn viṣayān ca hitvā ye svarga hetoḥ niyamam caranti

original: te viprayuktāḥ khalu gantukāmā mahattaraṃ bandhanameva bhūyaḥ // Bc_7.21 //
analyzed: te viprayuktāḥ khalu gantu kāmāḥ mahattaram bandhanam eva bhūyaḥ

original: kāyaklamairyaśca tapo 'bhidhānaiḥ pravṛttimakāṅkṣati kāmahetoḥ /
analyzed: kāya klamaiḥ yaḥ ca tapaḥ bhidhānaiḥ pravṛttim akāṅkṣati kāma hetoḥ

original: saṃsāradoṣānaparīkṣamāṇo duḥkhena so 'nvicchati duḥkhameva // Bc_7.22 //
analyzed: saṃsāra doṣān a parīkṣamāṇaḥ duḥkhena saḥ nu icchati duḥkham eva

original: trāsaśca nityaṃ maraṇātprajānāṃ yatnena cecchanti punaḥprasūtim /
analyzed: trāsaḥ ca nityam maraṇāt prajānām yatnena ca icchanti punaḥprasūtim

original: satyāṃ pravṛttau niyataśca mṛtyustatraiva magnā yata eva bhītāḥ // Bc_7.23 //
analyzed: satyām pravṛttau niyataḥ ca mṛtyuḥ tatra eva magnāḥ yatas eva bhītāḥ

original: ihārthameke praviśanti khedaṃ svargārthamanye śramamāpnuvanti /
analyzed: iha artham eke praviśanti khedam svarga artham anye śramam āpnuvanti

original: sukhārthamāśākṛpaṇo 'kṛtārthaḥ patatyanarthe khalu jīvalokaḥ // Bc_7.24 //
analyzed: sukha artham āśā kṛpaṇaḥ kṛtārthaḥ patati anarthe khalu jīva lokaḥ

original: na khalvayaṃ garhita eva yatno yo hīnamṛtsṛjya viśeṣagāmi /
analyzed: na khalu ayam garhitaḥ eva yatnaḥ yaḥ hīna mṛd sṛjya viśeṣa gāmi

original: prājñaiḥ samānena pariśrameṇa kāryaṃ tu tadyatra punarna kāryam // Bc_7.25 //
analyzed: prājñaiḥ samānena pariśrameṇa kāryam tu tat yatra punar na kāryam

original: śarīrapīḍā tu yadīha dharmaḥ sukhaṃ śarīrasya bhavatyadharmaḥ /
analyzed: śarīra pīḍā tu yadi iha dharmaḥ sukham śarīrasya bhavati adharmaḥ

original: dharmeṇa cāpnoti sukhaṃ paratra tasmādadharma phalatīha dharmaḥ // Bc_7.26 //
analyzed: dharmeṇa ca āpnoti sukham paratra tasmāt adharma phalati iha dharmaḥ

original: yataḥ śarīraṃ manaso vaśena pravartate cāpi nivartate ca /
analyzed: yatas śarīram manasaḥ vaśena pravartate ca api nivartate ca

original: yukto damaścetasa eva tasmāccittādṛte kāṣṭhasamaṃ śarīram // Bc_7.27 //
analyzed: yuktaḥ damaḥ cetasaḥ eva tasmāt cittāt ṛte kāṣṭha samam śarīram

original: āhāraśuddhyā yadi puṇyamiṣṭaṃ tasmānmṛgānāmapi puṇyamasti /
analyzed: āhāra śuddhyā yadi puṇyam iṣṭam tasmāt mṛgānām api puṇyam asti

original: ye cāpi bāhyāḥ puruṣāḥ phalebhyo bhāgyāparādhena parāṅmukhārthāḥ // Bc_7.28 //
analyzed: ye ca api bāhyāḥ puruṣāḥ phalebhyaḥ bhāgya aparādhena parāṅmukha arthāḥ

original: duḥkhe 'bhisaṃdhistvatha puṇyahetuḥ sukhe 'pi kāryo nanu so 'bhisaṃdhiḥ /
analyzed: duḥkhe kāryaḥ nanu saḥ

original: atha pramāṇaṃ na sukhe 'bhisaṃdhirduḥkhe pramāṇaṃ nanu nābhisaṃdhiḥ // Bc_7.29 //
analyzed: atha pramāṇam na sukhe bhisaṃdhiḥ duḥkhe pramāṇam nanu na abhisaṃdhiḥ

original: tathaiva ye karmaviśuddhihetoḥ spṛśantyapastīrthamiti pravṛttāḥ /
analyzed: tathā eva ye karma viśuddhi hetoḥ spṛśanti apaḥ tīrtham iti pravṛttāḥ

original: tatrāpi toṣo hṛdi kevalo 'yaṃ na pāvayiṣyanti hi pāpamāpaḥ // Bc_7.30 //
analyzed: tatra api toṣaḥ hṛdi kevalaḥ yam na pāvayiṣyanti hi pāpam āpaḥ

original: spṛṣṭaṃ hi yadyadguṇavadbhirambhastattatpṛthivyāṃ yadi tīrthamiṣṭam /
analyzed: spṛṣṭam hi yat yat guṇavadbhiḥ ambhaḥ tat tat pṛthivyām yadi tīrtham iṣṭam

original: tasmādguṇāneva paraimi tīrthamāpastu niḥsaṃśayamāpa eva // Bc_7.31 //
analyzed: tasmāt guṇān eva paraimi tīrtham āpaḥ tu niḥsaṃśayam āpaḥ eva

original: iti sma tattadbahuyuktiyuktaṃ jagāda cāstaṃ ca yayau vivasvān /
analyzed: iti sma tat tat bahu yukti yuktam jagāda ca astam ca yayau vivasvān

original: tato havirdhūmavivarṇavṛkṣaṃ tapaḥpraśāntaṃ sa vanaṃ viveśa // Bc_7.32 //
analyzed: tatas haviḥ dhūma vivarṇa vṛkṣam tapaḥ praśāntam sa vanam viveśa

original: abhyuddhṛtaprajvalitāgnihotraṃ kṛtābhiṣekarṣijanāvakirṇam /
analyzed: abhyuddhṛta prajvalita agnihotram kṛta abhiṣeka ṛṣi jana avakirṇam

original: jāpyasvanākūjitadevakoṣṭhaṃ dharmasya karmāntamiva pravṛttam // Bc_7.33 //
analyzed: jāpya svana ākūjita deva koṣṭham dharmasya karmāntam iva pravṛttam

original: kāścinniśāstatra niśākarābhaḥ parīkṣamāṇaśca tapāṃsyuvāsa /
analyzed: kāścid niśāḥ tatra niśākara ābhaḥ parīkṣamāṇaḥ ca tapāṃsi uvāsa

original: sarva parikṣepya tapaśca matvā tasmāttapaḥkṣetratalājjagāma // Bc_7.34 //
analyzed: parikṣepya tapaḥ ca matvā tasmāt tapaḥ kṣetra talāt jagāma

original: anvavrajannāśramiṇastatastaṃ tadrūpamāhātmyagatairmanobhiḥ /
analyzed: anvavrajan āśramiṇaḥ tatas tam tad rūpa māhātmya gataiḥ manobhiḥ

original: deśādanāryairabhibhūyamānānmaharṣayo dharmamivāpayāntam // Bc_7.35 //
analyzed: deśāt anāryaiḥ abhibhūyamānāt mahā ṛṣayaḥ dharmam iva apayāntam

original: tato jaṭāvalkalacīrakhelāṃstapodhanāṃścaiva sa tāndadarśa /
analyzed: tatas jaṭā valkala cīra khelān tapodhanān ca eva sa tān dadarśa

original: tapāṃsi caiṣāmanurudhyamānastasthau śive śrīmati vṛkṣamūle // Bc_7.36 //
analyzed: tapāṃsi ca eṣām anurudhyamānaḥ tasthau śive śrīmati vṛkṣa mūle

original: athopasṛtyāśramavāsinastaṃ manuṣyavarya parivārya tasthuḥ /
analyzed: athā upasṛtya āśrama vāsinaḥ tam manuṣya varya parivārya tasthuḥ

original: vṛddhaśca teṣāṃ bahumānapūrvaṃ kalena sāmnā giramityuvāca // Bc_7.37 //
analyzed: vṛddhaḥ ca teṣām bahu māna pūrvam kalena sāmnā giram iti uvāca

original: tvayyāgate pūrṇa ivāśramo 'bhūtsaṃpadyate śūnya eva prayāte /
analyzed: tvayi āgate pūrṇaḥ iva āśramaḥ bhūt saṃpadyate śūnye eva prayāte

original: tasmādimaṃ nārhasi tāta hātuṃ jijīviṣordehamiveṣṭamāyuḥ // Bc_7.38 //
analyzed: tasmāt imam nā arhasi tāta hātum jijīviṣoḥ deham iva iṣṭam āyuḥ

original: brahmarṣirājarṣisurarṣijuṣṭaḥ puṇyaḥ samīpe himavān hi śailaḥ /
analyzed: brahmarṣi rājarṣi surarṣi juṣṭaḥ puṇyaḥ samīpe himavān hi śailaḥ

original: tapāṃsi tānyeva tapodhanānāṃ yatsaṃnikarṣādbahulībhavanti // Bc_7.39 //
analyzed: tapāṃsi tāni eva tapodhanānām yad saṃnikarṣāt bahulībhavanti

original: tīrthāni puṇyāyānyabhitastathaiva sopānabhūtāni nabhastalasya
analyzed: tīrthāni puṇyāyāni abhitas tathā eva sopāna bhūtāni nabhastalasya

original: juṣṭāni dharmātmabhirātmavadbhirdevarṣibhiścaiva maharṣibhiśca // Bc_7.40 //
analyzed: juṣṭāni dharma ātmabhiḥ ātmavadbhiḥ deva ṛṣibhiḥ ca eva mahā ṛṣibhiḥ ca

original: itaśca bhūyaḥ kṣamamuttaraiva diksevituṃ dharmīvaśeṣahetoḥ /
analyzed: itas ca bhūyas kṣamam uttarā eva diś sevitum dharmī vaśeṣa hetoḥ

original: na tu kṣamaṃ dakṣiṇato budhena padaṃ bhavedekamapi prayātum // Bc_7.41 //
analyzed: na tu kṣamam dakṣiṇatas budhena padam bhavet ekam api prayātum

original: tapovane 'sminnatha niṣkriyo vā saṃkīrṇadharmāpatito 'śucirvā /
analyzed: tapaḥ vane smin atha niṣkriyaḥ vā śuciḥ vā

original: dṛṣṭastvayā yena na te vivatsā tadbrūhi yāvadrucito 'stu vāsaḥ // Bc_7.42 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ tvayā yena na te vivatsā tat brūhi yāvat rucitaḥ stu vāsaḥ

original: ime hi vāñchanti tapaḥsahāyaṃ taponidhānapratīmaṃ bhavantam /
analyzed: ime hi vāñchanti tapaḥ sahāyam tapaḥ nidhāna pratīmam bhavantam

original: vāsastvayā hīndrasamena sārdha bṛhaspaterabhyudayāvahaḥ syāt // Bc_7.43 //
analyzed: vāsaḥ tvayā hi indra samena sārdha bṛhaspateḥ abhyudaya āvahaḥ syāt

original: ityevamukte sa tapasvimadhye tapasvimukhyena manīṣimukhyaḥ /
analyzed: iti evam ukte sa tapasvi madhye tapasvi mukhyena manīṣi mukhyaḥ

original: bhavapraṇāśāya kṛtapratijñaḥ svaṃ bhāvāmantargatamācacakṣe // Bc_7.44 //
analyzed: bhava praṇāśāya kṛta pratijñaḥ svam bhāvām antargatam ācacakṣe

original: ṛjvātmanāṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ munīnāmiṣṭātithitvātsvajanopamānām /
analyzed: ṛju ātmanām dharma bhṛtām munīnām iṣṭa atithi tvāt sva jana upamānām

original: evaṃvidhairmā prati bhāvajātaiḥ prītiḥ parā me janitaśca mānaḥ // Bc_7.45 //
analyzed: evaṃvidhaiḥ mā prati bhāva jātaiḥ prītiḥ parā me janitaḥ ca mānaḥ

original: snigdhābhirābhirhṛdayaṃgamābhiḥ samāsataḥ snāta ivāsmi vāgbhiḥ /
analyzed: snigdhābhiḥ ābhiḥ hṛdayaṃgamābhiḥ samāsatas snātaḥ iva asmi vāgbhiḥ

original: ratiśca me dharmanavagrahasya vispanditā saṃprati bhūya eva // Bc_7.46 //
analyzed: ratiḥ ca me dharma nava grahasya vispanditā saṃprati bhūyas eva

original: evaṃ pravṛttān bhavataḥ śaraṇyānatīva saṃdarśitapakṣapātān /
analyzed: evam pravṛttān bhavataḥ śaraṇyān atīva saṃdarśita pakṣapātān

original: yāsyāmi hitveti mamāpi duḥkhaṃ yathaiva bandhūṃstyajatastathaiva // Bc_7.47 //
analyzed: yāsyāmi hitvā iti mama api duḥkham yathā eva bandhūn tyajataḥ tathā eva

original: svargāya yuṣmākamayaṃ tu dharmo mamābhilāṣastvapunarbhavāya /
analyzed: svargāya yuṣmākam ayam tu dharmaḥ mama abhilāṣaḥ tu apunarbhavāya

original: asminvane yena na me vivatsā bhinnaḥ pravṛttyā hi nivṛttidharmaḥ // Bc_7.48 //
analyzed: asmin vane yena na me vivatsā bhinnaḥ pravṛttyā hi nivṛtti dharmaḥ

original: tannāratirme na parāpacāro vanādito yena parivrajāmi /
analyzed: tat na aratiḥ me na para apacāraḥ vanāt itas yena parivrajāmi

original: dharme sthitāḥ pūrvayugānurūpe sarve bhavanto hi maharṣikalpāḥ // Bc_7.49 //
analyzed: dharme sthitāḥ pūrva yuga anurūpe sarve bhavantaḥ hi mahā ṛṣi kalpāḥ

original: tato vacaḥ sūnṛtamarthavacca suślakṣṇamojasvi ca garvita ca /
analyzed: tatas vacaḥ sūnṛtam arthavat ca su ślakṣṇam ojasvi ca garvita ca

original: śrutvā kumārasya tapasvinaste viśeṣayuktaṃ bahumānamīyuḥ // Bc_7.50 //
analyzed: śrutvā kumārasya tapasvinaḥ te viśeṣa yuktam bahu mānam īyuḥ

original: kaściddvijastatra tu bhasmaśāyī prāṃśuḥ śikhī dāravacīravāsāḥ /
analyzed: kaścid dvijaḥ tatra tu bhasma śāyī prāṃśuḥ śikhī dārava cīra vāsāḥ

original: āpiṅgalākṣastanudīrghaghoṇaḥ kuṇḍaikahasto giramityuvāca // Bc_7.51 //
analyzed: āpiṅgala akṣaḥ tanu dīrgha ghoṇaḥ kuṇḍa eka hastaḥ giram iti uvāca

original: dhīmannudāraḥ khalu niścayaste yastvaṃ yuvā janmani dṛṣṭadoṣaḥ /
analyzed: dhīman udāraḥ khalu niścayaḥ te yaḥ tvam yuvā janmani dṛṣṭa doṣaḥ

original: svargāpavargau hi vicārya samyagyasyāpavarge matirasti so 'sti // Bc_7.52 //
analyzed: svarga apavargau hi vicārya samyak yasya apavarge matiḥ asti sā u sti

original: yajñaistapobhirniyamaiśca taistaiḥ svarga yiyāsanti hi rāgavantaḥ /
analyzed: yajñaiḥ tapobhiḥ niyamaiḥ ca taiḥ taiḥ svarga yiyāsanti hi rāgavantaḥ

original: rāgeṇa sārdha ripuṇeva yuddhvā mokṣaṃ parīpsanti tu sattvavantaḥ // Bc_7.53 //
analyzed: rāgeṇa sārdha ripuṇā iva yuddhvā mokṣam parīpsanti tu sattvavantaḥ

original: tadbuddhireṣā yadi niścitā te tūrṇaṃ bhavān gacchatu vindhyakoṣṭham /
analyzed: tad buddhiḥ eṣā yadi niścitā te tūrṇam bhavān gacchatu vindhyakoṣṭham

original: asau munistatra vasatyarāḍo yo naiṣṭhike śreyasi labdhacakṣuḥ // Bc_7.54 //
analyzed: asau muniḥ tatra vasati arāḍaḥ yaḥ naiṣṭhike śreyasi labdha cakṣuḥ

original: tasmādbhavāñcchroṣyati tattvamārga satyāṃ rucau saṃpratipatsyate ca /
analyzed: tasmāt bhavān śroṣyati tattva mārga satyām rucau saṃpratipatsyate ca

original: yathā tu paśyāmi matistathaiṣā tasyāpi yāsyatyavadhūya buddhim // Bc_7.55 //
analyzed: yathā tu paśyāmi matiḥ tathā eṣā tasya api yāsyati avadhūya buddhim

original: spaṣṭoccaghoṇaṃ vipulāyatākṣaṃ /
analyzed: spaṣṭa ucca ghoṇam vipula āyata akṣam

original: tāmrādharauṣṭhaṃ sitatīkṣaṇadaṃṣṭram /
analyzed: tāmra adhara oṣṭham sita tīkṣaṇa daṃṣṭram

original: idaṃ hi vaktuṃ tanuraktajivhaṃ jñeyārṇavaṃ pāsyati kṛtsnameva // Bc_7.56 //
analyzed: idam hi vaktum tanu rakta jivham jñeya arṇavam pāsyati kṛtsnam eva

original: gambhīratā yā bhavatastvagādhā yā dīptatā yāni ca lakṣaṇāni /
analyzed: gambhīra tā yā bhavataḥ tu agādhā yā dīpta tā yāni ca lakṣaṇāni

original: ācāryakaṃ prāpsyasi tatpṛthivyāṃ yannarṣibhiḥ pūrvayuge 'pyavāptam // Bc_7.57 //
analyzed: ācāryakam prāpsyasi tat pṛthivyām yat na ṛṣibhiḥ pūrva yuge

original: paramamiti tato nṛpātmajastamṛṣijanaṃ pratinandya niryayau /
analyzed: paramam iti tatas nṛpa ātmajaḥ tam ṛṣi janam pratinandya niryayau

original: vidhivadanuvidhāya te 'pi taṃ praviviśurāśramiṇastapovanam // Bc_7.58 //
analyzed: vidhivat anuvidhāya te pi tam praviviśuḥ āśramiṇaḥ tapaḥ vanam

original: iti buddhacarite mahākāvye tapovanapraveśo nāma saptamaḥ sargaḥ // 7 //
analyzed: iti buddhacarite mahākāvye tapovanapraveśaḥ nāma saptamaḥ sargaḥ

original: tatasturaṅgāvacaraḥ sa durmanāstathā vanaṃ bhartari nirmame gate /
analyzed: tatas turaṅga avacaraḥ sa durmanāḥ tathā vanam bhartari nirmame gate

original: cakāra yatnaṃ pathi śokanigrahe tathāpi caivāśru na tasya cikṣiye // Bc_8.1 //
analyzed: cakāra yatnam pathi śoka nigrahe tathā api ca eva aśru na tasya cikṣiye

original: yamekarātreṇa tu bharturājñayā jagāma mārga saha tena vājinā /
analyzed: yam eka rātreṇa tu bhartuḥ ājñayā jagāma mārga saha tena vājinā

original: iyāya bharturvirahaṃ vicintayaṃstameva panthānamahobhiraṣṭabhiḥ // Bc_8.2 //
analyzed: iyāya bhartuḥ viraham vicintayan tam eva panthānam ahobhiḥ aṣṭabhiḥ

original: hayaśca saujā vicacāra kanthakastatāma bhāvena babhūva nirmadaḥ /
analyzed: hayaḥ ca sa ojāḥ vicacāra kanthakaḥ tatāma bhāvena babhūva nirmadaḥ

original: alaṃkṛtaścāpi tathaiva bhūṣaṇairabhūdgataśrīriva tena varjitaḥ // Bc_8.3 //
analyzed: alaṃkṛtaḥ ca api tathā eva bhūṣaṇaiḥ abhūt gata śrīḥ iva tena varjitaḥ

original: nivṛtya caivābhimukhastapovanaṃ bhṛśaṃ jiheṣe karuṇaṃ muhurmuhuḥ /
analyzed: nivṛtya ca eva abhimukhaḥ tapaḥ vanam bhṛśam jiheṣe karuṇam muhur muhur

original: kṣudhānvito 'pyadhvani śaṣpamambu vā yathā purā nābhinanda nādade // Bc_8.4 //
analyzed: kṣudhā anvitaḥ pi adhvani śaṣpam ambu vā yathā purā na abhinanda na ādade

original: tato vihīnaṃ kapilāvhayaṃ puraṃ mahātmanā tena jagaddhitātmanā /
analyzed: tatas vihīnam kapilāvhayam puram mahātmanā tena jagat hita ātmanā

original: krameṇa tau śūnyamivopajagmaturdivākareṇeva vinākṛtaṃ nabhaḥ // Bc_8.5 //
analyzed: krameṇa tau śūnyam iva upajagmatuḥ divākareṇa iva vinākṛtam nabhaḥ

original: sapuṇḍarīkairapi śobhitaṃ jalairalaṃkṛtaṃ puṣpadharairnagairapi /
analyzed: sa puṇḍarīkaiḥ api śobhitam jalaiḥ alaṃkṛtam puṣpa dharaiḥ nagaiḥ api

original: tadeva tasyopavanaṃ vanopamaṃ gatapraharṣairna rarāja nāgaraiḥ // Bc_8.6 //
analyzed: tat eva tasya upavanam vana upamam gata praharṣaiḥ na rarāja nāgaraiḥ

original: tato bhramadbhirdiśi dīnamānasairanujjvalairbāṣpahatekṣaṇairnaraiḥ /
analyzed: tatas bhramadbhiḥ diśi dīna mānasaiḥ anujjvalaiḥ bāṣpa hata īkṣaṇaiḥ naraiḥ

original: nirvāyamāṇāviva tāvubhau puraṃ śanairapasnātamivābhijagmatuḥ // Bc_8.7 //
analyzed: nirvāyamāṇau iva tau ubhau puram śanais apasnātam iva abhijagmatuḥ

original: niśāmya ca srastaśarīragāminau vināgatau śākyakularṣabheṇa tau /
analyzed: niśāmya ca srasta śarīra gāminau vinā āgatau śākya kula ṛṣabheṇa tau

original: mumoca bāṣpaṃ pathi nāgaro janaḥ pura rathe dāśaratherivāgate // Bc_8.8 //
analyzed: mumoca bāṣpam pathi nāgaraḥ janaḥ pura rathe dāśaratheḥ iva āgate

original: atha bruvantaḥ samupetamanyavo janāḥ pathi cchandakamāgatāśravaḥ /
analyzed: atha bruvantaḥ samupeta manyavaḥ janāḥ pathi chandakam āgata aśravaḥ

original: kva rājaputraḥ purarāṣṭranandano hṛtastvayāsāviti pṛṣṭhato 'nvayuḥ // Bc_8.9 //
analyzed: kva rāja putraḥ pura rāṣṭra nandanaḥ hṛtaḥ tvayā asau iti pṛṣṭhatas nvayuḥ

original: tataḥ sa tān bhaktimato 'bravījjanānnarendraputraṃ na parityajāmyaham /
analyzed: tatas sa tān bhaktimataḥ bravīt janān narendra putram na parityajāmi aham

original: rudannahaṃ tena tu nirjane vane gṛhasthaveśaśca visarjitāviti // Bc_8.10 //
analyzed: rudan aham tena tu nirjane vane gṛhastha veśaḥ ca visarjitau iti

original: idaṃ vacastasya niśamya te janāḥ suduṣkaraṃ khalviti niścayaṃ yayuḥ /
analyzed: idam vacaḥ tasya niśamya te janāḥ su duṣkaram khalu iti niścayam yayuḥ

original: pataddhi jahruḥ salilaṃ na netrajaṃ mano nininduśca phalotthamātmanaḥ // Bc_8.11 //
analyzed: patat hi jahruḥ salilam na netra jam manaḥ nininduḥ ca phala uttham ātmanaḥ

original: athocuradyaiva viśāma tadvanaṃ gataḥ sa yatra dviparājavikramaḥ /
analyzed: athā ūcuḥ adyā eva viśāma tat vanam gataḥ sa yatra dvipa rāja vikramaḥ

original: jijīviṣā nāsti hi tena no vinā yathendriyāṇāṃ vigame śarīriṇām // Bc_8.12 //
analyzed: jijīviṣā nā asti hi tena naḥ vinā yathā indriyāṇām vigame śarīriṇām

original: idaṃ puraṃ tena vivarjitaṃ vanaṃ vanaṃ ca tattena samanvitaṃ puram /
analyzed: idam puram tena vivarjitam vanam vanam ca tat tena samanvitam puram

original: na śobhate tena hi no vinā puraṃ marutvatā vṛtravadhe yathā divam // Bc_8.13 //
analyzed: na śobhate tena hi naḥ vinā puram marutvatā vṛtra vadhe yathā divam

original: punaḥ kumāro vinivṛtta ityatho gavākṣamālāḥ pratipedire 'ṅganāḥ /
analyzed: punar kumāraḥ vinivṛttaḥ iti atho gavākṣa mālāḥ pratipedire ṅganāḥ

original: viviktapṛṣṭhaṃ ca niśāmya vājinaṃ punargavākṣāṇi pidhāya cukruśuḥ // Bc_8.14 //
analyzed: vivikta pṛṣṭham ca niśāmya vājinam punar gavākṣāṇi pidhāya cukruśuḥ

original: praviṣṭadīkṣastu sutopalabdhaye vratena śokena ca khinnamānasaḥ /
analyzed: praviṣṭa dīkṣaḥ tu suta upalabdhaye vratena śokena ca khinna mānasaḥ

original: jajāpa devāyatane narādhipaścakāra tāstāśca yathāśayāḥ kriyāḥ // Bc_8.15 //
analyzed: jajāpa devāyatane narādhipaḥ cakāra tāḥ tāḥ ca yathā āśayāḥ kriyāḥ

original: tataḥ sa bāṣpapratipūrṇalocanasturaṅgamādāya turaṅgamānugaḥ /
analyzed: tatas sa bāṣpa pratipūrṇa locanaḥ turaṅgam ādāya turaṅgama anugaḥ

original: viveśa śokābhihato nṛpakṣayaṃ yudhāpinīte ripuṇeva bhartari // Bc_8.16 //
analyzed: viveśa śoka abhihataḥ nṛpa kṣayam yudhā apinīte ripuṇā iva bhartari

original: vigāhamānaśca narendramandiraṃ vilokayannaśruvahena cakṣuṣā /
analyzed: vigāhamānaḥ ca narendra mandiram vilokayan aśru vahena cakṣuṣā

original: svareṇa puṣṭena rurāva kanthako janāya duḥkhaṃ prativedayanniva // Bc_8.17 //
analyzed: svareṇa puṣṭena rurāva kanthakaḥ janāya duḥkham prativedayan iva

original: tataḥ khagāśca kṣayamadhyagocarāḥ samīpabaddhāsturagāśca satkṛtāḥ /
analyzed: tatas khagāḥ ca kṣaya madhya gocarāḥ samīpa baddhāḥ turagāḥ ca satkṛtāḥ

original: hayasya tasya pratisasvanuḥ svanaṃ narendrasūnorupayānaśaṅkinaḥ // Bc_8.18 //
analyzed: hayasya tasya pratisasvanuḥ svanam narendra sūnoḥ upayāna śaṅkinaḥ

original: janāśca harṣatiśayena vañcitā janādhipāntaḥpurasaṃnikarṣagāḥ /
analyzed: janāḥ ca harṣa atiśayena vañcitāḥ janādhipa antaḥpura saṃnikarṣa gāḥ

original: yathā hayaḥ kanthaka eṣa heṣate dhruvaṃ kumāro viśatīti menire // Bc_8.19 //
analyzed: yathā hayaḥ kanthakaḥ eṣa heṣate dhruvam kumāraḥ viśati iti menire

original: atipraharṣādatha śokamūrchitāḥ kumārasaṃdarśanalolalocanāḥ /
analyzed: ati praharṣāt atha śoka mūrchitāḥ kumāra saṃdarśana lola locanāḥ

original: gṛhādviniścakramurāśayā striyaḥ śaratpayodādiva vidyutaścalāḥ // Bc_8.20 //
analyzed: gṛhāt viniścakramuḥ āśayā striyaḥ śarad payodāt iva vidyutaḥ calāḥ

original: vilambakeśyo malināṃśukāmbarā nirañjanairbāṣpahatekṣaṇairmukhaiḥ /
analyzed: vilamba keśyaḥ malina aṃśuka ambarāḥ nirañjanaiḥ bāṣpa hata īkṣaṇaiḥ mukhaiḥ

original: striyo na rejurmṛjayā vinākṛtā divīva tārā rajanīkṣayāruṇāḥ // Bc_8.21 //
analyzed: striyaḥ na rejuḥ mṛjayā vinākṛtāḥ divi iva tārāḥ rajanī kṣaya aruṇāḥ

original: araktatāmraiścaraṇairanūpurairakuṇḍalairārjavakandharairmukhaiḥ /
analyzed: a rakta tāmraiḥ caraṇaiḥ anūpuraiḥ akuṇḍalaiḥ ārjava kandharaiḥ mukhaiḥ

original: svabhāvapīnairjaghanairamekhalairahārayoktrairmuṣitairiva stanaiḥ // Bc_8.22 //
analyzed: svabhāva pīnaiḥ jaghanaiḥ amekhalaiḥ ahāra yoktraiḥ muṣitaiḥ iva stanaiḥ

original: nirīkṣya tā bāṣpaparītalocanā nirāśrayaṃ chandakamaśvameva ca /
analyzed: nirīkṣya tāḥ bāṣpa parīta locanāḥ nirāśrayam chandakam aśvam eva ca

original: viṣaṇṇavaktrā rurudurvarāṅganā vanāntare gāva ivarṣabhojjhitāḥ // Bc_8.23 //
analyzed: viṣaṇṇa vaktrāḥ ruruduḥ vara aṅganāḥ vana antare gāvaḥ iva ṛṣabha ujjhitāḥ

original: tataḥ sabāṣpā mahīṣī mahīpateḥ pranaṣṭavatsā mahiṣīva vatsalā /
analyzed: tatas sa bāṣpā mahīṣī mahīpateḥ pranaṣṭa vatsā mahiṣī iva vatsalā

original: pragṛhya bāhū nipapāta gautamī vilolaparṇā kadalīva kāñcanī // Bc_8.24 //
analyzed: pragṛhya bāhū nipapāta gautamī vilola parṇā kadalī iva kāñcanī

original: hatatviṣo 'nyāḥ śithilāṃsabāhavaḥ striyo viṣādena vicetanā iva /
analyzed: hata tviṣaḥ nyāḥ śithila aṃsa bāhavaḥ striyaḥ viṣādena vicetanāḥ iva

original: na cukruśurnāśru jahurna śaśvasurna celurāsurlikhitā iva sthitāḥ // Bc_8.25 //
analyzed: na cukruśuḥ na aśru jahuḥ na śaśvasuḥ na celuḥ āsuḥ likhitāḥ iva sthitāḥ

original: adhīramanyāḥ patiśokamūrcchitā vilocanaprasravaṇairmukhaiḥ striyaḥ /
analyzed: adhīram anyāḥ pati śoka mūrcchitāḥ vilocana prasravaṇaiḥ mukhaiḥ striyaḥ

original: siṣiñcire proṣitacandanān stanāndharādharaḥ prasravaṇairivopalān // Bc_8.26 //
analyzed: siṣiñcire proṣita candanān stanān dharādharaḥ prasravaṇaiḥ iva upalān

original: mukhaiśca tāsāṃ nāyanāmbutāḍitaiṃ rarāja tadrājaniveśanaṃ tadā /
analyzed: mukhaiḥ ca tāsām nāyana ambu tāḍitaiḥ rarāja tad rāja niveśanam tadā

original: navāmbukāle 'mbudavṛṣṭitāḍitaiḥ sravajjalaistāmarasairyathā saraḥ // Bc_8.27 //
analyzed: nava ambu kāle mbuda vṛṣṭi tāḍitaiḥ sravat jalaiḥ tāmarasaiḥ yathā saraḥ

original: suvṛttapiṇāḍagulibhirnirantarairabhūṣaṇairgūḍhasirairvarāṅganāḥ /
analyzed: su vṛtta piṇāḍagulibhiḥ nirantaraiḥ abhūṣaṇaiḥ gūḍha siraiḥ vara aṅganāḥ

original: urāṃsi jaghnuḥ kamalopamaiḥ karaiḥ svapallavairvātacalā latā iva // Bc_8.28 //
analyzed: urāṃsi jaghnuḥ kamala upamaiḥ karaiḥ sva pallavaiḥ vāta calāḥ latāḥ iva

original: karaprahārapracalaiśca tā babhustathāpi nāryaḥ sahitonnataiḥ stanaiḥ /
analyzed: kara prahāra pracalaiḥ ca tāḥ babhuḥ tathā api nāryaḥ sahita unnataiḥ stanaiḥ

original: vanānilāghūrṇitapadmakampitai rathāṅganāmnāṃ mithunairivāpagāḥ // Bc_8.29 //
analyzed: vana anila āghūrṇita padma kampitaiḥ rathāṅga nāmnām mithunaiḥ iva āpagāḥ

original: yathā ca vakṣāṃsi karairapīḍayaṃstathaiva vakṣobhirapīḍayan karān /
analyzed: yathā ca vakṣāṃsi karaiḥ apīḍayan tathā eva vakṣobhiḥ apīḍayan karān

original: akārayaṃstatra parasparaṃ vyathāḥ karāgravakṣāṃsyabalā dayālasāḥ // Bc_8.30 //
analyzed: akārayan tatra parasparam vyathāḥ kara agra vakṣāṃsi abalāḥ dayā alasāḥ

original: tatastu roṣapraviraktalocanā viṣādasaṃbandhikaṣāyagadgadam /
analyzed: tatas tu roṣa pravirakta locanā viṣāda saṃbandhi kaṣāya gadgadam

original: uvāca niśvāsacalatpayodharā vigāḍhaśokāśrudharā yaśodharā // Bc_8.31 //
analyzed: uvāca niśvāsa calat payodharā vigāḍha śoka aśru dharā yaśodharā

original: niśi prasuptāmavaśāṃ vihāya māṃ gataḥ kva sa chandaka manmanorathaḥ /
analyzed: niśi prasuptām avaśām vihāya mām gataḥ kva sa chandaka mad manorathaḥ

original: upāgate ca tvayi kanthake ca me samaṃ gateṣu triṣu kampate manaḥ // Bc_8.32 //
analyzed: upāgate ca tvayi kanthake ca me samam gateṣu triṣu kampate manaḥ

original: anāryamasnigdhamamitrakarma me nṛśaṃsa kṛtvā kimihādya rodiṣi /
analyzed: anāryam asnigdham amitra karma me nṛśaṃsa kṛtvā kim iha adya rodiṣi

original: niyaccha bāṣpaṃ bhava tuṣṭamānaso na saṃvadatyaśru ca tacca karma te // Bc_8.33 //
analyzed: niyaccha bāṣpam bhava tuṣṭa mānasaḥ na saṃvadati aśru ca tat ca karma te

original: priyeṇa vaśyena hitena sādhunā tvayā sahāyena yathārthakāriṇā /
analyzed: priyeṇa vaśyena hitena sādhunā tvayā sahāyena yathārtha kāriṇā

original: gato 'ryaputro hyapunarnivṛttaye ramasva diṣṭyā saphalaḥ śramastava // Bc_8.34 //
analyzed: gataḥ rya putraḥ hi apunarnivṛttaye ramasva diṣṭyā sa phalaḥ śramaḥ tava

original: varaṃ manuṣyasya vicakṣaṇo ripurna mitramaprājñamayogapeśalam /
analyzed: varam manuṣyasya vicakṣaṇaḥ ripuḥ na mitram aprājñam ayoga peśalam

original: suhṛdbruveṇa hyavipaścitā tvayā kṛtaḥ kulasyāsya mahānupaplavaḥ // Bc_8.35 //
analyzed: suhṛdbruveṇa hi a vipaścitā tvayā kṛtaḥ kulasya asya mahān upaplavaḥ

original: imā hi śocyā vyavamuktabhūṣaṇāḥ prasaktabāṣpāvilaraktalocanāḥ /
analyzed: imāḥ hi śocyāḥ vyavamukta bhūṣaṇāḥ prasakta bāṣpa āvila rakta locanāḥ

original: sthite 'pi patyau himavanmahīsame pranaṣṭaśobhā vidhavā iva striyaḥ // Bc_8.36 //
analyzed: sthite pi patyau himavat mahī same pranaṣṭa śobhāḥ vidhavāḥ iva striyaḥ

original: imāśca vikṣiptaviṭaṅkabāhavaḥ prasaktapārāvatadīrghanisvanāḥ /
analyzed: imāḥ ca vikṣipta viṭaṅka bāhavaḥ prasakta pārāvata dīrgha nisvanāḥ

original: vinākṛtāstena sahāvarodhanairbhṛśaṃ rudantīva vimānapaṅktayaḥ // Bc_8.37 //
analyzed: vinākṛtāḥ tena saha avarodhanaiḥ bhṛśam rudanti iva vimāna paṅktayaḥ

original: anarthakāmo 'sya janasya sarvathā turaṅgamo 'pi dhruvameṣa kanthakaḥ /
analyzed: anartha kāmaḥ sya janasya sarvathā turaṅgamaḥ pi dhruvam eṣa kanthakaḥ

original: jahāra sarvasvamitastathā hi me jane prasupte niśi ratnacauravat // Bc_8.38 //
analyzed: jahāra sarva svam itas tathā hi me jane prasupte niśi ratna caura vat

original: yadā samarthaḥ khalu soḍhumāgatāniṣuprahārānapi kiṃ punaḥ kaśāḥ /
analyzed: yadā samarthaḥ khalu soḍhum āgatān iṣu prahārān api kim punar kaśāḥ

original: gataḥ kaśāpātabhayātkathaṃ nvayaṃ śriyaṃ gṛhītvā hṛdayaṃ ca me samam // Bc_8.39 //
analyzed: gataḥ kaśā pāta bhayāt katham nu ayam śriyam gṛhītvā hṛdayam ca me samam

original: anāryakarmā bhṛśamadya heṣate narendradhiṣṇyaṃ pratipūrayanniva /
analyzed: anārya karmā bhṛśam adya heṣate narendra dhiṣṇyam pratipūrayan iva

original: yadā tu nirvāhayati sma me priyaṃ tadā hi mūkasturagādhamo 'bhavat // Bc_8.40 //
analyzed: yadā tu nirvāhayati sma me priyam tadā hi mūkaḥ turaga adhamaḥ bhavat

original: yadi hyaheṣiṣyata bodhayan janaṃ khuraiḥ kṣitau vāpyakariṣyata dhvanim /
analyzed: yadi hi aheṣiṣyata bodhayan janam khuraiḥ kṣitau vā api akariṣyata dhvanim

original: hanusvanaṃ vājanayiṣyaduttamaṃ na cābhaviṣyanmama duḥkhamīdṛśam // Bc_8.41 //
analyzed: hanu svanam vā ajanayiṣyat uttamam na ca abhaviṣyat mama duḥkham īdṛśam

original: itīha devyāḥ paridevitāśrayaṃ niśamya bāṣpagrathitākṣaraṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: iti iha devyāḥ paridevita āśrayam niśamya bāṣpa grathita akṣaram vacaḥ

original: adhomukhaḥ sāśrukalaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ śanairidaṃ chandaka uttaraṃ jagau // Bc_8.42 //
analyzed: adhomukhaḥ sa aśru kalaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ śanais idam chandakaḥ uttaram jagau

original: vigarhituṃ nārhasi devi kanthakaṃ na cāpi roṣaṃ mayi kartumarhasi /
analyzed: vigarhitum nā arhasi devi kanthakam na ca api roṣam mayi kartum arhasi

original: anāgasau svaḥ samavehi sarvaśo gato nṛdevaḥ sa hi devi devavat // Bc_8.43 //
analyzed: anāgasau svaḥ samavehi sarvaśas gataḥ nṛdevaḥ sa hi devi deva vat

original: ahaṃ hi jānannapi rājaśāsanaṃ balātkṛtaḥ kairapi daivatairiva /
analyzed: aham hi jānan api rāja śāsanam balātkṛtaḥ kaiḥ api daivataiḥ iva

original: upānayaṃ tūrṇamimaṃ turaṅgamaṃ tathānvagacchaṃ vigataśramo 'dhvani // Bc_8.44 //
analyzed: upānayam tūrṇam imam turaṅgamam tathā anvagaccham vigata śramaḥ dhvani

original: vrajannayaṃ vajivaro 'pi nāspṛśanmahī khurāgrairvidhṛtairivāntarā /
analyzed: vrajan ayam vaji varaḥ nā aspṛśat mahī khura agraiḥ vidhṛtaiḥ iva antarā

original: tathaiva daivādiva saṃyatānano hanusvanaṃ nākṛta nāpyaheṣata // Bc_8.45 //
analyzed: tathā eva daivāt iva saṃyata ānanaḥ hanu svanam nā akṛta nā api aheṣata

original: yato bahirgacchati pārthivātmaje tadābhavaddvāramapāvṛtaṃ svayam /
analyzed: yatas bahis gacchati pārthiva ātmaje tadā abhavat dvāram apāvṛtam svayam

original: tamaśca naiśaṃ raviṇeva pāṭitaṃ tapo 'pi daivo vidhireṣa gṛhyatām // Bc_8.46 //
analyzed: tamaḥ ca naiśam raviṇā iva pāṭitam tapaḥ daivaḥ vidhiḥ eṣa gṛhyatām

original: yadapramatto 'pi narendraśāsanād gṛhe pure civa sahasraśo janaḥ /
analyzed: yat apramattaḥ narendra śāsanāt gṛhe pure sahasraśas janaḥ

original: tadā sa nābudhyata nidrayā hṛtastato 'pi daivo vidhireṣa gṛhyatām // Bc_8.47 //
analyzed: tadā sa nā abudhyata nidrayā hṛtaḥ daivaḥ vidhiḥ eṣa gṛhyatām

original: yataśca vāso vanavāsasaṃmataṃ nisṛṣṭamasmai samaye divaukasā /
analyzed: yatas ca vāsaḥ vana vāsa saṃmatam nisṛṣṭam asmai samaye divaukasā

original: divi praviddhaṃ mukuṭaṃ ca taddhṛtaṃ tato 'pi daivo vidhireṣa gṛhyatām // Bc_8.48 //
analyzed: divi praviddham mukuṭam ca tat hṛtam daivaḥ vidhiḥ eṣa gṛhyatām

original: tadevamāvāṃ naradevi doṣato na tatprayātaṃ prati gantumarhasi /
analyzed: tat evam āvām naradevi doṣataḥ na tad prayātam prati gantum arhasi

original: na kāmakāro mama nāsya vājinaḥ kṛtānuyātraḥ sa hi daivatairgataḥ // Bc_8.49 //
analyzed: na kāma kāraḥ mama na asya vājinaḥ kṛta anuyātraḥ sa hi daivataiḥ gataḥ

original: iti prayāṇaṃ bahudevamadbhūtaṃ niśamya tāstasya mahātmanaḥ striyaḥ /
analyzed: iti prayāṇam bahu deva mad bhūtam niśamya tāḥ tasya mahātmanaḥ striyaḥ

original: pranaṣṭaśokā iva vismayaṃ yayurmanojvaraṃ pravrajanāttu lebhire // Bc_8.50 //
analyzed: pranaṣṭa śokāḥ iva vismayam yayuḥ manaḥ jvaram pravrajanāt tu lebhire

original: viṣādapāriplavalocanā tataḥ pranaṣṭapotā kurarīva duḥkhitā /
analyzed: viṣāda pāriplava locanā tatas pranaṣṭa potā kurarī iva duḥkhitā

original: vihāya dhairya virurāva gautamī tatāma caivāśrumukhī jagāda ca // Bc_8.51 //
analyzed: vihāya dhairya virurāva gautamī tatāma ca eva aśru mukhī jagāda ca

original: mahormimanto mṛdavo 'sitāḥ śubhāḥ pṛthakpṛthaṅmūlaruhāḥ samudgatāḥ /
analyzed: mahā ūrmimantaḥ mṛdavaḥ sitāḥ śubhāḥ pṛthak pṛthak mūla ruhāḥ samudgatāḥ

original: praveritāste bhuvi tasya murdhajā narendramaulīpariveṣṭanakṣamāḥ // Bc_8.52 //
analyzed: praveritāḥ te bhuvi tasya murdhajāḥ narendra maulī pariveṣṭana kṣamāḥ

original: pralambabāhurmṛgarājavikramo maharṣabhākṣaḥ kanakojjvaladyutiḥ /
analyzed: pralamba bāhuḥ mṛgarāja vikramaḥ mahā ṛṣabha akṣaḥ kanaka ujjvala dyutiḥ

original: viśālavakṣā ghanadundubhisvanastathāvidho 'pyāśramavāsamarhati // Bc_8.53 //
analyzed: viśāla vakṣāḥ ghana dundubhi svanaḥ tathāvidhaḥ pi āśrama vāsam arhati

original: abhāginī nūnamiyaṃ vasuṃdharā tamāryakarmāṇamanuttamaṃ patim /
analyzed: abhāginī nūnam iyam vasuṃdharā tam ārya karmāṇam anuttamam patim

original: gatastato 'sau guṇavān hi tādṛśo nṛpaḥ prajābhāgyaguṇaiḥ prasūyate // Bc_8.54 //
analyzed: gataḥ tatas sau guṇavān hi tādṛśaḥ nṛpaḥ prajā bhāgya guṇaiḥ prasūyate

original: sujātajālāvatatāṅgulī mṛdū nigūḍhagulphau bisapuṣpakomalau /
analyzed: su jāta jāla avatata aṅgulī mṛdū nigūḍha gulphau bisa puṣpa komalau

original: vanāntabhūmiṃ kaṭhināṃ kathaṃ nu tau sacakramadhyau caraṇau gamiṣyataḥ // Bc_8.55 //
analyzed: vanānta bhūmim kaṭhinām katham nu tau sa cakra madhyau caraṇau gamiṣyataḥ

original: vimānapṛṣṭhe śayanāsanocitaṃ mahārhavastrāgurucandanārcitam /
analyzed: vimāna pṛṣṭhe śayana āsana ucitam mahārha vastra aguru candana arcitam

original: kathaṃ nu śītoṣṇajalāgameṣu taccharīramojasvi vane bhaviṣyati // Bc_8.56 //
analyzed: katham nu śīta uṣṇa jala āgameṣu tat śarīram ojasvi vane bhaviṣyati

original: kulena sattvena balena varcasā śrutena lakṣmyā vayasā ca garvitaḥ /
analyzed: kulena sattvena balena varcasā śrutena lakṣmyā vayasā ca garvitaḥ

original: pradātumevābhyucito na yācituṃ kathaṃ sa bhikṣāṃ parataścariṣyati // Bc_8.57 //
analyzed: pradātum eva abhyucitaḥ na yācitum katham sa bhikṣām paratas cariṣyati

original: śucau śayitvā śayane hiraṇmaye prabodhyamāno niśi tūryanisvanaiḥ /
analyzed: śucau śayitvā śayane hiraṇmaye prabodhyamānaḥ niśi tūrya nisvanaiḥ

original: kathaṃ bata svapsyati so 'dya me vratī paṭaikadeśāntarite mahītale // Bc_8.58 //
analyzed: katham bata svapsyati saḥ me vratī paṭa eka deśa antarite mahī tale

original: imaṃ pralāpaṃ karuṇaṃ niśamya tā bhujaiḥ pariṣvajya parasparaṃ striyaḥ /
analyzed: imam pralāpam karuṇam niśamya tāḥ bhujaiḥ pariṣvajya parasparam striyaḥ

original: vilocanebhyaḥ salilāni tatyajurmadhūni puṣpebhya iveritā latāḥ // Bc_8.59 //
analyzed: vilocanebhyaḥ salilāni tatyajuḥ madhūni puṣpebhyaḥ iva īritāḥ latāḥ

original: tato dharāyāmapatadyaśodharā vicakravākeva rathāṅgasāvhayā /
analyzed: tatas dharāyām apatat yaśodharā vicakravākā iva rathāṅga sāvhayā

original: śanaiśca tattadvilalāpa viklavā muhurmuhurgadgadaruddhayā girā // Bc_8.60 //
analyzed: śanais ca tat tat vilalāpa viklavā muhur muhur gadgada ruddhayā girā

original: sa māmanāthāṃ sahadharmacāriṇīmapāsya dharma yadi kartumicchati /
analyzed: sa mām anāthām saha dharmacāriṇīm apāsya dharma yadi kartum icchati

original: kuto 'sya dharmaḥ sahadharmacāriṇī vinā tapo yaḥ paribhoktumicchati // Bc_8.61 //
analyzed: kutas sya dharmaḥ saha dharmacāriṇī vinā tapaḥ yaḥ paribhoktum icchati

original: śṛṇoti nūnaṃ sa na pūrvapārthivānmahāsudarśaprabhṛtīn pitāmahān /
analyzed: śṛṇoti nūnam sa na pūrva pārthivān mahāsudarśa prabhṛtīn pitāmahān

original: vanāni patnīsahitānupeyuṣastathā hi dharma madṛte cikīrṣīte // Bc_8.62 //
analyzed: vanāni patnī sahitān upeyuṣaḥ tathā hi dharma mat ṛte cikīrṣīte

original: makheṣu vā vedavidhānasaṃskṛtau na daṃpatī paśyati dīkṣitābubhau /
analyzed: makheṣu vā veda vidhāna saṃskṛtau na daṃpatī paśyati dīkṣitau ubhau

original: samaṃ bubhukṣū parato 'pi tatphalaṃ tato 'sya jāto mayi dharmamatsaraḥ // Bc_8.63 //
analyzed: samam bubhukṣū paratas tad phalam tatas sya jātaḥ mayi dharma matsaraḥ

original: dhruvaṃ sa jānanmama dharmavallabho manaḥ priyerṣyākalahaṃ muhurmithaḥ /
analyzed: dhruvam sa jānan mama dharma vallabhaḥ manaḥ priya īrṣyā kalaham muhur mithas

original: sukhaṃ vibhīrmāmapahāya roṣaṇāṃ mahendraloke 'psaraso jighṛkṣati // Bc_8.64 //
analyzed: sukham vibhīḥ mām apahāya roṣaṇām mahā indra loke psarasaḥ jighṛkṣati

original: iyaṃ tu cintā mama kīdṛśaṃ nu tā vapurguṇaṃ bibhrati tatra yoṣitaḥ /
analyzed: iyam tu cintā mama kīdṛśam nu tāḥ vapuḥ guṇam bibhrati tatra yoṣitaḥ

original: vane yadartha sa tapāṃsi tapyate śriyaṃ ca hitvā mama bhaktimeva ca // Bc_8.65 //
analyzed: vane yad artha sa tapāṃsi tapyate śriyam ca hitvā mama bhaktim eva ca

original: na khalviyaṃ svargasukhāya me spṛhā na tajjanasyātmavato 'pi durlabham /
analyzed: na khalu iyam svarga sukhāya me spṛhā na tad janasya ātmavataḥ durlabham

original: sa tu priyo māmiha vā paratra vā kathaṃ na jahyāditi me manorathaḥ // Bc_8.66 //
analyzed: sa tu priyaḥ mām iha vā paratra vā katham na jahyāt iti me manorathaḥ

original: abhāginī yadyahamāyatekṣaṇaṃ śucismitaṃ bharturudīkṣituṃ mukham /
analyzed: abhāginī yadi aham āyata īkṣaṇam śuci smitam bhartuḥ udīkṣitum mukham

original: na mandabhāgyo 'rhati rāhulo 'pyayaṃ kadācidaṅke parivartituṃ pituḥ // Bc_8.67 //
analyzed: na mandabhāgyaḥ rhati rāhulaḥ pi ayam kadācid aṅke parivartitum pituḥ

original: aho nṛśaṃsaṃ sukumāravarcasaḥ sudāruṇaṃ tasya manasvino manaḥ /
analyzed: aho nṛśaṃsam sukumāra varcasaḥ su dāruṇam tasya manasvinaḥ manaḥ

original: kalapralāpaṃ dviṣato 'pi harṣaṇaṃ śiśuṃ sutaṃ yastyajatīdṛśaṃ bata // Bc_8.68 //
analyzed: kala pralāpam harṣaṇam śiśum sutam yaḥ tyajati īdṛśam bata

original: mamāpi kāmaṃ hṛdayaṃ sudāruṇaṃ śilāmayaṃ vāpyayaso 'pi vā kṛtam /
analyzed: mama api kāmam hṛdayam su dāruṇam śilā mayam vā kṛtam

original: anāthavacchrīrahite sukhocite vanaṃ gate bhartari yanna dīryate // Bc_8.69 //
analyzed: anātha vat śrīḥ ahite sukha ucite vanam gate bhartari yat na dīryate

original: itīha devī patiśokamūrchitā ruroda dadhyau vilalāpa cāsakṛt /
analyzed: iti iha devī pati śoka mūrchitā ruroda dadhyau vilalāpa ca asakṛt

original: svabhāvadhīrāpi hi sā satī śucā dhṛtiṃ na sasmāra cakāra no hriyam // Bc_8.70 //
analyzed: svabhāva dhīrā api hi sā satī śucā dhṛtim na sasmāra cakāra no hriyam

original: tatastathā śokavilāpaviklavāṃ yaśodharāṃ prekṣya vasuṃdharāgatām /
analyzed: tatas tathā śoka vilāpa viklavām yaśodharām prekṣya vasuṃdharā gatām

original: mahāravindairiva vṛṣṭitāḍitairmukhaiḥ sabāṣpairvanitā vicukruśuḥ // Bc_8.71 //
analyzed: mahā aravindaiḥ iva vṛṣṭi tāḍitaiḥ mukhaiḥ sa bāṣpaiḥ vanitāḥ vicukruśuḥ

original: samāptajāpyaḥ kṛtahomamaṅgalo nṛpastu devāyatanādviniryayau /
analyzed: samāpta jāpyaḥ kṛta homa maṅgalaḥ nṛpaḥ tu devāyatanāt viniryayau

original: janasya tejārtaraveṇa cāhataścacāla vajradhvanineva vāraṇaḥ // Bc_8.72 //
analyzed: janasya teja ārta raveṇa ca āhataḥ cacāla vajra dhvaninā iva vāraṇaḥ

original: niśāmya ca cchandakakanthakāvubhau sutasya saṃśrutya ca niścayaṃ sthiram /
analyzed: niśāmya ca chandaka kanthakau ubhau sutasya saṃśrutya ca niścayam sthiram

original: papāta śokābhihato mahīpatiḥ śacīpatervṛtta ivotsave dhvajaḥ // Bc_8.73 //
analyzed: papāta śoka abhihataḥ mahīpatiḥ śacīpateḥ vṛtte iva utsave dhvajaḥ

original: tato muhūrta sutaśokamohito janena tulyābhijanena dhāritaḥ /
analyzed: tatas muhūrta suta śoka mohitaḥ janena tulya abhijanena dhāritaḥ

original: nirīkṣya dṛṣṭyā jalapūrṇayā hayaṃ mahītalastho vilalāpa pārthivaḥ // Bc_8.74 //
analyzed: nirīkṣya dṛṣṭyā jala pūrṇayā hayam mahī tala sthaḥ vilalāpa pārthivaḥ

original: bahūni kṛtvā samare priyāṇi me mahattvayā kanthaka vipriyaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: bahūni kṛtvā samare priyāṇi me mahat tvayā kanthaka vipriyam kṛtam

original: guṇapriyo yena vane sa me priyaḥ priyo 'pi sannapriyavatpraveritaḥ // Bc_8.75 //
analyzed: guṇa priyaḥ yena vane sa me priyaḥ san apriya vat praveritaḥ

original: tadadya māṃ vā naya tatra yatra sa vraja drutaṃ vā punarenamānaya /
analyzed: tat adya mām vā naya tatra yatra sa vraja drutam vā punar enam ānaya

original: ṛte hi tasmānmama nāsti jīvitaṃ vigāḍharogasya sadauṣadhādiva // Bc_8.76 //
analyzed: ṛte hi tasmāt mama nā asti jīvitam vigāḍha rogasya sat auṣadhāt iva

original: suvarṇaniṣṭhīvini mṛtyunā hṛte suduṣkaraṃ yanna mamāra saṃjayaḥ /
analyzed: suvarṇaniṣṭhīvini mṛtyunā hṛte su duṣkaram yat na mamāra saṃjayaḥ

original: ahaṃ punardharmaratau sute gate mumukṣurātmānamanātmavāniva // Bc_8.77 //
analyzed: aham punar dharma ratau sute gate mumukṣuḥ ātmānam anātmavān iva

original: vibhordaśakṣatrakṛtaḥ prajāpateḥ parāparajñasya vivasvadātmanaḥ /
analyzed: vibhoḥ daśa kṣatra kṛtaḥ prajāpateḥ para apara jñasya vivasvat ātmanaḥ

original: priyeṇa putreṇa satā vinākṛtaṃ kathaṃ na muhyeddhi mano manorapi // Bc_8.78 //
analyzed: priyeṇa putreṇa satā vinākṛtam katham na muhyet hi manaḥ manoḥ api

original: ajasya rājñastanayāya dhīmate narādhipāyendrasakhāya me spṛhā /
analyzed: ajasya rājñaḥ tanayāya dhīmate narādhipāya indra sakhāya me spṛhā

original: gate vanaṃ yastanaye divaṃ gato na moghabāṣpaḥ kṛpaṇaṃ jijīva ha // Bc_8.79 //
analyzed: gate vanam yaḥ tanaye divam gataḥ na mogha bāṣpaḥ kṛpaṇam jijīva ha

original: pracakṣva me bhadra tadāśramājiraṃ hṛtastvayā yatra sa me jalāñjaliḥ /
analyzed: pracakṣva me bhadra tad āśrama ajiram hṛtaḥ tvayā yatra sa me jalāñjaliḥ

original: ime parīpsanti hi taṃ pipāsavo mamāsavaḥ pretagatiṃ yiyāsavaḥ // Bc_8.80 //
analyzed: ime parīpsanti hi tam pipāsavaḥ mama asavaḥ preta gatim yiyāsavaḥ

original: iti tanayaviyogajātaduḥkha kṣitisadṛśaṃ sahajaṃ vihāya dhairyam /
analyzed: iti tanaya viyoga jāta duḥkha kṣiti sadṛśam sahajam vihāya dhairyam

original: daśaratha iva rāmaśokavaśyo bahu vilalāpa nṛpo visaṃjñakalpaḥ // Bc_8.81 //
analyzed: daśarathaḥ iva rāma śoka vaśyaḥ bahu vilalāpa nṛpaḥ visaṃjña kalpaḥ

original: śrutavinayaguṇānvitastatastaṃ matisacivaḥ pravayā purohitaśca /
analyzed: śruta vinaya guṇa anvitaḥ tatas tam mati sacivaḥ pravayā purohitaḥ ca

original: samadhṛtamidamūcaturyathāvanna ca pariptamukhau na cāpyaśokau // Bc_8.82 //
analyzed: sama dhṛtam idam ūcatuḥ yathāvat na ca paripta mukhau na ca api aśokau

original: tyaja naravara śokamehi dhairya kudhṛtirivārhasi dhīra nāśru moktum /
analyzed: tyaja nara vara śokam ehi dhairya kudhṛtiḥ iva arhasi dhīra nā aśru moktum

original: srajamiva mṛditāmapāsya lakṣmīṃ bhuvi bahavo hi nṛpā vanānyabhīyuḥ // Bc_8.83 //
analyzed: srajam iva mṛditām apāsya lakṣmīm bhuvi bahavaḥ hi nṛpāḥ vanāni abhīyuḥ

original: api ca niyata eṣa tasya bhāvaḥ smara vacanaṃ tadṛṣeḥ purāsitasya /
analyzed: api ca niyataḥ eṣa tasya bhāvaḥ smara vacanam tat ṛṣeḥ purā asitasya

original: na hi sa divi na cakravartirājye kṣaṇamapi vāsayituṃ sukhena śakyaḥ // Bc_8.84 //
analyzed: na hi sa divi na cakravarti rājye kṣaṇam api vāsayitum sukhena śakyaḥ

original: yadi tu nṛvara kārya eva yatnastvaritamudāhara yāvadatra yāvaḥ /
analyzed: yadi tu nṛvara kāryaḥ eva yatnaḥ tvaritam udāhara yāvat atra yāvaḥ

original: bahuvidhimiha yuddhamastu tāvattava tanayasya vidheśca tasya tasya // Bc_8.85 //
analyzed: bahu vidhim iha yuddham astu tāvat tava tanayasya vidheḥ ca tasya tasya

original: narapatiratha tau śaśāsa tasmād drutamita eva yuvāmabhiprayātam /
analyzed: narapatiḥ atha tau śaśāsa tasmāt drutam itas eva yuvām abhiprayātam

original: na hi mama hṛdayaṃ prayāti śāntiṃ vanaśakuneriva putralālasasya // Bc_8.86 //
analyzed: na hi mama hṛdayam prayāti śāntim vana śakuneḥ iva putra lālasasya

original: paramamiti narendraśāsanāttau yayaturamātyapurohitau vanaṃ tat /
analyzed: paramam iti narendra śāsanāt tau yayatuḥ amātya purohitau vanam tat

original: kṛtamiti savadhūjanaḥ sadāro nṛpatirapi pracakāra śeṣakāryam // Bc_8.87 //
analyzed: kṛtam iti sa vadhū janaḥ sa dāraḥ nṛpatiḥ api pracakāra śeṣa kāryam

original: iti buddhacarite mahākāvye 'ntaḥpuravilāpo nāmāṣṭamaḥ sargaḥ // 8 //
analyzed: iti buddhacarite mahākāvye ntaḥpuravilāpaḥ nāma aṣṭamaḥ sargaḥ

original: tatastadā mantripurohitau tau bāṣpapratodābhihatau nṛpeṇa /
analyzed: tatas tadā mantri purohitau tau bāṣpa pratoda abhihatau nṛpeṇa

original: viddhau sadaśvāviva sarvayatnātsauhārdaśīghraṃ yayaturvanaṃ tat // Bc_9.1 //
analyzed: viddhau sat aśvau iva sarva yatnāt sauhārda śīghram yayatuḥ vanam tat

original: tamāśramaṃ jātapariśramau tāvupetya kāle sadṛśānuyātrau /
analyzed: tam āśramam jāta pariśramau tau upetya kāle sadṛśa anuyātrau

original: rājarddhimutsṛjya vinītaceṣṭāvupeyaturbhārgavadhiṣṇyameva // Bc_9.2 //
analyzed: rāja ṛddhim utsṛjya vinīta ceṣṭau upeyatuḥ bhārgava dhiṣṇyam eva

original: tau nyāyatastaṃ pratipūjya vipraṃ tenārcitau tāvapi cānurūpam /
analyzed: tau nyāyatas tam pratipūjya vipram tena arcitau tau api ca anurūpam

original: kṛtāsanau bhārgavamāsanasthaṃ chittvā kathāmūcaturātmakṛtyam // Bc_9.3 //
analyzed: kṛta āsanau bhārgavam āsana stham chittvā kathām ūcatuḥ ātma kṛtyam

original: śuddhaujasaḥ śuddhaviśālakīrterikṣvākuvaṃśaprabhavasya rājñaḥ /
analyzed: śuddha ojasaḥ śuddha viśāla kīrteḥ ikṣvāku vaṃśa prabhavasya rājñaḥ

original: imaṃ janaṃ vettu bhavānadhītaṃ śrutagrahe mantraparigrahe ca // Bc_9.4 //
analyzed: imam janam vettu bhavān adhītam śruta grahe mantra parigrahe ca

original: tasyendrakalpasya jayantakalpaḥ putro jarāmṛtyubhayaṃ titīrṣuḥ /
analyzed: tasya indra kalpasya jayanta kalpaḥ putraḥ jarā mṛtyu bhayam titīrṣuḥ

original: ihābhyutepaḥ kila tasya hetorāvāmupetau bhagavānavaitu // Bc_9.5 //
analyzed: iha abhyutepaḥ kila tasya hetoḥ āvām upetau bhagavān avaitu

original: tau so 'bravīdasti sa dīrghabāhuḥ prāptaḥ kumāro na tu nāvabuddhaḥ /
analyzed: tau saḥ bravīt asti sa dīrgha bāhuḥ prāptaḥ kumāraḥ na tu na avabuddhaḥ

original: dharmo 'yamāvartaka ityavetya yātastvarāḍābhimukho mumukṣuḥ // Bc_9.6 //
analyzed: dharmaḥ yam āvartakaḥ iti avetya yātaḥ tu arāḍa abhimukhaḥ mumukṣuḥ

original: tasmāttatastāvupalabhya tattvaṃ taṃ vipramāmantrya tadaiva sadyaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt tatas tau upalabhya tattvam tam vipram āmantrya tadā eva sadyas

original: khinnāvakhinnāviva rājabhaktyā prasasratustena yataḥ sa yātaḥ // Bc_9.7 //
analyzed: khinnau akhinnau iva rāja bhaktyā prasasratuḥ tena yatas sa yātaḥ

original: yāntau tatastau mṛjayā vihīnamapaśyatāṃ taṃ vapuṣojjvalantam /
analyzed: yāntau tatas tau mṛjayā vihīnam apaśyatām tam vapuṣā ujjvalantam

original: upopaviṣṭaṃ pathi vṛkṣamūle sūrya ghanābhogamiva praviṣṭam // Bc_9.8 //
analyzed: upopaviṣṭam pathi vṛkṣa mūle sūrya ghana ābhogam iva praviṣṭam

original: yānaṃ vihāyopayayau tatastaṃ purohito mantradhareṇa sārdham /
analyzed: yānam vihāya upayayau tatas tam purohitaḥ mantradhareṇa sārdham

original: yathā vanasthaṃ sahavāmadevo rāmaṃ didṛkṣurmunirāvairvaśeyaḥ // Bc_9.9 //
analyzed: yathā vana stham saha vāmadevaḥ rāmam didṛkṣuḥ muniḥ āvaiḥ vaśeyaḥ

original: tāvarcayāmāsaturarhatastaṃ divīva śukrāṅgirasau mahendram /
analyzed: tau arcayāmāsatuḥ arhataḥ tam divi iva śukra āṅgirasau mahā indram

original: pratyarcayāmāsa sa cārhatastau divīva śukrāṅgirasau mahendraḥ // Bc_9.10 //
analyzed: pratyarcayāmāsa sa ca arhatas tau divi iva śukra āṅgirasau mahā indraḥ

original: kṛtābhyanujñāvabhitastatastau niṣedatuḥ śākyakuladhvajasya /
analyzed: kṛta abhyanujñau abhitas tatas tau niṣedatuḥ śākya kula dhvajasya

original: virejatustasya ca saṃnikarṣe punarvasū yogagatāvivendoḥ // Bc_9.11 //
analyzed: virejatuḥ tasya ca saṃnikarṣe punarvasū yoga gatau iva indoḥ

original: taṃ vṛkṣamūlasthamabhijvalantaṃ purohito rājasutaṃ babhāṣe /
analyzed: tam vṛkṣa mūla stham abhijvalantam purohitaḥ rāja sutam babhāṣe

original: yathopaviṣṭaṃ divi pārijāte bṛhaspatiḥ śakrasutaṃ jayantam // Bc_9.12 //
analyzed: yathā upaviṣṭam divi pārijāte bṛhaspatiḥ śakra sutam jayantam

original: tvacchokaśalye hṛdayāvagāḍhe mohaṃ gato bhūmitale muhūrtam /
analyzed: tvad śoka śalye hṛdaya avagāḍhe moham gataḥ bhūmi tale muhūrtam

original: kumāra rājā nayanāmbuvarṣo yattvāmavocattadidaṃ nibodha // Bc_9.13 //
analyzed: kumāra rājā nayana ambu varṣaḥ yat tvām avocat tat idam nibodha

original: jānāmi dharma prati niścayaṃ te paraimi te bhāvinametamartham /
analyzed: jānāmi dharma prati niścayam te paraimi te bhāvinam etam artham

original: ahaṃ tvakāle vanasaṃśrayātte śokāgnināgnipratimena dahye // Bc_9.14 //
analyzed: aham tu akāle vana saṃśrayāt te śoka agninā agni pratimena dahye

original: tadehi dharmapriya matpriyārtha dharmārthameva tyaja buddhimetām /
analyzed: tat ehi dharma priya mad priya artha dharma artham eva tyaja buddhim etām

original: ayaṃ hi mā śokarayaḥ pravṛddhau nadīrayaḥ kūlamivābhihanti // Bc_9.15 //
analyzed: ayam hi mā śoka rayaḥ pravṛddhau nadī rayaḥ kūlam iva abhihanti

original: meghāmbukakṣādriṣu yā hi vṛttiḥ samīraṇārkāgnimahāśanīnām /
analyzed: megha ambu kakṣa adriṣu yā hi vṛttiḥ samīraṇa arka agni mahā aśanīnām

original: tāṃ vṛttimasmāsu karoti śoko vikarṣaṇocchoṣaṇadāhabhedaiḥ // Bc_9.16 //
analyzed: tām vṛttim asmāsu karoti śokaḥ vikarṣaṇa ucchoṣaṇa dāha bhedaiḥ

original: tadbhuṅkṣva tāvadvasudhādhipatyaṃ kāle vanaṃ yāsyāsi śāstradṛṣṭe /
analyzed: tat bhuṅkṣva tāvat vasudhā ādhipatyam kāle vanam yāsyāsi śāstra dṛṣṭe

original: aniṣṭabandhau kuru mayyapekṣāṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu dayā hi dharmaḥ // Bc_9.17 //
analyzed: aniṣṭa bandhau kuru mayi apekṣām sarveṣu bhūteṣu dayā hi dharmaḥ

original: na caiṣa dharmo vana eva siddhaḥ pure 'pi siddhirniyatā yatīnām /
analyzed: na ca eṣa dharmaḥ vane eva siddhaḥ pure siddhiḥ niyatā yatīnām

original: buddhiśca yatnaśca nimittamatra vana ca liṅgaṃ ca hi bhīrucinham // Bc_9.18 //
analyzed: buddhiḥ ca yatnaḥ ca nimittam atra ca liṅgam ca hi bhīru cinham

original: maulīdharairasaviṣaktahāraiḥ keyūraviṣṭabdhabhujairnarendraiḥ /
analyzed: maulī dharaiḥ asa viṣakta hāraiḥ keyūra viṣṭabdha bhujaiḥ narendraiḥ

original: lakṣbhyaṅkamadhye parivartamānaiḥ prāpto gṛhasthairapi mokṣadharmaḥ // Bc_9.19 //
analyzed: lakṣbhi aṅka madhye parivartamānaiḥ prāptaḥ gṛhasthaiḥ api mokṣa dharmaḥ

original: dhruvānujau yau balivajrabāhū vaibhrājamāṣāḍhamathāntidevam /
analyzed: dhruva anujau yau bali vajrabāhū vaibhrājam āṣāḍham atha antidevam

original: videharājaṃ janakaṃ tathaiva śālvadrumaṃ senajitaśca rājñaḥ // Bc_9.20 //
analyzed: videha rājam janakam tathā eva śālva drumam senajitaḥ ca rājñaḥ

original: etān gṛhasthānnṛpatīnavehi naiḥśreyase dharmavidhau vinītān /
analyzed: etān gṛhasthān nṛpatīn avehi naiḥśreyase dharma vidhau vinītān

original: ubhe 'pi tasmādyugapadbhajasva cittādhipatyaṃ ca nṛpaśriyaṃ ca // Bc_9.21 //
analyzed: ubhe tasmāt yugapad bhajasva citta ādhipatyam ca nṛpa śriyam ca

original: icchāmi hi tvāmupaguhya gāḍhaṃ kṛtābhiṣekaṃ salilārdrameva /
analyzed: icchāmi hi tvām upaguhya gāḍham kṛta abhiṣekam salila ārdram eva

original: dhṛtātapattraṃ samudīkṣamāṇastenaiva harṣeṇa vanaṃ praveṣṭum // Bc_9.22 //
analyzed: dhṛta ātapattram samudīkṣamāṇaḥ tena eva harṣeṇa vanam praveṣṭum

original: ityabravīdbhūmipatirbhavantaṃ vākyena bāṣpagrathitākṣareṇa /
analyzed: iti abravīt bhūmipatiḥ bhavantam vākyena bāṣpa grathita akṣareṇa

original: śrutvā bhavānarhati tatpriyārtha snehena tasnehamanuprayātum // Bc_9.23 //
analyzed: śrutvā bhavān arhati tad priya artha snehena tad sneham anuprayātum

original: śokāmbhasi tvatprabhave hyagādhe duḥkhārṇave majjati śākyarājaḥ /
analyzed: śoka ambhasi tvad prabhave hi agādhe duḥkha arṇave majjati śākya rājaḥ

original: tasmāttamuttāraya nāthahīnaṃ nirāśrayaṃ magnamivārṇave nauḥ // Bc_9.24 //
analyzed: tasmāt tam uttāraya nātha hīnam nirāśrayam magnam iva arṇave nauḥ

original: bhīṣmeṇa gaṅgodarasaṃbhavena rāmeṇa rāmeṇa ca bhārgaveṇa /
analyzed: bhīṣmeṇa gaṅgā udara saṃbhavena rāmeṇa rāmeṇa ca bhārgaveṇa

original: śrutvā kṛtaṃ karma pituḥ priyārtha pitustvamaopyarhasi kartumiṣṭam // Bc_9.25 //
analyzed: śrutvā kṛtam karma pituḥ priya artha pituḥ tvam ao api arhasi kartum iṣṭam

original: saṃvardhayitrī samavehi devīmagastyajuṣṭāṃ diśamaprayātām /
analyzed: saṃvardhayitrī samavehi devīm agastya juṣṭām diśam aprayātām

original: pranaṣṭavatsāmiva vatsalāṃ gāmajasramārtā karuṇaṃ rudantīm // Bc_9.26 //
analyzed: pranaṣṭa vatsām iva vatsalām gām ajasram ārtā karuṇam rudantīm

original: haṃsena haṃsīmiva viprayuktāṃ tyaktāṃ gajeneva vane kareṇum /
analyzed: haṃsena haṃsīm iva viprayuktām tyaktām gajena iva vane kareṇum

original: artā sanāthāmapi nāthahīnāṃ trātuṃ vadhūmarhasi darśanena // Bc_9.27 //
analyzed: artā sanāthām api nātha hīnām trātum vadhūm arhasi darśanena

original: ekaṃ sutaṃ bālamanarhaduḥkhaṃ saṃtāpamantargatamudvahantam /
analyzed: ekam sutam bālam anarha duḥkham saṃtāpam antargatam udvahantam

original: taṃ rāhulaṃ mokṣaya bandhuśokādrāhūpasargādeva pūrṇacandram // Bc_9.28 //
analyzed: tam rāhulam mokṣaya bandhu śokāt rāhu upasargāt eva pūrṇa candram

original: śokāgninā tvadvirahendhanena /
analyzed: śoka agninā tvad viraha indhanena

original: niḥsvāsadhūmena tamaḥśikhena /
analyzed: niḥsvāsa dhūmena tamaḥ śikhena

original: tvaddarśanāmbvicchati dahyamānamantaḥpuraṃ caiva puraṃ ca kṛtsnam // Bc_9.29 //
analyzed: tvad darśana ambu icchati dahyamānam antaḥpuram ca eva puram ca kṛtsnam

original: sa bodhisattvaḥ paripūrṇasattvaḥ śrutvā vacastasya purohitasya /
analyzed: sa bodhisattvaḥ paripūrṇa sattvaḥ śrutvā vacaḥ tasya purohitasya

original: dhyātvā muhūrtaṃ guṇavadguṇajñaḥ pratyuttaraṃ praśritamityuvāca // Bc_9.30 //
analyzed: dhyātvā muhūrtam guṇavat guṇa jñaḥ pratyuttaram praśritam iti uvāca

original: avaimi bhāvaṃ tanaye pitṝṇāṃ viśeṣato yo mayi bhūmipasya /
analyzed: avaimi bhāvam tanaye pitṝṇām viśeṣataḥ yaḥ mayi bhūmipasya

original: jānannapi vyādhijarāvipadbhyo bhītastvagatyā svajanaṃ tyajāmi // Bc_9.31 //
analyzed: jānan api vyādhi jarā vipadbhyaḥ bhītaḥ tu agatyā sva janam tyajāmi

original: draṣṭuṃ priyaṃ kaḥ svajanaṃ hi necchennānte yadi syātpriyaviprayogaḥ /
analyzed: draṣṭum priyam kaḥ sva janam hi nā icchet na ante yadi syāt priya viprayogaḥ

original: yadā tu bhūtvāpi ciraṃ viyogastato guruaṃ snindhamapi tyajāmi // Bc_9.32 //
analyzed: yadā tu bhūtvā api ciram viyogaḥ tatas guruam snindham api tyajāmi

original: maddhetukaṃ yattu narādhipasya śokaṃ bhavānāha na tatpriyaṃ me /
analyzed: mad hetukam yat tu narādhipasya śokam bhavān āha na tat priyam me

original: yatsvapnabhūteṣu samāgameṣu saṃtapyate bhāvini viprayoge // Bc_9.33 //
analyzed: yat svapna bhūteṣu samāgameṣu saṃtapyate bhāvini viprayoge

original: evaṃ ca te niścayametu buddhirdṛṣṭvā vicitraṃ jagataḥ pracāram /
analyzed: evam ca te niścayam etu buddhiḥ dṛṣṭvā vicitram jagataḥ pracāram

original: saṃtāpaheturna suto na bandhurajñānanaimittika eṣa tāpaḥ // Bc_9.34 //
analyzed: saṃtāpa hetuḥ na sutaḥ na bandhuḥ ajñāna naimittikaḥ eṣa tāpaḥ

original: yathādhvagānamiha saṃgatānāṃ kāle viyogo niyataḥ prajānām /
analyzed: yathā adhva gānam iha saṃgatānām kāle viyogaḥ niyataḥ prajānām

original: prājño janaḥ ko tu bhajeta śokaṃ bandhupratijñātajanairvihīnaḥ // Bc_9.35 //
analyzed: prājñaḥ janaḥ tu bhajeta śokam bandhu pratijñāta janaiḥ vihīnaḥ

original: ihaiti hitvā svajanaṃ paratra pralabhya cehāpi punaḥ prayāti /
analyzed: iha eti hitvā sva janam paratra pralabhya ca iha api punar prayāti

original: gatvāpi tatrāpyaparatra gacchatyevaṃ jane tyāgini ko 'nurodhaḥ // Bc_9.36 //
analyzed: gatvā api tatra api aparatra gacchati evam jane tyāgini kaḥ nurodhaḥ

original: yadā ca garbhātprabhṛti pravṛttaḥ sarvāsvavasthāsu vadhāya mṛtyuḥ /
analyzed: yadā ca garbhāt prabhṛti pravṛttaḥ sarvāsu avasthāsu vadhāya mṛtyuḥ

original: kasmādakāle vanasaṃśrayaṃ me putrapriyastatrabhavānavocat // Bc_9.37 //
analyzed: kasmāt akāle vana saṃśrayam me putra priyaḥ tatrabhavān avocat

original: bhavatyakālo viṣayābhipattau kālastathaivārthavidhau pradiṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: bhavati akālaḥ viṣaya abhipattau kālaḥ tathā eva artha vidhau pradiṣṭaḥ

original: kālo jagatkarṣati sarvakālānnirvāhake śreyasi nāsti kālaḥ // Bc_9.38 //
analyzed: kālaḥ jagat karṣati sarva kālāt nirvāhake śreyasi na asti kālaḥ

original: rājyaṃ mumukṣurmayi yacca rājā tadapyudāraṃ sadṛśaṃ pituśca /
analyzed: rājyam mumukṣuḥ mayi yat ca rājā tat api udāram sadṛśam pituḥ ca

original: pratigrahītuṃ mama na kṣamaṃ tu lobhādapathyānnamivāturasya // Bc_9.39 //
analyzed: pratigrahītum mama na kṣamam tu lobhāt apathya annam iva āturasya

original: kathaṃ nu mohāyatanaṃ nṛpatvaṃ kṣamaṃ prapattuṃ viduṣā nareṇa /
analyzed: katham nu moha āyatanam nṛpa tvam kṣamam prapattum viduṣā nareṇa

original: sodvegatā yatra madaḥ śramaśca parāpacāreṇa ca dharmapīḍā // Bc_9.40 //
analyzed: sa udvega tā yatra madaḥ śramaḥ ca para apacāreṇa ca dharma pīḍā

original: jāmbūnadaṃ harmyamiva pradīptaṃ viṣeṇa saṃyuktamivottamānnam /
analyzed: jāmbūnadam harmyam iva pradīptam viṣeṇa saṃyuktam iva uttama annam

original: grāhākulaṃ cāmbviva sāravindaṃ rājyaṃ hi ramyaṃ vyasanāśrayaṃ ca // Bc_9.41 //
analyzed: grāha ākulam ca ambu iva sa aravindam rājyam hi ramyam vyasana āśrayam ca

original: itthaṃ ca rājyaṃ na sukhaṃ na dharmaḥ pūrve yathā jātaghṛṇā narendrāḥ /
analyzed: ittham ca rājyam na sukham na dharmaḥ pūrve yathā jāta ghṛṇāḥ narendrāḥ

original: vayaḥprakarṣe 'parihāryaduḥkhe rājyāni muktvā vanameva jagmuḥ // Bc_9.42 //
analyzed: vayaḥ prakarṣe parihārya duḥkhe rājyāni muktvā vanam eva jagmuḥ

original: varaṃ hi bhuktāni tṛṇānyaraṇye toṣaṃ paraṃ ratnamivopagṛhya /
analyzed: varam hi bhuktāni tṛṇāni araṇye toṣam param ratnam iva upagṛhya

original: sahoṣitaṃ śrīsulabhairna caiva doṣairadṛśyairiva kṛṣṇasarpaiḥ // Bc_9.43 //
analyzed: saha uṣitam śrī sulabhaiḥ na ca eva doṣaiḥ adṛśyaiḥ iva kṛṣṇa sarpaiḥ

original: ślādhyaṃ hi rājyāni vihāya rājñāṃ dharmābhilāṣeṇa vanaṃ praveṣṭum /
analyzed: ślādhyam hi rājyāni vihāya rājñām dharma abhilāṣeṇa vanam praveṣṭum

original: bhagnapratijñasya na tūpapannaṃ vanaṃ parityajya gṛhaṃ praveṣṭum // Bc_9.44 //
analyzed: bhagna pratijñasya na tu upapannam vanam parityajya gṛham praveṣṭum

original: jātaḥ kule ko hi naraḥ sasattvo dharmābhilāṣeṇa vanaṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: jātaḥ kule kaḥ hi naraḥ sa sattvaḥ dharma abhilāṣeṇa vanam praviṣṭaḥ

original: kāṣāyamutsṛjya vimuktalajjaḥ puraṃdarasyāpi puraṃ śrayeta // Bc_9.45 //
analyzed: kāṣāyam utsṛjya vimukta lajjaḥ puraṃdarasya api puram śrayeta

original: lobhāddhi mohādathavā bhayena yo vāntamannaṃ punarādadīta /
analyzed: lobhāt hi mohāt athavā bhayena yaḥ vāntam annam punar ādadīta

original: lobhātsa mohādathavā bhayena saṃtyajya kāmān punarādadīta // Bc_9.46 //
analyzed: lobhāt sa mohāt athavā bhayena saṃtyajya kāmān punar ādadīta

original: yaśca pradīptāccharaṇātkathaṃcinniṣkramya bhūyaḥ praviśettadeva /
analyzed: yaḥ ca pradīptāt śaraṇāt kathaṃcid niṣkramya bhūyas praviśet tat eva

original: gārhasthyamutsṛjya sa dṛṣṭadoṣo mohena bhūyo 'bhilaṣedgrahītum // Bc_9.47 //
analyzed: gārhasthyam utsṛjya sa dṛṣṭa doṣaḥ mohena bhūyas bhilaṣet grahītum

original: yā ca śrutirmokṣamavāptavanto nṛpā gṛhasthā iti naitadasti /
analyzed: yā ca śrutiḥ mokṣam avāptavantaḥ nṛpāḥ gṛhasthāḥ iti na etat asti

original: śamapradhānaḥ kva ca mokṣadharmo daṇḍapradhānaḥ kva ca rājadharmaḥ // Bc_9.48 //
analyzed: śama pradhānaḥ kva ca mokṣa dharmaḥ daṇḍa pradhānaḥ kva ca rāja dharmaḥ

original: śame ratiścecchithilaṃ ca rājyaṃ rājye matiścecchamaviplavaśca /
analyzed: śame ratiḥ ced śithilam ca rājyam rājye matiḥ ced śama viplavaḥ ca

original: śamaśca taikṣṇyaṃ ca hi nopapannaṃ śītoṣṇayoraikyamivodakāgnyoḥ // Bc_9.49 //
analyzed: śamaḥ ca taikṣṇyam ca hi nā upapannam śīta uṣṇayoḥ aikyam iva udaka agnyoḥ

original: tanniścayādvā vasudhādhipāste rājyāni muktvā śamamāptavantaḥ /
analyzed: tad niścayāt vā vasudhādhipāḥ te rājyāni muktvā śamam āptavantaḥ

original: rājyāṅgitā vā nibhṛtendriyatvādanaiṣṭhike mokṣakṛtābhimānāḥ // Bc_9.50 //
analyzed: vā nibhṛta indriya tvāt anaiṣṭhike mokṣa kṛta abhimānāḥ

original: teṣāṃ ca rājye 'stu śamo yathāvatprāpto vanaṃ nāhamaniścayena /
analyzed: teṣām ca rājye stu śamaḥ yathāvat prāptaḥ vanam na aham aniścayena

original: chittvā hi pāśaṃ gṛhabandhusaṃjñaṃ muktaḥ punarna pravivikṣurasmi // Bc_9.51 //
analyzed: chittvā hi pāśam gṛha bandhu saṃjñam muktaḥ punar na pravivikṣuḥ asmi

original: ityātmavijñānaguṇānurūpaṃ muktaspṛhaṃ hetumadūrjitaṃ ca /
analyzed: iti ātma vijñāna guṇa anurūpam mukta spṛham hetumat ūrjitam ca

original: śrutvā narendrātmajamuktavantaṃ pratyuttaraṃ mantradharo 'pyuvāca // Bc_9.52 //
analyzed: śrutvā narendra ātmajam uktavantam pratyuttaram mantradharaḥ u pi uvāca

original: yo niścayo dharmavidhau tavāyaṃ nāyaṃ na yukto na tu kālayuktaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ niścayaḥ dharma vidhau tava ayam na ayam na yuktaḥ na tu kāla yuktaḥ

original: śokāya dattvā pitaraṃ vayaḥsthaṃ syāddharmakāmasya hi te na dharmaḥ // Bc_9.53 //
analyzed: śokāya dattvā pitaram vayaḥstham syāt dharma kāmasya hi te na dharmaḥ

original: nūnaṃ ca buddhistava nātisūkṣmā dharmārthakāmeṣvavicakṣaṇā vā /
analyzed: nūnam ca buddhiḥ tava na ati sūkṣmā dharma artha kāmeṣu avicakṣaṇā vā

original: hetoradṛṣṭasya phalasya yastvaṃ pratyakṣamartha paribhūya yāsi // Bc_9.54 //
analyzed: hetoḥ adṛṣṭasya phalasya yaḥ tvam pratyakṣam artha paribhūya yāsi

original: punarbhavo 'stīti ca kecidāhurnāstīti kecinniyatapratijñāḥ /
analyzed: punarbhavaḥ sti iti ca kecid āhuḥ na asti iti kecid niyata pratijñāḥ

original: evaṃ yadā saṃśayito 'yamarthastasmātkṣamaṃ bhoktumupasthitā śrīḥ // Bc_9.55 //
analyzed: evam yadā saṃśayitaḥ yam arthaḥ tasmāt kṣamam bhoktum upasthitā śrīḥ

original: bhūyaḥ pravṛttiryadi kācidasti raṃsyāmahe tatra yathopapattau /
analyzed: bhūyas pravṛttiḥ yadi kācid asti raṃsyāmahe tatra yathā upapattau

original: atha pravṛttiḥ parato na kācitsiddhau 'prayatnājjagato 'sya mokṣaḥ // Bc_9.56 //
analyzed: atha pravṛttiḥ paratas na kācid siddhau prayatnāt jagataḥ sya mokṣaḥ

original: astīti kecitparalokamāhurmokṣasya yogaṃ na tu varṇayanti /
analyzed: asti iti kecid para lokam āhuḥ mokṣasya yogam na tu varṇayanti

original: agneryathā hyauṣṇyamapāṃ dravatvaṃ tadvatpravṛttau prakṛtiṃ vadanti // Bc_9.57 //
analyzed: agneḥ yathā hi auṣṇyam apām drava tvam tadvat pravṛttau prakṛtim vadanti

original: kecitsvabhāvāditi varṇayanti śubhāśubhaṃ caiva bhavābhavau ca /
analyzed: kecid svabhāvāt iti varṇayanti śubha aśubham ca eva bhava abhavau ca

original: svābhāvikaṃ sarvamidaṃ ca yasmādato 'pi mogho bhavati prayatnaḥ // Bc_9.58 //
analyzed: svābhāvikam sarvam idam ca moghaḥ bhavati prayatnaḥ

original: yadindriyāṇāṃ niyataḥ pracāraḥ priyāpriyatvaṃ viṣayeṣu caiva /
analyzed: yat indriyāṇām niyataḥ pracāraḥ priya apriya tvam viṣayeṣu ca eva

original: saṃyujyate yajjarayārtibhiśca kastatra yatno nanu sa svabhāvaḥ // Bc_9.59 //
analyzed: saṃyujyate yat jarayā ārtibhiḥ ca kaḥ tatra yatnaḥ nanu sa svabhāvaḥ

original: adbhirhutāśaḥ śamamabhyupaiti tejāṃsi cāpo gamayanti śoṣam /
analyzed: adbhiḥ hutāśaḥ śamam abhyupaiti tejāṃsi ca apaḥ gamayanti śoṣam

original: bhinnāni bhūtāni śarīrasaṃsthānyaikyaṃ ca gatvā jagadudvahanti // Bc_9.60 //
analyzed: bhinnāni bhūtāni śarīra saṃsthāni aikyam ca gatvā jagat udvahanti

original: yatpāṇipādodarapṛṣṭhamūrdhnā nirvartate garbhagatasya bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: yat pāṇi pāda udara pṛṣṭha mūrdhnā nirvartate garbha gatasya bhāvaḥ

original: yadātmanastasya ca tena yogaḥ svābhāvikaṃ tatkathayanti tajjñāḥ // Bc_9.61 //
analyzed: yadā ātmanaḥ tasya ca tena yogaḥ svābhāvikam tat kathayanti tad jñāḥ

original: kaḥ kaṇṭakasya prakaroti taikṣṇyaṃ vicitrabhāvaṃ mṛgapakṣiṇāṃ vā /
analyzed: kaḥ kaṇṭakasya prakaroti taikṣṇyam vicitra bhāvam mṛga pakṣiṇām vā

original: svabhāvataḥ sarvamidaṃ pravṛttaṃ na kāmakāro 'sti kutaḥ prayatnaḥ // Bc_9.62 //
analyzed: svabhāvataḥ sarvam idam pravṛttam na kāma kāraḥ asti kutas prayatnaḥ

original: sarga vadantīśvaratastathānye tatra paryatne puruṣasya ko 'rthaḥ /
analyzed: sarga vadanti īśvarataḥ tathā anye tatra paryatne puruṣasya kaḥ rthaḥ

original: ya eva heturjagataḥ pravṛttau heturnivṛttau niyataḥ sa eva // Bc_9.63 //
analyzed: yaḥ eva hetuḥ jagataḥ pravṛttau hetuḥ nivṛttau niyataḥ saḥ eva

original: kecidvadantyātmanimittameva prādurbhavaṃ caiva bhavakṣayaṃ ca /
analyzed: kecid vadanti ātma nimittam eva prādurbhavam ca eva bhava kṣayam ca

original: prādurbhavaṃ tu pravadantyayatnādyatnena mokṣādhigamaṃ bruvanti // Bc_9.64 //
analyzed: prādurbhavam tu pravadanti ayatnāt yatnena mokṣa adhigamam bruvanti

original: naraḥ pitṛṇāmanṛṇaḥ prajābhirvedaiṛṣīṇāṃ kratubhiḥ surāṇām /
analyzed: naraḥ pitṛṇām anṛṇaḥ prajābhiḥ vedaiḥ ṛṣīṇām kratubhiḥ surāṇām

original: utpadyate sārdhamṛṇaistribhistairyasyāsti mokṣaḥ kila tasya mokṣaḥ // Bc_9.65 //
analyzed: utpadyate sārdham ṛṇaiḥ tribhiḥ taiḥ yasya asti mokṣaḥ kila tasya mokṣaḥ

original: ityevametena vidhikrameṇa mokṣaṃ sayatnasya vadanti tajjñāḥ /
analyzed: iti evam etena vidhi krameṇa mokṣam sa yatnasya vadanti tad jñāḥ

original: prayatnavanto 'pi hi vikrameṇa mumukṣavaḥ khedamavāpnuvanti // Bc_9.66 //
analyzed: prayatnavantaḥ hi vikrameṇa mumukṣavaḥ khedam avāpnuvanti

original: tatsaumya mokṣe yadi bhaktirasti nyāyena sevasva vidhiṃ yathoktam /
analyzed: tat saumya mokṣe yadi bhaktiḥ asti nyāyena sevasva vidhim yathoktam

original: evaṃ bhaviṣyatyupapattirasya saṃtāpanāśaśca narādhipasya // Bc_9.67 //
analyzed: evam bhaviṣyati upapattiḥ asya saṃtāpa nāśaḥ ca narādhipasya

original: yā ca pravṛttā tava doṣabuddhistapovanebhyo bhavanaṃ praveṣṭum /
analyzed: yā ca pravṛttā tava doṣa buddhiḥ tapaḥ vanebhyaḥ bhavanam praveṣṭum

original: tatrāpi cintā tava tāta mā bhūta pūrve 'pi jagmuḥ svagṛhānvanebhyaḥ // Bc_9.68 //
analyzed: tatra api cintā tava tāta mā bhūta pūrve jagmuḥ sva gṛhān vanebhyaḥ

original: tapovanastho 'pi vṛtaḥ prajābhirjagāma rājā puramambarīṣaḥ /
analyzed: tapaḥ vana sthaḥ pi vṛtaḥ prajābhiḥ jagāma rājā puram ambarīṣaḥ

original: tathā mahīṃ viprakṛtāmanāryaistapovanādetya rarakṣa rāmaḥ // Bc_9.69 //
analyzed: tathā mahīm viprakṛtām anāryaiḥ tapaḥ vanāt etya rarakṣa rāmaḥ

original: tathaiva śālvādhipatirdrumākhyo vanātsasūranurnagaraṃ viveśa /
analyzed: tathā eva śālva adhipatiḥ druma ākhyaḥ vanāt sasūranuḥ nagaram viveśa

original: brahmārṣibhūtaśca munervasiṣṭhāddadhre śriyaṃ sāṃkṛtirantidevaḥ // Bc_9.70 //
analyzed: brahma ārṣi bhūtaḥ ca muneḥ vasiṣṭhāt dadhre śriyam sāṃkṛtiḥ antidevaḥ

original: evaṃvidhā dharmayaśaḥpradīptā vanāni hitvā bhavanānyatīyuḥ /
analyzed: evaṃvidhāḥ dharma yaśaḥ pradīptāḥ vanāni hitvā bhavanāni atīyuḥ

original: tasmānna doṣo 'sti gṛhaṃ prayātuṃ tapovanāddharmanimittameva // Bc_9.71 //
analyzed: tasmāt na doṣaḥ sti gṛham prayātum tapaḥ vanāt dharma nimittam eva

original: tato vacastasya niśamya mantriṇaḥ priyaṃ hitaṃ caiva nṛpasya cakṣuṣaḥ /
analyzed: tatas vacaḥ tasya niśamya mantriṇaḥ priyam hitam ca eva nṛpasya cakṣuṣaḥ

original: anūnamavyastamasaktamadrutaṃ dhṛtau sthito rājasuto 'bravīdvacaḥ // Bc_9.72 //
analyzed: anūnam avyastam asaktam adrutam dhṛtau sthitaḥ rāja sutaḥ bravīt vacaḥ

original: ihāsti nāstīti ya eṣa saṃśayaḥ parasya vākyairna mamātra niścayaḥ /
analyzed: iha asti na asti iti yaḥ eṣa saṃśayaḥ parasya vākyaiḥ na mama atra niścayaḥ

original: avetya tattvaṃ tapasā śamena ca svayaṃ grahīṣyāmi yadatra niścitam // Bc_9.73 //
analyzed: avetya tattvam tapasā śamena ca svayam grahīṣyāmi yat atra niścitam

original: na me kṣamaṃ saṃśayajaṃ hi darśanaṃ grahītumavyaktaparasparāhatam /
analyzed: na me kṣamam saṃśaya jam hi darśanam grahītum avyakta paraspara āhatam

original: budhaḥ parapratyayato hi ko vrajejjano 'ndhakāre 'ndha ivāndhadeśikaḥ // Bc_9.74 //
analyzed: budhaḥ para pratyayataḥ hi kaḥ vrajet janaḥ ndhakāre ndhaḥ iva andha deśikaḥ

original: adṛṣṭatattvasya sato 'pi kiṃ tu me śubhāśubhe saṃśayitu śubhe matiḥ /
analyzed: adṛṣṭa tattvasya sataḥ kim tu me śubha aśubhe śubhe matiḥ

original: vṛthāpi khedo hi varaṃ śubhātmanaḥ sukhaṃ na tattve 'pi vigarhitātmanaḥ // Bc_9.75 //
analyzed: vṛthā api khedaḥ hi varam śubha ātmanaḥ sukham na tattve vigarhita ātmanaḥ

original: imaṃ tu dṛṣṭvāgamamavyavasthitaṃ yaduktamāpttaistadavehi sādhviti /
analyzed: imam tu dṛṣṭvā āgamam avyavasthitam yat uktam āptaiḥ tat avehi sādhu iti

original: prahīṇadoṣatvamavehi cāptatāṃ prahīṇadoṣo hyanṛtaṃ na vakṣyati // Bc_9.76 //
analyzed: prahīṇa doṣa tvam avehi ca āpta tām prahīṇa doṣaḥ hi anṛtam na vakṣyati

original: gṛhapraveśaṃ prati yacca me bhavānuvāca rāmaprabhṛtīnnidarśanam /
analyzed: gṛha praveśam prati yat ca me bhavān uvāca rāma prabhṛtīn nidarśanam

original: na te pramāṇaṃ na hi dharmaniścayaiṣvalaṃ pramāṇāya parikṣatavratāḥ // Bc_9.77 //
analyzed: na te pramāṇam na hi dharma niścayaiṣu alam pramāṇāya parikṣata vratāḥ

original: tadevamapyeva ravirmahī patedapi sthiratvaṃ himavān giristyajet /
analyzed: tat evam api eva raviḥ mahī patet api sthira tvam himavān giriḥ tyajet

original: adṛṣṭatattvo viṣayonmukhendriyaḥ śrayeya na tveva gṛhān pṛthagjanaḥ // Bc_9.78 //
analyzed: adṛṣṭa tattvaḥ viṣaya unmukha indriyaḥ śrayeya na tu eva gṛhān pṛthagjanaḥ

original: ahaṃ viśeyaṃ jvalitaṃ hutāśanaṃ na cākṛtārthaḥ praviśeyamālayam /
analyzed: aham viśeyam jvalitam hutāśanam na ca akṛtārthaḥ praviśeyam ālayam

original: iti pratijñāṃ sa cakāra garvito yatheṣṭamutthāya ca nirmamo yayau // Bc_9.79 //
analyzed: iti pratijñām sa cakāra garvitaḥ yatheṣṭam utthāya ca nirmamaḥ yayau

original: tataḥ sabāṣpau sacivadvijābubhau niśamya tasya sthirameva niścayam /
analyzed: tatas sa bāṣpau saciva dvijau ubhau niśamya tasya sthiram eva niścayam

original: viṣaṇṇavaktrāvanugamya duḥkhitau śanairagatyā purameva jagmatuḥ // Bc_9.80 //
analyzed: viṣaṇṇa vaktrau anugamya duḥkhitau śanais agatyā puram eva jagmatuḥ

original: tatsnehādatha nṛpateśca bhaktitastau sāpekṣaṃ pratiyayatuśca tasthatuśca /
analyzed: tad snehāt atha nṛpateḥ ca bhaktitaḥ tau sa apekṣam pratiyayatuḥ ca tasthatuḥ ca

original: durdharṣa ravimiva dīptamātmabhāsā taṃ draṣṭuṃ na hi pathi śekaturna moktum // Bc_9.81 //
analyzed: durdharṣa ravim iva dīptam ātma bhāsā tam draṣṭum na hi pathi śekatuḥ na moktum

original: tau jñātuṃ paramagatergatiṃ tu tasya pracchannāṃścarapuruṣāñchucīnvidhāya /
analyzed: tau jñātum parama gateḥ gatim tu tasya pracchannān cara puruṣān śucīn vidhāya

original: rājānaṃ priyasutalālasaṃ nu gatvā drakṣyāvaḥ kathamiti jagmatuḥ kathaṃcitu // Bc_9.82 //
analyzed: rājānam priya suta lālasam nu gatvā drakṣyāvaḥ katham iti jagmatuḥ kathaṃcid tu

original: iti buddhacarite mahākāvye kumārānveṣaṇoṃ nāma navamaḥ sargaḥ // 9 //
analyzed: iti buddhacarite mahākāvye kumārānveṣaṇīḥ nāma navamaḥ sargaḥ

original: sa rājavatsaḥ pṛthupīnavakṣāstau havyamantrādhikṛtau vihāya /
analyzed: sa rāja vatsaḥ pṛthu pīna vakṣāḥ tau havya mantra adhikṛtau vihāya

original: uttīrya gaṅgāṃ pracalattaraṅgāṃ śrīmadgṛhaṃ rājagṛhaṃ jagāma // Bc_10.1 //
analyzed: uttīrya gaṅgām pracalat taraṅgām śrīmat gṛham rājagṛham jagāma

original: śailaiḥ suguptaṃ ca vibhūṣitaṃ ca dhṛtaṃ ca pūtaṃ ca śivaistapodaiḥ /
analyzed: śailaiḥ su guptam ca vibhūṣitam ca dhṛtam ca pūtam ca śivaiḥ tapaḥ daiḥ

original: pañcācalāṅkaṃ nagaraṃ prapede śāntaḥ svayaṃbhūriva nākapṛṣṭham // Bc_10.2 //
analyzed: pañca acala aṅkam nagaram prapede śāntaḥ svayaṃbhūḥ iva nāka pṛṣṭham

original: gāmbhīryamojaśca niśāmya tasya vapuśca dīptaṃ puruṣānatītya /
analyzed: gāmbhīryam ojaḥ ca niśāmya tasya vapuḥ ca dīptam puruṣān atītya

original: visismiye tatra janastadānīṃ sthāṇūvratasyeva vṛṣādhvajāsya // Bc_10.3 //
analyzed: visismiye tatra janaḥ tadānīm sthāṇū vratasya iva vṛṣādhvaja asya

original: taṃ prekṣya yo 'nyena yayau sa tasthau yastatra tasthau pathi so 'nvagacchat /
analyzed: tam prekṣya yaḥ nyena yayau sa tasthau yaḥ tatra tasthau pathi saḥ nvagacchat

original: drutaṃ yayau yaḥ sa jagāma dhīraṃ yaḥ kaścidāste sma sa cotpapāta // Bc_10.4 //
analyzed: drutam yayau yaḥ sa jagāma dhīram yaḥ kaścid āste sma sa ca utpapāta

original: kaścittamānarca janaḥ karābhyāṃ satkṛtya kaścicchirasā vavande /
analyzed: kaścid tam ānarca janaḥ karābhyām satkṛtya kaścid śirasā vavande

original: snigdhena kaścidvacasābhyanandanainaṃ jagāmāpratipūjya kaścit // Bc_10.5 //
analyzed: snigdhena kaścid vacasā abhyananda na enam jagāma a pratipūjya kaścid

original: taṃ jihriyuḥ prekṣya vicitraveṣāḥ prakīrṇavācaḥ pathi maunamīyuḥ /
analyzed: tam jihriyuḥ prekṣya vicitra veṣāḥ prakīrṇa vācaḥ pathi maunam īyuḥ

original: dharmasya sākṣādiva saṃnikarṣe na kaścidanyāyamatirbabhūva // Bc_10.6 //
analyzed: dharmasya sākṣāt iva saṃnikarṣe na kaścid anyāya matiḥ babhūva

original: anyakriyāṇāmapi rājamārge strīṇāṃ nṛṇāṃ vā bahumānapūrvam /
analyzed: anya kriyāṇām api rājamārge strīṇām nṛṇām vā bahu māna pūrvam

original: taṃ devakalpaṃ naradevasūnuṃ nirīkṣamāṇā na tatarpa dṛṣṭiḥ // Bc_10.7 //
analyzed: tam deva kalpam naradeva sūnum nirīkṣamāṇā na tatarpa dṛṣṭiḥ

original: bhruvau lalāṭaṃ mukhamīkṣaṇe vā vapuḥ karau vā caraṇau gatiṃ vā /
analyzed: bhruvau lalāṭam mukham īkṣaṇe vā vapuḥ karau vā caraṇau gatim vā

original: yadeva yastasya dadarśa tatra tadeva tasyātha babandha cakṣuḥ // Bc_10.8 //
analyzed: yat eva yaḥ tasya dadarśa tatra tat eva tasya atha babandha cakṣuḥ

original: dṛṣṭvā ca sorṇabhruvamāyatākṣaṃ jvalaccharīraṃ śubhajālahastam /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca sa ūrṇa bhruvam āyata akṣam jvalat śarīram śubha jāla hastam

original: ta bhikṣuveṣaṃ kṣitipālanārha saṃcukṣubhe rājagṛhasya lakṣmīḥ // Bc_10.9 //
analyzed: bhikṣu veṣam kṣiti pālana arha saṃcukṣubhe rājagṛhasya lakṣmīḥ

original: śreṇyo 'tha bhartā magadhājirasya bāhyādvimānādvipulaṃ janaugham /
analyzed: śreṇyaḥ tha bhartā magadha ajirasya bāhyāt vimānāt vipulam jana ogham

original: dadarśa papraccha ca tasya hetuṃ tatastamasmai puruṣaḥ śaśaṃsa // Bc_10.10 //
analyzed: dadarśa papraccha ca tasya hetum tatas tam asmai puruṣaḥ śaśaṃsa

original: jñānaṃ paraṃ vā pṛthivīśriyaṃ vā viprairya ukto 'dhigamiṣyatīti /
analyzed: jñānam param vā pṛthivī śriyam vā vipraiḥ yaḥ uktaḥ dhigamiṣyati iti

original: sa eṣa śākyādhipatestanūjo nirīkṣyate pravrajito janena // Bc_10.11 //
analyzed: saḥ eṣa śākya adhipateḥ tanūjaḥ nirīkṣyate pravrajitaḥ janena

original: tataḥ śrutārtho manasāgatāstho rājā babhāṣe puruṣaṃ tameva /
analyzed: tatas śruta arthaḥ manasā āgata āsthaḥ rājā babhāṣe puruṣam tam eva

original: vijñāyatāṃ kva pratigacchatīti tathetyathainaṃ puruṣo 'nvagacchat // Bc_10.12 //
analyzed: vijñāyatām kva pratigacchati iti tathā iti atha enam puruṣaḥ nvagacchat

original: alolacakṣuryugamātradarśī nivṛttavāgyantritamandagāmī /
analyzed: alola cakṣuḥ yuga mātra darśī nivṛtta vāc yantrita manda gāmī

original: cacāra bhikṣāṃ sa tu bhikṣuvaryo nidhāya gātrāṇi calaṃ ca cetaḥ // Bc_10.13 //
analyzed: cacāra bhikṣām sa tu bhikṣu varyaḥ nidhāya gātrāṇi calam ca cetaḥ

original: ādāya bhaikṣaṃ ca yathopapannaṃ yayau gireḥ prasravaṇaṃ viviktam /
analyzed: ādāya bhaikṣam ca yathopapannam yayau gireḥ prasravaṇam viviktam

original: nyāyena tatrābhyavahṛtya cainanmahīdharaṃ pāṇḍavamāruroha // Bc_10.14 //
analyzed: nyāyena tatra abhyavahṛtya ca enat mahīdharam pāṇḍavam āruroha

original: tasminnavau lodhravanopagūḍhe mayūranādapratipurṇakuñje /
analyzed: tasmin avau lodhra vana upagūḍhe mayūra nāda pratipurṇa kuñje

original: kāṣāyavāsāḥ sa babhau nṛsūryo yathodayasyopari bālasūryaḥ // Bc_10.15 //
analyzed: kāṣāya vāsāḥ sa babhau nṛ sūryaḥ yathā udayasya upari bāla sūryaḥ

original: tatrainamālokya sa rājabhṛtyaḥ śreṇyāya rājñe kathayāṃcakāra /
analyzed: tatra enam ālokya sa rāja bhṛtyaḥ śreṇyāya rājñe kathayāṃcakāra

original: saṃśrutya rājā sa ca bāhumānyāttatra pratasthe nibhṛtānuyātraḥ // Bc_10.16 //
analyzed: saṃśrutya rājā sa ca bāhumānyāt tatra pratasthe nibhṛta anuyātraḥ

original: sa pāṇḍavaṃ pāṇḍavatulyavīryaḥ śailottamaṃ śailasamānavarṣmā /
analyzed: sa pāṇḍavam pāṇḍava tulya vīryaḥ śaila uttamam śaila samāna varṣmā

original: maulīdharaḥ siṃhagatirnṛsiṃhaścalatsaṭaḥ siṃha ivāruroha // Bc_10.17 //
analyzed: maulīdharaḥ siṃha gatiḥ nṛ siṃhaḥ calat saṭaḥ siṃhaḥ iva āruroha

original: tataḥ sma tasyopari śṛṅgabhūtaṃ śāntendriyaṃ paśyati bodhisattvam /
analyzed: tatas sma tasya upari śṛṅga bhūtam śānta indriyam paśyati bodhisattvam

original: paryaṅkamāsthāya virocamānaṃ śaśāṅkamudyantamivābhrakuñjāt // Bc_10.18 //
analyzed: paryaṅkam āsthāya virocamānam śaśāṅkam udyantam iva abhra kuñjāt

original: taṃ rupalakṣmyā ca śamena caiva dharmasya nirmāṇamivopaviṣṭam /
analyzed: tam rupa lakṣmyā ca śamena ca eva dharmasya nirmāṇam iva upaviṣṭam

original: savismayaḥ praśrayavānnarendraḥ svayaṃbhūvaṃ śakra ivopatasthe // Bc_10.19 //
analyzed: sa vismayaḥ praśrayavān narendraḥ svayaṃbhūvam śakraḥ iva upatasthe

original: taṃ nyāyato nyāyavidāṃ variṣṭhaṃ sametya papraccha ca dhātusāmyam /
analyzed: tam nyāyataḥ nyāya vidām variṣṭham sametya papraccha ca dhātu sāmyam

original: sa cāpyavocatsadṛśena sāmnā nṛpaṃ manaḥsvāsthyamanāmayaṃ ca // Bc_10.20 //
analyzed: sa ca api avocat sadṛśena sāmnā nṛpam manaḥ svāsthyam anāmayam ca

original: tataḥ śucau vāraṇakarṇanīle śilātale saṃniṣasāda rājā /
analyzed: tatas śucau vāraṇa karṇa nīle śilā tale saṃniṣasāda rājā

original: upopaviśyānumataśca tasya bhāvaṃ vijijñāsuridaṃ babhāṣe // Bc_10.21 //
analyzed: upopaviśya anumataḥ ca tasya bhāvam vijijñāsuḥ idam babhāṣe

original: prītiḥ parā me bhavataḥ kulena kramāgatā caiva parīkṣitā ca /
analyzed: prītiḥ parā me bhavataḥ kulena krama āgatā ca eva parīkṣitā ca

original: jātā vivakṣā svavayo yato me tasmādidaṃ snehavaco nibodha // Bc_10.22 //
analyzed: jātā vivakṣā sva vayaḥ yatas me tasmāt idam sneha vacaḥ nibodha

original: ādityapūrva vipulaṃ kulaṃ te navaṃ vayo dīptamidaṃ vapuśca /
analyzed: āditya pūrva vipulam kulam te navam vayaḥ dīptam idam vapuḥ ca

original: kasmādiyaṃ te matirakrameṇa bhaikṣāka evābhiratā na rājye // Bc_10.23 //
analyzed: kasmāt iyam te matiḥ akrameṇa bhaikṣāke eva abhiratā na rājye

original: gātraṃ hi te lohitacandanārhaṃ kāṣāyasaṃśleṣamanarhametat /
analyzed: gātram hi te lohita candana arham kāṣāya saṃśleṣam anarham etat

original: hastaḥ prajāpālanayogya eṣa bhoktuṃ na cārhaḥ paradattamannam // Bc_10.24 //
analyzed: hastaḥ prajā pālana yogyaḥ eṣa bhoktum na ca arhaḥ para dattam annam

original: tatsaumya rājyaṃ yadi paitṛkaṃ tvaṃ snehātpiturnecchasi vikrameṇa /
