analyzed: tat saumya rājyam yadi paitṛkam tvam snehāt pituḥ nā icchasi vikrameṇa

original: na ca kramaṃ marṣayituṃ matiste bhuṅkṣvārdhamasmādviṣayasya śīghram // Bc_10.25 //
analyzed: na ca kramam marṣayitum matiḥ te bhuṅkṣva ardham asmāt viṣayasya śīghram

original: evaṃ hi na syātsvajanāvamardaḥ kālakrameṇāpi śamaśrayā śrīḥ /
analyzed: evam hi na syāt sva jana avamardaḥ kāla krameṇa api śama śrayā śrīḥ

original: tasmātkuruṣva praṇayaṃ mayi tvaṃ sadbhiḥ sahīyā hi satāṃ samṛddhiḥ // Bc_10.26 //
analyzed: tasmāt kuruṣva praṇayam mayi tvam sadbhiḥ sahīyāḥ hi satām samṛddhiḥ

original: atha tvidānī kulagarvitatvādasmāsu viśrambhaguṇo na te 'sti /
analyzed: atha tu idānī kula garvita tvāt asmāsu viśrambha guṇaḥ na te sti

original: vyūḍhānyanīkāni vigāhya bāṇairmayā sahāyena parān jigīṣa // Bc_10.27 //
analyzed: vyūḍhāni anīkāni vigāhya bāṇaiḥ mayā sahāyena parān jigīṣa

original: tadbuddhimatrānyatarāṃ vṛṇīṣva dharmārthakāmānvidhivadbhajasva /
analyzed: tad buddhim atra anyatarām vṛṇīṣva dharma artha kāmān vidhivat bhajasva

original: vyatyasya rāgādiha hi trivarga pretyeha ca bhraṃśamavāpnuvanti // Bc_10.28 //
analyzed: vyatyasya rāgāt iha hi trivarga pretya iha ca bhraṃśam avāpnuvanti

original: yo hyarthadharmau paripīḍya kāmaḥ syāddharmakāmau paribhūya cārthaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ hi artha dharmau paripīḍya kāmaḥ syāt dharma kāmau paribhūya ca arthaḥ

original: kāmārthayoścoparameṇa dharmastyājyaḥ sa kṛtsno yadi kāṅkṣito 'rthaḥ // Bc_10.29 //
analyzed: kāma arthayoḥ ca uparameṇa dharmaḥ tyājyaḥ sa kṛtsnaḥ yadi kāṅkṣitaḥ rthaḥ

original: tasmāttrivargasya niṣevaṇena tvaṃ rūpametatsaphalaṃ kuruṣva /
analyzed: tasmāt trivargasya niṣevaṇena tvam rūpam etat sa phalam kuruṣva

original: dharmārthakāmādhigamaṃ hyanūnaṃ nṛṇāmanūnaṃ puruṣārthamāhuḥ // Bc_10.30 //
analyzed: dharma artha kāma adhigamam hi anūnam nṛṇām anūnam puruṣa artham āhuḥ

original: tanniṣphalau nārhasi kartumetau pīnau bhujau cāpavikarṣaṇārhau /
analyzed: tat niṣphalau nā arhasi kartum etau pīnau bhujau cāpa vikarṣaṇa arhau

original: māndhātṛvajjetumimau hi yogyau lokānapi trīniha kiṃ punargām // Bc_10.31 //
analyzed: māndhātṛ vat jetum imau hi yogyau lokān api trīn iha kim punar gām

original: snehena khalvetadahaṃ bravīmi naiśvaryarāgeṇa na vismayena /
analyzed: snehena khalu etat aham bravīmi na aiśvarya rāgeṇa na vismayena

original: imaṃ hi dṛṣṭvā tava bhikṣuveṣaṃ jātānukampo 'smyapi cāgatāśruḥ // Bc_10.32 //
analyzed: imam hi dṛṣṭvā tava bhikṣu veṣam jāta anukampaḥ smi api ca āgata aśruḥ

original: yāvatsvavaṃśapratirūpa rūpaṃ na te jarābhyetyabhibhūya bhūyaḥ /
analyzed: yāvat sva vaṃśa pratirūpa rūpam na te jarā abhyeti abhibhūya bhūyas

original: tadbhuṅkṣva bhikṣāśramakāma kāmān kāle 'si kartā priyadharma dharmam // Bc_10.33 //
analyzed: tat bhuṅkṣva bhikṣā āśrama kāma kāmān kāle si kartā priya dharma dharmam

original: śaknoti jīrṇaḥ khalu dharmamāptuṃ kāmopabhogeṣvagatirjarāyāḥ /
analyzed: śaknoti jīrṇaḥ khalu dharmam āptum kāma upabhogeṣu agatiḥ jarāyāḥ

original: ataśca yūnaḥ kathayanti kāmānmadhyasya vittaṃ sthavirasya dharmam // Bc_10.34 //
analyzed: atas ca yūnaḥ kathayanti kāmān madhyasya vittam sthavirasya dharmam

original: dharmasya cārthasya ca jīvaloke pratyarthibhutāni hi yauvanāni /
analyzed: dharmasya ca arthasya ca jīva loke pratyarthi bhutāni hi yauvanāni

original: saṃrakṣyamāṇānyapi durgrahāṇi kāmā yatastena pathā haranti // Bc_10.35 //
analyzed: saṃrakṣyamāṇāni api durgrahāṇi kāmāḥ yatas tena pathā haranti

original: vayāṃsi jīrṇāni vimarśavanti dhīrāṇyavasthānaparāyaṇāni /
analyzed: vayāṃsi jīrṇāni vimarśavanti dhīrāṇi avasthāna parāyaṇāni

original: alpena yatnena śamātmakāni bhavantyagatyaiva ca lajjayā ca // Bc_10.36 //
analyzed: alpena yatnena śama ātmakāni bhavanti agatyā eva ca lajjayā ca

original: ataśca lolaṃ viṣayapradhānaṃ pramattamakṣāntamadīrghadarśi /
analyzed: atas ca lolam viṣaya pradhānam pramattam a kṣāntam a dīrgha darśi

original: bahucchalaṃ yauvanamabhyatītya nistīrya kāntāramivāśvasanti // Bc_10.37 //
analyzed: bahu chalam yauvanam abhyatītya nistīrya kāntāram iva āśvasanti

original: tasmādadhīraṃ capalapramādi navaṃ vayastāvadidaṃ vyapaitu /

original: gurūṇi vāsāṃsyagurūṇi caiva sukhāya śīte hyusukhāya dharme /
analyzed: gurūṇi vāsāṃsi agurūṇi ca eva sukhāya śīte hi usukhāya dharme

original: candrāṃśavaścandanameva coṣṇe sukhāya duḥkhāya bhavanti śīte // Bc_11.42 //
analyzed: candra aṃśavaḥ candanam eva ca uṣṇe sukhāya duḥkhāya bhavanti śīte

original: dvandvāni sarvasya yataḥ prasaktānyalābhalābhaprabhṛtīni loke /
analyzed: dvandvāni sarvasya yatas prasaktāni alābha lābha prabhṛtīni loke

original: ato 'pi naikāntasukho 'sti kaścinnaikāntaduḥkha puruṣaḥ pṛthivyām // Bc_11.43 //
analyzed: na ekānta sukhaḥ asti kaścid na ekānta duḥkha puruṣaḥ pṛthivyām

original: dṛṣṭvā vimiśrāṃ sukhaduḥkhatāṃ me rājyaṃ ca dāsyaṃ ca mataṃ samānam /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā vimiśrām sukha duḥkha tām me rājyam ca dāsyam ca matam samānam

original: nityaṃ hasatyeva hi naiva rājā na cāpi saṃtapyata eva dāsaḥ // Bc_11.44 //
analyzed: nityam hasati eva hi nā eva rājā na ca api saṃtapyate eva dāsaḥ

original: ājñā nṛpatve 'bhyadhiketi yatsyānmahānti duḥkhānyata eva rājñaḥ /
analyzed: ājñā nṛpa tve bhyadhikā iti yat syāt mahānti duḥkhāni atas eva rājñaḥ

original: āsaṅgakāṣṭhapratimo hi rājā lokasya hetoḥ parikhedameti // Bc_11.45 //
analyzed: āsaṅga kāṣṭha pratimaḥ hi rājā lokasya hetoḥ parikhedam eti

original: rājye nṛpastyāgini bavhamitre viśvāsamāgacchati cedvipannaḥ /
analyzed: rājye nṛpaḥ tyāgini viśvāsam āgacchati ced vipannaḥ

original: athāpi viśrambhamupaiti neha kiṃ nāma saukhyaṃ cakitasya rājñaḥ // Bc_11.46 //
analyzed: athā api viśrambham upaiti nā iha kim nāma saukhyam cakitasya rājñaḥ

original: yadā ca jitvāpi mahīṃ samagrāṃ vāsāya dṛṣṭaṃ puramekameva /
analyzed: yadā ca jitvā api mahīm samagrām vāsāya dṛṣṭam puram ekam eva

original: tatrāpi caikaṃ bhavanaṃ niṣevyaṃ śramaḥ parārthe nanu rājabhāvaḥ // Bc_11.47 //
analyzed: tatra api ca ekam bhavanam niṣevyam śramaḥ para arthe nanu rāja bhāvaḥ

original: rājño 'pi vāsoyugamekameva kṣutsaṃnirodhāya tathānnamātrā /
analyzed: rājñaḥ pi vāsaḥ yugam ekam eva kṣudh saṃnirodhāya tathā anna mātrā

original: śayyā tathaikāsanamekameva śeṣā viśeṣā nṛpatermadāya // Bc_11.48 //
analyzed: śayyā tathā ekā āsanam ekam eva śeṣāḥ viśeṣāḥ nṛpateḥ madāya

original: tuṣṭyarthametacca phalaṃ yadīṣṭamṛte 'pi rājyānmama tuṣṭirasti /
analyzed: tuṣṭi artham etat ca phalam yadi iṣṭam ṛte rājyāt mama tuṣṭiḥ asti

original: tuṣṭau ca satyāṃ puruṣasya loke sarve viśeṣā nanu nirviśeṣāḥ // Bc_11.49 //
analyzed: tuṣṭau ca satyām puruṣasya loke sarve viśeṣāḥ nanu nirviśeṣāḥ

original: tannāsmi kāmān prati saṃpratāryaḥ kṣemaṃ śivaṃ mārgamanuprapannaḥ /
analyzed: tat na asmi kāmān prati saṃpratāryaḥ kṣemam śivam mārgam anuprapannaḥ

original: smṛtvā suhṛttvaṃ tu punaḥ punarmā brūhi pratijñāṃ khalu pālayeti // Bc_11.50 //
analyzed: smṛtvā suhṛd tvam tu punar punar mā brūhi pratijñām khalu pālaya iti

original: na hyasmyamarṣeṇa vanaṃ praviṣṭo na śatrubāṇairavadhūtamauliḥ /
analyzed: na hi asmi amarṣeṇa vanam praviṣṭaḥ na śatru bāṇaiḥ avadhūta mauliḥ

original: kṛtaspṛho nāpi phalādhikebhyo gṛhṇāmi naitadvacanaṃ yataste // Bc_11.51 //
analyzed: kṛta spṛhaḥ nā api phala adhikebhyaḥ gṛhṇāmi nā etat vacanam yatas te

original: yo dandaśūkaṃ kupitaṃ bhujaṅgaṃ muktvā vyavasyeddhi punargrahītum /
analyzed: yaḥ dandaśūkam kupitam bhujaṅgam muktvā vyavasyet hi punar grahītum

original: dāhātmikāṃ vā jvalitāṃ tṛṇolkāṃ saṃtyajya kāmānsa punarbhajeta // Bc_11.52 //
analyzed: dāha ātmikām vā jvalitām tṛṇa ulkām saṃtyajya kāmān sa punar bhajeta

original: andhāya yaśca spṛhayedanandho baddhāya mukto vidhanāya cāḍhyaḥ /
analyzed: andhāya yaḥ ca spṛhayet an andhaḥ baddhāya muktaḥ vidhanāya ca āḍhyaḥ

original: unmattacittāya ca kalyacittaḥ spṛhāṃ sa kuryādviṣayātmakāya // Bc_11.53 //
analyzed: unmatta cittāya ca kalya cittaḥ spṛhām sa kuryāt viṣaya ātmakāya

original: bhaikṣopabhogīti ca nānukampyaḥ kṛtī jarāmṛtyubhayaṃ titīrṣuḥ /
analyzed: bhaikṣa upabhogī iti ca na anukampyaḥ kṛtī jarā mṛtyu bhayam titīrṣuḥ

original: ihottamaṃ śāntisukhaṃ ca yasya paratra duḥkhāni ca saṃvṛtāni // Bc_11.54 //
analyzed: iha uttamam śānti sukham ca yasya paratra duḥkhāni ca saṃvṛtāni

original: lakṣmyāṃ mahatyāmapi vartamānastṛṣṇābhibhūtastvanukampitavyaḥ /
analyzed: lakṣmyām mahatyām api vartamānaḥ tṛṣṇā abhibhūtaḥ tu anukampitavyaḥ

original: prāpnoti yaḥ śāntisukhaṃ na ceha paratra duḥkhai pratigṛhyate ca // Bc_11.55 //
analyzed: prāpnoti yaḥ śānti sukham na ca iha paratra duḥkhaiḥ pratigṛhyate ca

original: evaṃ tu vaktuṃ bhavato 'nurūpaṃ sattvasya vṛttasya kulasya caiva /
analyzed: evam tu vaktum bhavataḥ nurūpam sattvasya vṛttasya kulasya ca eva

original: mamāpi voḍhuṃ sadṛśaṃ pratijñāṃ sattvasya vṛttasya kulasya caiva // Bc_11.56 //
analyzed: mama api voḍhum sadṛśam pratijñām sattvasya vṛttasya kulasya ca eva

original: ahaṃ hi saṃsāraśareṇa viddho viniḥsṛtaḥ śāntimavāptukāmaḥ /
analyzed: aham hi saṃsāra śareṇa viddhaḥ viniḥsṛtaḥ śāntim avāptu kāmaḥ

original: neccheyamāptuṃ tridive 'pi rājyaṃ nirāmayaṃ kiṃ bata mānuṣeṣu // Bc_11.57 //
analyzed: na iccheyam āptum tridive rājyam nirāmayam kim bata mānuṣeṣu

original: trivargasevāṃ nṛpa yattu kṛtsnataḥ paro manuṣyārtha iti tvamāttha mām /
analyzed: trivarga sevām nṛpa yat tu kṛtsnataḥ paraḥ manuṣya arthaḥ iti tvam āttha mām

original: anartha ityeva mamātra darśanaṃ kṣayī trivargo hi na cāpi tarpakaḥ // Bc_11.58 //
analyzed: anarthaḥ iti eva mama atra darśanam kṣayī trivargaḥ hi na ca api tarpakaḥ

original: pade tu yasminna jarā na bhīrna rūṅ na janma naivoparamo na cādhayaḥ /
analyzed: pade tu yasmin na jarā na bhīḥ na rūj na janma na eva uparamaḥ na ca ādhayaḥ

original: tameva manye puruṣārthamuttamaṃ na vidyate yatra punaḥ punaḥ kriyā // Bc_11.59 //
analyzed: tam eva manye puruṣa artham uttamam na vidyate yatra punar punar kriyā

original: yadapyavoca paripālyatāṃ jarā nava vayo gacchati vikriyāmiti /
analyzed: yat api avoca paripālyatām jarā nava vayaḥ gacchati vikriyām iti

original: aniścayo 'ya capalaṃ hi dṛśyate jarāpyadhīrā dhṛtimacca yauvanam // Bc_11.60 //
analyzed: aniścayaḥ capalam hi dṛśyate jarā api adhīrā dhṛtimat ca yauvanam

original: svakarmadakṣaśca yadāntako jagad vayasu sarveṣvavaśa vikarṣati /
analyzed: sva karma dakṣaḥ ca yadā antakaḥ jagat vayasu vikarṣati

original: vināśakāle kathamavyavasthite jarā pratīkṣyā viduṣā śamepsunā // Bc_11.61 //
analyzed: vināśa kāle katham avyavasthite jarā pratīkṣyā viduṣā śama īpsunā

original: jarāyudho vyādhivikīrṇasāyako yadāntako vyādha ivāśivaḥ sthitaḥ /
analyzed: jarā āyudhaḥ vyādhi vikīrṇa sāyakaḥ yadā antakaḥ vyādhaḥ iva aśivaḥ sthitaḥ

original: prajāmṛgān bhāgyavanāśritāṃstudan vayaḥprakarṣa prati ko manorathaḥ // Bc_11.62 //
analyzed: prajā mṛgān bhāgyavan āśritān tudan vayaḥ prakarṣa prati kaḥ manorathaḥ

original: ato yuvā vā sthaviro 'thavā śiśustathā tvarāvāniha kartumarhati /
analyzed: atas yuvā vā śiśuḥ tathā tvarāvān iha kartum arhati

original: yathā bhaveddharmavataḥ kṛtātmanaḥ pravṛttiriṣṭā vinivṛttireva vā // Bc_11.63 //
analyzed: yathā bhavet dharmavataḥ kṛtātmanaḥ pravṛttiḥ iṣṭā vinivṛttiḥ eva vā

original: yadāttha cāpīṣṭaphalāṃ kulocitāṃ kuruṣva dharmāya makhakriyāmiti /
analyzed: yat āttha ca api iṣṭa phalām kula ucitām kuruṣva dharmāya makha kriyām iti

original: namo makhebhyo na hi kāmaye sukhaṃ parasya duḥkhakriyayā yadiṣyate // Bc_11.64 //
analyzed: namaḥ makhebhyaḥ na hi kāmaye sukham parasya duḥkha kriyayā yat iṣyate

original: paraṃ hi hantuṃ vivaśaṃ phalepsayā na yuktarūpa karuṇātmanaḥ sataḥ /
analyzed: param hi hantum vivaśam phala īpsayā na yukta rūpa karuṇa ātmanaḥ sataḥ

original: kratoḥ phalaṃ yadyapi śāśvataṃ bhavettathāpi kṛttvā kimu yatkṣayātmakam // Bc_11.65 //
analyzed: kratoḥ phalam yadi api śāśvatam bhavet tathā api kṛttvā kimu yat kṣaya ātmakam

original: bhavecca dharmo yadi nāparo vidhirvratena śīlena manaḥśamena vā /
analyzed: bhavet ca dharmaḥ yadi nā aparaḥ vidhiḥ vratena śīlena manaḥ śamena vā

original: tathāpi naivārhati sevituṃ kratuṃ viśasya yasmin paramucyate phalam // Bc_11.66 //
analyzed: tathā api nā evā arhati sevitum kratum viśasya yasmin param ucyate phalam

original: ihāpi tāvatpuruṣasya tiṣṭhataḥ pravartate yatparahiṃsayā sukham /
analyzed: iha api tāvat puruṣasya tiṣṭhataḥ pravartate yat para hiṃsayā sukham

original: tadapyaniṣṭaṃ saghṛṇasya dhīmato bhavāntare kiṃ bata yanna dṛśyate // Bc_11.67 //
analyzed: tat api aniṣṭam sa ghṛṇasya dhīmataḥ bhava antare kim bata yat na dṛśyate

original: na ca pratāryo 'smi phalapravṛttaye bhaveṣu rājan ramate na me manaḥ /
analyzed: na ca pratāryaḥ smi phala pravṛttaye bhaveṣu rājan ramate na me manaḥ

original: latā ivāmbhodharavṛṣṭitāḍitāḥ pravṛttayaḥ sarvagatā hi cañcalāḥ // Bc_11.68 //
analyzed: latāḥ iva ambhodhara vṛṣṭi tāḍitāḥ pravṛttayaḥ sarva gatāḥ hi cañcalāḥ

original: ihāgataścahamito didṛkṣayā munerarāḍasya vimokṣavādinaḥ /
analyzed: iha āgataḥ ca ham itas didṛkṣayā muneḥ arāḍasya vimokṣa vādinaḥ

original: prayāmi cādyaiva nṛpāstu te śivaṃ vacaḥ kṣamethā mama tattvaniṣṭhuram // Bc_11.69 //
analyzed: prayāmi ca adyā eva nṛpa astu te śivam vacaḥ kṣamethāḥ mama tattva niṣṭhuram

original: avendravaddivyava śaśvadarkavad guṇairava śreya ihāva gāmava /
analyzed: ava indra vat divi ava śaśvat arka vat guṇaiḥ ava śreyaḥ iha ava gām ava

original: avāyurāryairava satsutānava śriyaśca rājannava dharmamātmanaḥ // Bc_11.70 //
analyzed: ava āyuḥ āryaiḥ ava sat sutān ava śriyaḥ ca rājan ava dharmam ātmanaḥ

original: himāriketūdbhavasaṃbhavāntare yathā dvijo yāti vimokṣayaṃstanum /
analyzed: himāri ketu udbhava saṃbhava antare yathā dvijaḥ yāti vimokṣayan tanum

original: himāriśatrukṣayaśatrughātane tathāntare yāhi vimokṣayanmanaḥ // Bc_11.71 //
analyzed: himāri śatru kṣaya śatru ghātane tathā antare yāhi vimokṣayat manaḥ

original: nṛpo 'bravītsāñjalirāgataspṛho yatheṣṭamāpnotu bhavānavighnataḥ /
analyzed: nṛpaḥ bravīt sa añjaliḥ āgata spṛhaḥ yathā iṣṭam āpnotu bhavān avighnataḥ

original: avāpya kāle kṛtakṛtyatāmimāṃ mamāpi kāryo bhavatā tvanugrahaḥ // Bc_11.72 //
analyzed: avāpya kāle kṛtakṛtya tām imām mama api kāryaḥ bhavatā tu anugrahaḥ

original: sthiraṃ pratijñāya tatheti pārthive tataḥ sa vaiśvaṃtaramāśramaṃ yayau /
analyzed: sthiram pratijñāya tathā iti pārthive tatas sa vaiśvaṃtaram āśramam yayau

original: parivrajantaṃ tamudīkṣya vismito nṛpo 'pi vavrāja puri girivrajam // Bc_11.73 //
analyzed: parivrajantam tam udīkṣya vismitaḥ vavrāja puri girivrajam

original: iti buddhacarite mahākāvye kāmavigarhaṇo nāmaikādaśa sargaḥ // 11 //
analyzed: iti buddhacarite mahākāvye kāmavigarhaṇaḥ nāma ekādaśa sargaḥ  /

original: tataḥ śamavihārasya munerikṣvākucandramāḥ /
analyzed: tatas śama vihārasya muneḥ ikṣvāku candramāḥ

original: arāḍasyāśramaṃ bheje vapuṣā pūrayanniva // Bc_12.1 //
analyzed: arāḍasya āśramam bheje vapuṣā pūrayan iva

original: sa kālāmasagotreṇa tenālokyaiva dūrataḥ /
analyzed: sa kālāma sagotreṇa tena ālokya eva dūratas

original: uccaiḥ svāgatamityuktaḥ samīpamupajagmivān // Bc_12.2 //
analyzed: uccais svāgatam iti uktaḥ samīpam upajagmivān

original: tāvubhau nyāyataḥ pṛṣṭvā dhātusāmyaṃ parasparam /
analyzed: tau ubhau nyāyatas pṛṣṭvā dhātu sāmyam parasparam

original: dāravyormedhyayorvṛṣyoḥ śucau deśe niṣedatuḥ // Bc_12.3 //
analyzed: dāravyoḥ medhyayoḥ vṛṣyoḥ śucau deśe niṣedatuḥ

original: tamāsīnaṃ nṛpasutaṃ so 'bravīnmunisattamaḥ /
analyzed: tam āsīnam nṛpa sutam saḥ bravīt muni sattamaḥ

original: bahumānaviśālābhyāṃ darśanābhyāṃ pibanniva // Bc_12.4 //
analyzed: bahu māna viśālābhyām darśanābhyām piban iva

original: viditaṃ me yathā saumya niṣkrānto bhavanādasi /
analyzed: viditam me yathā saumya niṣkrāntaḥ bhavanāt asi

original: chittvā snehamayaṃ pāśaṃ pāśaṃ dṛpta iva dvipaḥ // Bc_12.5 //
analyzed: chittvā sneha mayam pāśam pāśam dṛptaḥ iva dvipaḥ

original: sarvathā dhṛtimaccaiva prājñaṃ caiva manastava /
analyzed: sarvathā dhṛtimat ca eva prājñam ca eva manaḥ tava

original: yastvaṃ prāptaḥ śriyaṃ tyaktvā latāṃ viṣaphalāmiva // Bc_12.6 //
analyzed: yaḥ tvam prāptaḥ śriyam tyaktvā latām viṣa phalām iva

original: nāścarya jīrṇavayaso yajjagmuḥ pārthivā vanam /
analyzed: na āścarya jīrṇa vayasaḥ yat jagmuḥ pārthivāḥ vanam

original: apatyebhyaḥ śriyaṃ dattvā bhuktocchiṣṭāmiva srajam // Bc_12.7 //
analyzed: apatyebhyaḥ śriyam dattvā bhukta ucchiṣṭām iva srajam

original: idaṃ me matamāścaryaṃ nave vayasi yadbhavān /
analyzed: idam me matam āścaryam nave vayasi yat bhavān

original: abhuktvaiva śriyaṃ prāptaḥ sthito viṣayagocare // Bc_12.8 //
analyzed: a bhuktvā eva śriyam prāptaḥ sthitaḥ viṣaya gocare

original: tadvijñātumimaṃ dharma paramaṃ bhājanaṃ bhavān /
analyzed: tat vijñātum imam dharma paramam bhājanam bhavān

original: jñānaplamavadhiṣṭhāya śīghraṃ duḥkhārṇavaṃ tara // Bc_12.9 //
analyzed: śīghram duḥkha arṇavam tara

original: śiṣye yadyapi vijñāte śāstraṃ kālena varṇyate /
analyzed: śiṣye yadi api vijñāte śāstram kālena varṇyate

original: gāmbhīryādvyavasāyācca na parīkṣyo bhavānmama // Bc_12.10 //
analyzed: gāmbhīryāt vyavasāyāt ca na parīkṣyaḥ bhavān mama

original: iti vākyamarāḍasya vijñāya sa nararṣabhaḥ /
analyzed: iti vākyam arāḍasya vijñāya sa nara ṛṣabhaḥ

original: babhūva paramaprītaḥ provācottarameva ca // Bc_12.11 //
analyzed: babhūva parama prītaḥ provāca uttaram eva ca

original: viraktasyāpi yadidaṃ saumukhyaṃ bhavataḥ param /
analyzed: viraktasya api yat idam saumukhyam bhavataḥ param

original: akṛtārtho 'pyanenāsmi kṛtārtha iva saṃprati // Bc_12.12 //
analyzed: akṛtārthaḥ pi anena asmi kṛtārthaḥ iva saṃprati

original: didṛkṣuriva hi jyotiryiyāsuriva daiśikam /
analyzed: didṛkṣuḥ iva hi jyotiḥ yiyāsuḥ iva daiśikam

original: tvaddarśanamahaṃ manye titīrṣuriva ca plavam // Bc_12.13 //
analyzed: tvad darśanam aham manye titīrṣuḥ iva ca plavam

original: tasmādarhasi tadvaktuṃ vaktavyaṃ yadi manyase /
analyzed: tasmāt arhasi tat vaktum vaktavyam yadi manyase

original: jarāmaraṇarogebhyo yathāyaṃ parimucyate // Bc_12.14 //
analyzed: jarā maraṇa rogebhyaḥ yathā ayam parimucyate

original: ityarāḍaḥ kumārasya māhātmyādeva coditaḥ /
analyzed: iti arāḍaḥ kumārasya māhātmyāt eva coditaḥ

original: saṃkṣiptaṃ kathayāṃcakre svasya śāstrasya niścayam // Bc_12.15 //
analyzed: saṃkṣiptam kathayāṃcakre svasya śāstrasya niścayam

original: śrūyatāmayamasmākaṃ siddhāntaḥ śṛṇvatāṃ vara /
analyzed: śrūyatām ayam asmākam siddhāntaḥ śṛṇvatām vara

original: yathā bhavati saṃsāro yathā caiva nivartate // Bc_12.16 //
analyzed: yathā bhavati saṃsāraḥ yathā ca eva nivartate

original: prakṛtiśca vikāraśca janma mṛtyurjareva ca /
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ ca vikāraḥ ca janma mṛtyuḥ jarā iva ca

original: tattāvatsattvamituktaṃ sthirasattva parehi tat // Bc_12.17 //
analyzed: tat tāvat sattvam iti uktam sthira sattva parehi tat

original: tatra tu prakṛtiṃ nāma viddhiṃ prakṛtikovida /
analyzed: tatra tu prakṛtim nāma viddhim prakṛti kovida

original: pañca bhūtānyahaṃkāraṃ buddhimavyaktameva ca // Bc_12.18 //
analyzed: pañca bhūtāni ahaṃkāram buddhim avyaktam eva ca

original: vikāra iti budhyasva viṣayānindriyāṇi ca /
analyzed: vikāraḥ iti budhyasva viṣayān indriyāṇi ca

original: pāṇipādaṃ ca vādaṃ ca pāyūpasthaṃ tathā manaḥ // Bc_12.19 //
analyzed: pāṇi pādam ca vādam ca pāyu upastham tathā manaḥ

original: asya kṣetrasya vijñānātkṣetrajña iti saṃjñi ca /
analyzed: asya kṣetrasya vijñānāt kṣetrajñaḥ iti saṃjñi ca

original: kṣetrajña iti cātmānaṃ kathayantyātmacintakāḥ // Bc_12.20 //
analyzed: kṣetrajñaḥ iti ca ātmānam kathayanti ātma cintakāḥ

original: saśiṣyaḥ kapilaśceha pratibuddha iti smṛtiḥ /
analyzed: sa śiṣyaḥ kapilaḥ ca iha pratibuddhaḥ iti smṛtiḥ

original: saputro 'pratibuddhastu prajāpatirihocyate // Bc_12.21 //
analyzed: sa putraḥ pratibuddhaḥ tu prajāpatiḥ iha ucyate

original: jāyate jīryate caiva bādhyate mriyate ca yat /
analyzed: jāyate jīryate ca eva bādhyate mriyate ca yat

original: tadvyaktamiti vijñeyamavyaktaṃ tu viparyayāt // Bc_12.22 //
analyzed: tat vyaktam iti vijñeyam avyaktam tu viparyayāt

original: ajñānaṃ karma tṛṣṇā ca jñeyāḥ saṃsārahetavaḥ /
analyzed: ajñānam karma tṛṣṇā ca jñeyāḥ saṃsāra hetavaḥ

original: sthito 'smiṃstritaye jantustatsattvaṃ nātivartate // Bc_12.23 //
analyzed: sthitaḥ smin tritaye jantuḥ tat sattvam na ativartate

original: vipratyayādahaṃkārātsaṃdehādabhisaṃplavāt /
analyzed: vipratyayāt ahaṃkārāt saṃdehāt abhisaṃplavāt

original: aviśeṣānupāyābhyāṃ saṅgādabhyavapātataḥ // Bc_12.24 //
analyzed: aviśeṣa anupāyābhyām saṅgāt abhyavapātataḥ

original: tatra vipratyayo nāma viparītaṃ pravartate /
analyzed: tatra vipratyayaḥ nāma viparītam pravartate

original: anyathā kurute kāryaṃ mantavyaṃ manyate 'nyathā // Bc_12.25 //
analyzed: anyathā kurute kāryam mantavyam manyate nyathā

original: bravīmyahamahaṃ vedmi gacchāmyahamahaṃ sthitaḥ /
analyzed: bravīmi aham aham vedmi gacchāmi aham aham sthitaḥ

original: itīhaivamahaṃkārastvanahaṃkāra vartate // Bc_12.26 //
analyzed: iti iha evam ahaṃkāraḥ tu anahaṃkāra vartate

original: yastu bhāvānasaṃdigdhānekībhāvena paśyati /
analyzed: yaḥ tu bhāvān asaṃdigdhān ekībhāvena paśyati

original: mṛtpiṇḍavadasaṃdeha saṃdehaḥ sa ihocyate // Bc_12.27 //
analyzed: mṛd piṇḍa vat asaṃdeha saṃdehaḥ saḥ iha ucyate

original: ya evāhaṃ sa evedaṃ mano buddhiśca karma ca /
analyzed: yaḥ eva aham saḥ eva idam manaḥ buddhiḥ ca karma ca

original: yaścaivaiṣa gaṇaḥ so 'hamiti yaḥ so 'bhisaṃplavaḥ // Bc_12.28 //
analyzed: yaḥ ca eva eṣa gaṇaḥ saḥ ham iti yaḥ saḥ bhisaṃplavaḥ

original: aviśeṣaṃ viśeṣajña pratibuddhāprabuddhayoḥ /
analyzed: aviśeṣam viśeṣa jña pratibuddha aprabuddhayoḥ

original: prakṛtīnāṃ ca yo veda so 'viśeṣa iti smṛtaḥ // Bc_12.29 //
analyzed: prakṛtīnām ca yaḥ veda saḥ viśeṣaḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: namaskāravaṣaṭkārau prokṣaṇābhyukṣaṇādayaḥ /
analyzed: namaskāra vaṣaṭkārau prokṣaṇa abhyukṣaṇa ādayaḥ

original: anupāya iti prājñairupāyajña praveditaḥ // Bc_12.30 //
analyzed: anupāyaḥ iti prājñaiḥ upāya jña praveditaḥ

original: sajjate yena durmedhā manovāgbuddhikarmabhiḥ /
analyzed: sajjate yena durmedhāḥ manaḥ vāc buddhi karmabhiḥ

original: viṣayeṣvanabhiṣvaṅga so 'bhiṣvaṅga iti smṛtaḥ // Bc_12.31 //
analyzed: viṣayeṣu anabhiṣvaṅga saḥ bhiṣvaṅgaḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: mamedamahamasyeti yadduḥkhamabhimanyate /
analyzed: mama idam aham asya iti yat duḥkham abhimanyate

original: vijñeyo 'bhyavapātaḥ sa saṃsāre yena pātyate // Bc_12.32 //
analyzed: vijñeyaḥ bhyavapātaḥ sa saṃsāre yena pātyate

original: ityavidyāṃ hi vidvānsa pañcaparvā samīhate /
analyzed: iti avidyām hi vidvān sa pañca parvā samīhate

original: tamo mohaṃ mahāmohaṃ tāmisradvayameva ca // Bc_12.33 //
analyzed: tamaḥ moham mahāmoham tāmisra dvayam eva ca

original: tatrālasyaṃ tamo viddhi mohaṃ mṛtyuṃ ca janma ca /
analyzed: tatra ālasyam tamaḥ viddhi moham mṛtyum ca janma ca

original: mahāmohastvasaṃmoha kāma ityeva gamyatām // Bc_12.34 //
analyzed: mahāmohaḥ tu asaṃmoha kāmaḥ iti eva gamyatām

original: yasmādatra ca bhūtāni pramuhyanti mahāntyapi /
analyzed: yasmāt atra ca bhūtāni pramuhyanti mahānti api

original: tasmādeṣa mahābāho mahāmoha iti smṛtaḥ // Bc_12.35 //
analyzed: tasmāt eṣa mahā bāho mahāmohaḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: tāmisramiti cākrodha krodhamevādhikurvate /
analyzed: tāmisram iti ca akrodha krodham eva adhikurvate

original: viṣādaṃ cāndhatāmisramaviṣāda pracakṣate // Bc_12.36 //
analyzed: viṣādam ca andhatāmisram aviṣāda pracakṣate

original: anayāvidyayā bālaḥ saṃyuktaḥ pañcaparvayā /
analyzed: anayā avidyayā bālaḥ saṃyuktaḥ pañca parvayā

original: saṃsāre duḥkhabhūyiṣṭhe janmasvabhiniṣicyate // Bc_12.37 //
analyzed: saṃsāre duḥkha bhūyiṣṭhe janmasu abhiniṣicyate

original: draṣṭā śrotā ca mantā ca kāryakaraṇameva ca /
analyzed: draṣṭā śrotā ca mantā ca kārya karaṇam eva ca

original: ahamityevamāgamya saṃsāre parivartate // Bc_12.38 //
analyzed: aham iti evam āgamya saṃsāre parivartate

original: ihaibhirhetubhirdhīman janmastrotaḥ pravartate /
analyzed: iha ebhiḥ hetubhiḥ dhīman janma strotaḥ pravartate

original: hetvabhāvātphalābhāva iti vijñātumarhasi // Bc_12.39 //
analyzed: hetu abhāvāt phala abhāvaḥ iti vijñātum arhasi

original: tatra samyaṅmatirvidyānmokṣakāma catuṣṭayam /
analyzed: tatra samyak matiḥ vidyāt mokṣa kāma catuṣṭayam

original: pratibuddhāprabuddhau ca vyaktamavyaktameva ca // Bc_12.40 //
analyzed: pratibuddha aprabuddhau ca vyaktam avyaktam eva ca

original: yathāvadetadvijñāya kṣetrajño hi catuṣṭayam /
analyzed: yathāvat etat vijñāya kṣetrajñaḥ hi catuṣṭayam

original: ājavaṃjavatāṃ hitvā prāpnoti padamakṣaram // Bc_12.41 //
analyzed: hitvā prāpnoti padam akṣaram

original: ityartha brāhmaṇā loke paramabrahmavādinaḥ /
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ loke parama brahma vādinaḥ

original: brahmacarya carantīha brāhmaṇānvāsayanti ca // Bc_12.42 //
analyzed: brahmacarya caranti iha brāhmaṇān vāsayanti ca

original: iti vākyamidaṃ śrutvā munestasya nṛpātmajaḥ /
analyzed: iti vākyam idam śrutvā muneḥ tasya nṛpa ātmajaḥ

original: abhyupāyaṃ ca papraccha padameva ca naiṣṭhikam // Bc_12.43 //
analyzed: abhyupāyam ca papraccha padam eva ca naiṣṭhikam

original: brahmacaryamidaṃ caryaṃ yathā yāvacca yatra ca /
analyzed: brahmacaryam idam caryam yathā yāvat ca yatra ca

original: dharmasyāsya ca paryantaṃ bhavānvyākhyātumarhati // Bc_12.44 //
analyzed: dharmasya asya ca paryantam bhavān vyākhyātum arhati

original: ityarāḍo yathāśāstraṃ vispaṣṭārtha samāsataḥ /
analyzed: iti arāḍaḥ yathāśāstram vispaṣṭa artha samāsatas

original: tamevānyena kalpena dharmamasmai vyabhāṣata // Bc_12.45 //
analyzed: tam eva anyena kalpena dharmam asmai vyabhāṣata

original: ayamādau gṛhānmuktvā bhaikṣākaṃ liṅgamāśritaḥ /
analyzed: ayam ādau gṛhān muktvā bhaikṣākam liṅgam āśritaḥ

original: samudācāravistīrṇa śīlamādāya vartate // Bc_12.46 //
analyzed: śīlam ādāya vartate

original: saṃtoṣaṃ paramāsthāya yena tena yatastataḥ /
analyzed: saṃtoṣam param āsthāya yena tena yatas tatas

original: viviktaṃ sevate vāsaṃ nirdvandvaḥ śāstravitkṛtī // Bc_12.47 //
analyzed: viviktam sevate vāsam nirdvandvaḥ śāstra vid kṛtī

original: tato rāgādbhayaṃ dṛṣṭvā vairāgyācca paraṃ śivam /
analyzed: tatas rāgāt bhayam dṛṣṭvā vairāgyāt ca param śivam

original: nigṛhṇannindriyagrāmaṃ yatate manasaḥ śame // Bc_12.48 //
analyzed: nigṛhṇan indriya grāmam yatate manasaḥ śame

original: atho viviktaṃ kāmebhyo vyāpādādibhya eva ca /
analyzed: atho viviktam kāmebhyaḥ vyāpāda ādibhyaḥ eva ca

original: vivekajamavāpnoti pūrvadhyānaṃ vitarkavat // Bc_12.49 //
analyzed: viveka jam avāpnoti pūrva dhyānam vitarka vat

original: tacca dhyānasukhaṃ prāpya tattadeva vitarkayān /
analyzed: tat ca dhyāna sukham prāpya tat tat eva vitarkayān

original: apūrvasukhalābhena hriyate bāliśo janaḥ // Bc_12.50 //
analyzed: apūrva sukha lābhena hriyate bāliśaḥ janaḥ

original: śamenaivaṃvidhenāyaṃ kāmadveṣavigarhiṇā /
analyzed: śamena evaṃvidhena ayam kāma dveṣa vigarhiṇā

original: brahmalokamavāpnoti paritoṣeṇa vañcitaḥ // Bc_12.51 //
analyzed: brahma lokam avāpnoti paritoṣeṇa vañcitaḥ

original: jñātvā vidvānvitarkāstu manaḥsaṃkṣobhakārakān /
analyzed: jñātvā vidvān vitarkāḥ tu manaḥ saṃkṣobha kārakān

original: tadviyuktamavāpnoti dhyānaṃ prītisukhānvitam // Bc_12.52 //
analyzed: tad viyuktam avāpnoti dhyānam prīti sukha anvitam

original: hriyamāṇastayā prītyā yo viśeṣaṃ na paśyati /
analyzed: hriyamāṇaḥ tayā prītyā yaḥ viśeṣam na paśyati

original: sthānaṃ bhāsvaramāpnoti deveṣvābhāsvareṣu saḥ // Bc_12.53 //
analyzed: sthānam bhāsvaram āpnoti deveṣu ābhāsvareṣu saḥ

original: yastu prītisukhāttasmādvivecayati mānasam /
analyzed: yaḥ tu prīti sukhāt tasmāt vivecayati mānasam

original: tṛtīyaṃ labhate dhyānaṃ sukhaṃ prītivivarjitam // Bc_12.54 //
analyzed: tṛtīyam labhate dhyānam sukham prīti vivarjitam

original: yastu tasminsukhe magno na viśeṣāya yatnavān /
analyzed: yaḥ tu tasmin sukhe magnaḥ na viśeṣāya yatnavān

original: śubhakṛtsnaiḥ sa sāmānyaṃ sukhaṃ prāpnoti daivataiḥ // Bc_12.55 //
analyzed: śubhakṛtsnaiḥ sa sāmānyam sukham prāpnoti daivataiḥ

original: tādṛśaṃ sukhāmāsādya yo na rajyatyupekṣakaḥ
analyzed: tādṛśam sukhām āsādya yaḥ na rajyati upekṣakaḥ

original: caturtha dhyānamāpnoti sukhaduḥkhavivarjitam // Bc_12.56 //
analyzed: caturtha dhyānam āpnoti sukha duḥkha vivarjitam

original: tatra kecidvyavasyanti mokṣa ityabhimāninaḥ /
analyzed: tatra kecid vyavasyanti mokṣaḥ iti abhimāninaḥ

original: sukhaduḥkhaparityāgādavyāpārācca cetasaḥ // Bc_12.57 //
analyzed: sukha duḥkha parityāgāt avyāpārāt ca cetasaḥ

original: asya dhyānasya tu phalaṃ samaṃ devairbṛhatphalaiḥ /
analyzed: asya dhyānasya tu phalam samam devaiḥ bṛhatphalaiḥ

original: kathayanti bṛhatkālaṃ bṛhatprajñāparīkṣakāḥ // Bc_12.58 //
analyzed: kathayanti bṛhat kālam bṛhat prajñā parīkṣakāḥ

original: samādhervyutthitastasmād dṛṣtvā doṣāṃścharīriṇām /
analyzed: samādheḥ vyutthitaḥ tasmāt dṛṣtvā doṣān śarīriṇām

original: jñānamārohati prājñaḥ śarīravinivṛttaye // Bc_12.59 //
analyzed: jñānam ārohati prājñaḥ śarīra vinivṛttaye

original: tatastaddhyānamutsṛjya viśeṣe kṛtaniścayaḥ /
analyzed: tatas tat dhyānam utsṛjya viśeṣe kṛta niścayaḥ

original: kāmebhya iva sa prājño rūpādapi virajyate // Bc_12.60 //
analyzed: kāmebhyaḥ iva sa prājñaḥ rūpāt api virajyate

original: śarīre khāni yānyasmintānyādau parikalpayan /
analyzed: śarīre khāni yāni asmin tāni ādau parikalpayan

original: ghaneṣvapi tato dravyeṣvākāśamadhimucyate // Bc_12.61 //
analyzed: ghaneṣu api tatas dravyeṣu ākāśam adhimucyate

original: ākāśagatamātmānaṃ saṃkṣipya tvaparo budhaḥ /
analyzed: ākāśa gatam ātmānam saṃkṣipya tu aparaḥ budhaḥ

original: tadevānantataḥ paśyanviśeṣamadhigacchati // Bc_12.62 //
analyzed: tat eva anantataḥ paśyan viśeṣam adhigacchati

original: adhyātmakuśalastvanyo nivartyātmānamātmanā /
analyzed: adhyātma kuśalaḥ tu anyaḥ nivartya ātmānam ātmanā

original: kiṃcinnāstīti saṃpaśyannākiṃcanya iti smṛtaḥ // Bc_12.63 //
analyzed: kiṃcid na asti iti saṃpaśyan ākiṃcanyaḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: tato muñjādiṣīkeva śakuniḥ pañjarādiva /
analyzed: tatas muñjāt iṣīkā iva śakuniḥ pañjarāt iva

original: kṣetrajño niḥsṛto dehānmukta ityabhidhīyate // Bc_12.64 //
analyzed: kṣetrajñaḥ niḥsṛtaḥ dehāt muktaḥ iti abhidhīyate

original: etattatparamaṃ brahma nirliṅga dhruvamakṣaram /
analyzed: etat tat paramam brahma nirliṅga dhruvam akṣaram

original: yanmokṣa iti tattvajñāḥ kathayanti manīṣiṇaḥ // Bc_12.65 //
analyzed: yat mokṣaḥ iti tattva jñāḥ kathayanti manīṣiṇaḥ

original: ityupāyaṃśca mokṣaśca mayā saṃdarśitastava /
analyzed: iti upāyan ca mokṣaḥ ca mayā saṃdarśitaḥ tava

original: yadi jñātaṃ yadi ruciryathāvatpratipadyatām // Bc_12.66 //
analyzed: yadi jñātam yadi ruciḥ yathāvat pratipadyatām

original: jaigīṣavyo 'tha janako vṛddhaścaiva parāśaraḥ /
analyzed: jaigīṣavyaḥ janakaḥ vṛddhaḥ ca eva parāśaraḥ

original: imaṃ panthānamāsādya muktā hyanye ca mokṣiṇaḥ // Bc_12.67 //
analyzed: imam panthānam āsādya muktāḥ hi anye ca mokṣiṇaḥ

original: iti tasya sa tadvākyaṃ gṛhītvā tu vicārya ca /
analyzed: iti tasya sa tat vākyam gṛhītvā tu vicārya ca

original: pūrvahetubalaprāptaḥ pratyuttaramuvāca ha // Bc_12.68 //
analyzed: pūrva hetu bala prāptaḥ pratyuttaram uvāca ha

original: śrutaṃ jñānamidaṃ sūkṣmaṃ parataḥ parataḥ śivam /
analyzed: śrutam jñānam idam sūkṣmam paratas paratas śivam

original: kṣetrajñasyāparityāgādavaimyetadanaiṣṭhikam // Bc_12.69 //
analyzed: kṣetrajñasya aparityāgāt avaimi etat anaiṣṭhikam

original: vikāraprakṛtibhyo hi kṣetrajñaṃ muktamapyaham /
analyzed: vikāra prakṛtibhyaḥ hi kṣetrajñam muktam api aham

original: manye prasavadharmāṇaṃ bījadharmāṇameva ca // Bc_12.70 //
analyzed: manye prasava dharmāṇam bīja dharmāṇam eva ca

original: viśuddho yadyapi hyātmā nirmukta iti kalpyate /
analyzed: viśuddhaḥ yadi api hi ātmā nirmuktaḥ iti kalpyate

original: bhūyaḥ pratyayasadbhāvādamuktaḥ sa bhaviṣyati // Bc_12.71 //
analyzed: bhūyas pratyaya sadbhāvāt amuktaḥ sa bhaviṣyati

original: ṛtubhūmyambuvirahādyathā bījaṃ na rohati /
analyzed: ṛtu bhūmi ambu virahāt yathā bījam na rohati

original: rohati pratyayaistaistaistadvatso 'pi mato mama // Bc_12.72 //
analyzed: rohati pratyayaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ tadvat saḥ pi mataḥ mama

original: yatkarmājñānatṛṣṇānāṃ tyāgānmokṣaśca kalpyate /
analyzed: yat karma ajñāna tṛṣṇānām tyāgāt mokṣaḥ ca kalpyate

original: atyantastatparityāgaḥ satyātmani na vidyate // Bc_12.73 //
analyzed: atyantaḥ tad parityāgaḥ sati ātmani na vidyate

original: hitvā hitvā trayamidaṃ viśeṣastūpalabhyate /
analyzed: hitvā hitvā trayam idam viśeṣaḥ tu upalabhyate

original: ātmanastu sthitiryatra tatra sūkṣmamidaṃ trayam // Bc_12.74 //
analyzed: ātmanaḥ tu sthitiḥ yatra tatra sūkṣmam idam trayam

original: sūkṣmatvāccaiva doṣāṇāmavyāpārācca cetasaḥ /
analyzed: sūkṣma tvāt ca eva doṣāṇām avyāpārāt ca cetasaḥ

original: dīrghatvādāyuṣaścaiva mokṣastu parikalpyate // Bc_12.75 //
analyzed: dīrgha tvāt āyuṣaḥ ca eva mokṣaḥ tu parikalpyate

original: ahaṃkāraparityāgo yaścaiṣa parikalpyate /
analyzed: ahaṃkāra parityāgaḥ yaḥ ca eṣa parikalpyate

original: satyātmani parityāgo nāhaṃkārasya vidyate // Bc_12.76 //
analyzed: sati ātmani parityāgaḥ na ahaṃkārasya vidyate

original: saṃkhyādibhiramuktaśca nirguṇo na bhavatyayam /
analyzed: saṃkhyā ādibhiḥ amuktaḥ ca nirguṇaḥ na bhavati ayam

original: tasmādasati nairguṇye nāsya mokṣo 'bhidhīyate // Bc_12.77 //
analyzed: tasmāt asati nairguṇye na asya mokṣaḥ abhidhīyate

original: guṇino hi guṇānāṃ ca vyatireko na vidyate /
analyzed: guṇinaḥ hi guṇānām ca vyatirekaḥ na vidyate

original: rūpoṣṇābhyāṃ virahito na hyagnirupalabhyate // Bc_12.78 //
analyzed: rūpa uṣṇābhyām virahitaḥ na hi agniḥ upalabhyate

original: prāgdehānna bhaveddehī prāgguṇebhyastathā guṇī /
analyzed: prāk dehāt na bhavet dehī prāk guṇebhyaḥ tathā guṇī

original: tasmādādau vimuktaḥ san śarīrī badhyate punaḥ // Bc_12.79 //
analyzed: tasmāt ādau vimuktaḥ san śarīrī badhyate punar

original: kṣetrajño viśarīraśca jño vā syādajña eva vā /
analyzed: kṣetrajñaḥ viśarīraḥ ca jñaḥ vā syāt ajñaḥ eva vā

original: yadi jño jñeyamasyāsti jñeye sati na mucyate // Bc_12.80 //
analyzed: yadi jñaḥ jñeyam asya asti jñeye sati na mucyate

original: athājña iti siddho vaḥ kalpitena kimātmanā /
analyzed: atha ajñaḥ iti siddhaḥ vaḥ kalpitena kim ātmanā

original: vināpi hyātmanājñānaṃ prasiddhaṃ kāṣṭhakuḍyavat // Bc_12.81 //
analyzed: vinā api hi ātmanā ajñānam prasiddham kāṣṭha kuḍya vat

original: parataḥ paratastyāgo yasmāttu guṇavān smṛtaḥ /

original: aprāpya notthāsyati tattvameṣa tamāṃsyahatveva sahasraraśmiḥ // Bc_13.59 //
analyzed: a prāpya nā utthāsyati tattvam eṣa tamāṃsi a hatvā iva sahasraraśmiḥ

original: kāṣṭhaṃ hi mathnan labhate hutāśaṃ bhūmiṃ khananvindati cāpi toyam /
analyzed: kāṣṭham hi mathnan labhate hutāśam bhūmim khanan vindati ca api toyam

original: nirbandhinaḥ kiṃcana nāstyasādhyaṃ nyāyena yuktaṃ ca kṛtaṃ ca sarvam // Bc_13.60 //
analyzed: nirbandhinaḥ kiṃcana nā asti asādhyam nyāyena yuktam ca kṛtam ca sarvam

original: tallokamārta karuṇāyamāno rogeṣu rāgādiṣu vartamānam /
analyzed: tat lokam ārta karuṇāyamānaḥ rogeṣu rāga ādiṣu vartamānam

original: mahābhiṣaṅga nārhati vighnameṣa jñānauṣadhārtha parikhidyamānaḥ // Bc_13.61 //
analyzed: mahā abhiṣaṅga na arhati vighnam eṣa jñāna auṣadha artha parikhidyamānaḥ

original: hṛte ca loke bahubhiḥ kumārgaiḥ sanmārgamanvicchati yaḥ śrameṇa /
analyzed: hṛte ca loke bahubhiḥ ku mārgaiḥ sat mārgam anvicchati yaḥ śrameṇa

original: sa daiśikaḥ kṣobhayituṃ na yuktaṃ sudeśikaḥ sārtha iva pranaṣṭe // Bc_13.62 //
analyzed: sa daiśikaḥ kṣobhayitum na yuktam su deśikaḥ sārthe iva pranaṣṭe

original: sattveṣu naṣṭeṣu mahāndhakāre jñānapradīpaḥ kriyamāṇa eṣaḥ /
analyzed: sattveṣu naṣṭeṣu mahā andhakāre jñāna pradīpaḥ kriyamāṇaḥ eṣaḥ

original: āryasya nirvāpayituṃ na sādhu prajvālyamānastamasīva dīpaḥ // Bc_13.63 //
analyzed: āryasya nirvāpayitum na sādhu prajvālyamānaḥ tamasi iva dīpaḥ

original: dṛṣṭvā ca saṃsāramaye mahaughe magnaṃ jagatpāramavindamānam /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca saṃsāra maye mahā oghe magnam jagat pāram a vindamānam

original: yaścedamuttārayituṃ pravṛttaḥ kaścintayettasya tu pāpamāryaḥ // Bc_13.64 //
analyzed: yaḥ ca idam uttārayitum pravṛttaḥ kaḥ cintayet tasya tu pāpam āryaḥ

original: kṣamāśipho dhairyavigāḍhamūlaścāritrapuṣpaḥ smṛtibuddhiśākhaḥ /
analyzed: kṣamā śiphaḥ dhairya vigāḍha mūlaḥ cāritra puṣpaḥ smṛti buddhi śākhaḥ

original: jñānadrumo dharmaphalapradātā notpāṭanaṃ hyarhati vardhamānaḥ // Bc_13.65 //
analyzed: jñāna drumaḥ dharma phala pradātā na utpāṭanam hi arhati vardhamānaḥ

original: baddhāṃ dṛḍhaiścetasi mohapāśairyasya prajāṃ mokṣayituṃ manīṣā /
analyzed: baddhām dṛḍhaiḥ cetasi moha pāśaiḥ yasya prajām mokṣayitum manīṣā

original: tasmin jighāṃsā tava nopapannā śrānte jagadbandhanamokṣahetoḥ // Bc_13.66 //
analyzed: tasmin jighāṃsā tava nā upapannā śrānte jagat bandhana mokṣa hetoḥ

original: bodhāya karmāṇi hi yānyanena kṛtāni teṣāṃ niyato 'dya kālaḥ /
analyzed: bodhāya karmāṇi hi yāni anena kṛtāni teṣām niyataḥ kālaḥ

original: sthāne tathāsminnupaviṣṭa eṣa yathaiva pūrve munayastathaiva // Bc_13.67 //
analyzed: sthāne tathā asmin upaviṣṭaḥ eṣa yathā eva pūrve munayaḥ tathā eva

original: eṣā hi nābhirvasudhātalasya kṛtsnena yuktā parameṇa dhāmnā /
analyzed: eṣā hi nābhiḥ vasudhā talasya kṛtsnena yuktā parameṇa dhāmnā

original: bhūmerato 'nyo 'sti hi na pradeśo vegaṃ samādherviṣaheta yo 'sya // Bc_13.68 //
analyzed: bhūmeḥ atas sti hi na pradeśaḥ vegam samādheḥ viṣaheta

original: tanmā kṛthā śokamupehi śāntiṃ mā bhūnmahimnā tava māra mānaḥ /
analyzed: tat mā kṛthāḥ śokam upehi śāntim mā bhūt mahimnā tava māra mānaḥ

original: viśrambhituṃ na kṣamamadhuvā śrīścale pade vismayamabhyupaiṣi // Bc_13.69 //
analyzed: viśrambhitum na kṣamam adhuvā śrīḥ cale pade vismayam abhyupaiṣi

original: tataḥ sa saṃśrutya ca tasya tadvaco mahāmuneḥ prekṣya ca niṣprakampatām /
analyzed: tatas sa saṃśrutya ca tasya tat vacaḥ mahā muneḥ prekṣya ca niṣprakampa tām

original: jagāma māro vimano hatodyamaḥ śarairjagaccetasi yairvihanyate // Bc_13.70 //
analyzed: jagāma māraḥ vimanaḥ hata udyamaḥ śaraiḥ jagat cetasi yaiḥ vihanyate

original: gatapraharṣā viphalīkṛtaśramā praviddhapāṣāṇakaḍaṅgaradrumā /
analyzed: gata praharṣā viphalīkṛta śramā praviddha pāṣāṇa kaḍaṅgara drumā

original: diśaḥ pradudrāva tato 'sya sā camūrhatāśrayeva dviṣatā dviṣaccamūḥ // Bc_13.71 //
analyzed: diśaḥ pradudrāva sā camūḥ hata āśrayā iva dviṣatā dviṣat camūḥ

original: dravati saparipakṣe nirjitai puṣpaketau jayatijitamaske nīrajaske maharṣau /
analyzed: dravati sa paripakṣe puṣpaketau jayatijitamaske nīrajaske mahā ṛṣau

original: yuvatiriva sahāsā dyauścakāśe sacandrā surabhi ca jalagarbha puṣpavarṣa papāta // Bc_13.72 //
analyzed: yuvatiḥ iva sa hāsā dyauḥ cakāśe sa candrā surabhi ca jala garbha puṣpa varṣa papāta

original: iti buddhacarite mahākāvye 'śvaghoṣakṛte māravijayo nāma trayodaśaḥ sargaḥ // 13 //
analyzed: iti buddhacarite mahākāvye śvaghoṣa kṛte māravijayaḥ nāma trayodaśaḥ sargaḥ  /

original: tato mārabalaṃ jitvā dhairyeṇa ca śamena ca /
analyzed: tatas māra balam jitvā dhairyeṇa ca śamena ca

original: paramārtha vijijñāsuḥ sa dadhyau dhyānakovidaḥ // Bc_14.1 //
analyzed: parama artha vijijñāsuḥ sa dadhyau dhyāna kovidaḥ

original: sarveṣu dhyānavidhiṣu prāpya caiśvaryamuttamam /
analyzed: sarveṣu dhyāna vidhiṣu prāpya ca aiśvaryam uttamam

original: sasmāra prathame yāme pūrvajanmaparaṃparām // Bc_14.2 //
analyzed: sasmāra prathame yāme pūrva janma paraṃparām

original: amutrāhamayaṃ nāma cyutastasmādihāgataḥ /
analyzed: amutra aham ayam nāma cyutaḥ tasmāt iha āgataḥ

original: uiti janmasahastrāṇi sasmārānubhavanniva // Bc_14.3 //
analyzed: u iti janma sahastrāṇi sasmāra anubhavan iva

original: smṛtvā janma ca mṛtyuṃ ca tāsu tāsūpapattiṣu /
analyzed: smṛtvā janma ca mṛtyum ca tāsu tāsu upapattiṣu

original: tataḥ sattveṣu kāruṃṇyaṃ cakāra karuṇātmakaḥ // Bc_14.4 //
analyzed: tatas sattveṣu kāruṃṇyam cakāra karuṇā ātmakaḥ

original: kṛtveha svajanotsarga punaranyatra ca kriyāḥ /
analyzed: kṛtvā iha sva jana utsarga punar anyatra ca kriyāḥ

original: atrāṇaḥ khalu loko 'yaṃ paribhramati cakravat // Bc_14.5 //
analyzed: atrāṇaḥ khalu lokaḥ yam paribhramati cakra vat

original: ityevaṃ smaratastasya babhūva niyatātmanaḥ /
analyzed: iti evam smarataḥ tasya babhūva niyata ātmanaḥ

original: kadalīgarbhaniḥsāraḥ saṃsāra iti niścayaḥ // Bc_14.6 //
analyzed: kadalī garbha niḥsāraḥ saṃsāraḥ iti niścayaḥ

original: dvitīye tvāgate yāme so 'dvitīyaparākramaḥ /
analyzed: dvitīye tu āgate yāme saḥ dvitīya parākramaḥ

original: divyaṃ lebhe paraṃ cakṣuḥ sarvacakṣuṣmatāṃ varaḥ // Bc_14.7 //
analyzed: divyam lebhe param cakṣuḥ sarva cakṣuṣmatām varaḥ

original: tatastena sa divyena pariśuddhena cakṣuṣā /
analyzed: tatas tena sa divyena pariśuddhena cakṣuṣā

original: dadarśa nikhilaṃ lokamādarśa iva nirmale // Bc_14.8 //
analyzed: dadarśa nikhilam lokam ādarśe iva nirmale

original: sattvānāṃ paśyatastasya nikṛṣṭotkṛṣṭakarmaṇām /
analyzed: sattvānām paśyataḥ tasya nikṛṣṭa utkṛṣṭa karmaṇām

original: pracyutiṃ copapattiṃ ca vavṛdhe karuṇātmatā // Bc_14.9 //
analyzed: pracyutim ca upapattim ca vavṛdhe karuṇa ātma tā

original: ime duṣkṛtakarmāṇaḥ prāṇino yāni durgatim /
analyzed: ime duṣkṛta karmāṇaḥ prāṇinaḥ yāni durgatim

original: ime 'nye śubhakarmāṇaḥ pratiṣṭhante tripiṣṭape // Bc_14.10 //
analyzed: ime nye śubha karmāṇaḥ pratiṣṭhante tripiṣṭape

original: upapannāḥ pratibhaye narake bhṛśadāruṇe /
analyzed: upapannāḥ pratibhaye narake bhṛśa dāruṇe

original: amī duḥkhairbahuvidhaiḥ pīḍyante kṛpaṇaṃ bata // Bc_14.11 //
analyzed: amī duḥkhaiḥ bahuvidhaiḥ pīḍyante kṛpaṇam bata

original: pāyyante kvathitaṃ kecidagnivarṇamayorasam /
analyzed: pāyyante kvathitam kecid agni varṇam ayaḥ rasam

original: āropyante ruvānto 'nye niṣṭaptastambhamāyasam // Bc_14.12 //
analyzed: āropyante ruvāntaḥ nye niṣṭapta stambham āyasam

original: pacyante piṣṭavatkecidayaskumbhīṣvavāṅmukhāḥ /
analyzed: pacyante piṣṭa vat kecid ayaskumbhīṣu avāṅmukhāḥ

original: dahyante karuṇaṃ keciddīpteṣvaṅgārarāśiṣu // Bc_14.13 //
analyzed: dahyante karuṇam kecid dīpteṣu aṅgāra rāśiṣu

original: kecittīkṣṇairayodaṃṣṭrairbhakṣyante dāruṇaiḥ śvabhiḥ /
analyzed: kecid tīkṣṇaiḥ ayaḥ daṃṣṭraiḥ bhakṣyante dāruṇaiḥ śvabhiḥ

original: keciddhṛṣṭairayastuṇḍairvāyasairāyasairiva // Bc_14.14 //
analyzed: kecid dhṛṣṭaiḥ ayaḥ tuṇḍaiḥ vāyasaiḥ āyasaiḥ iva

original: keciddāhapariśrāntāḥ śītacchāyābhikāṅikṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: kecid dāha pariśrāntāḥ śīta chāyā abhikāṅikṣaṇaḥ

original: asipattravanaṃ nīlaṃ baddhā iva viśantyamī // Bc_14.15 //
analyzed: asipattravanam nīlam baddhāḥ iva viśanti amī

original: pāṭyante dāruvatkecitkuṭhārairbaddhabāhavaḥ /
analyzed: pāṭyante dāru vat kecid kuṭhāraiḥ baddha bāhavaḥ

original: duḥkhe 'pi na vipacyante karmabhirdhāritāsavaḥ // Bc_14.16 //
analyzed: duḥkhe na vipacyante karmabhiḥ dhārita asavaḥ

original: sukhaṃ syāditi yatkarma kṛtaṃ duḥkhanivṛttaye /
analyzed: sukham syāt iti yat karma kṛtam duḥkha nivṛttaye

original: phalaṃ tasyedamavaśairduḥkhamevopabhujyate // Bc_14.17 //
analyzed: phalam tasya idam avaśaiḥ duḥkham evā upabhujyate

original: sukhārthamaśubhaṃ kṛtvā ya ete bhṛśaduḥkhitāḥ /
analyzed: sukha artham aśubham kṛtvā ye ete bhṛśa duḥkhitāḥ

original: āsvādaḥ sa kimeteṣāṃ karoti sukhamaṇvapi // Bc_14.18 //
analyzed: āsvādaḥ sa kim eteṣām karoti sukham aṇu api

original: hasadbhiryatkṛtaṃ karma kaluṣaṃ kaluṣātmabhiḥ /
analyzed: hasadbhiḥ yat kṛtam karma kaluṣam kaluṣa ātmabhiḥ

original: etatpariṇate kāle krośadbhiranubhūyate // Bc_14.19 //
analyzed: etat pariṇate kāle krośadbhiḥ anubhūyate

original: yadyevaṃ pāpakarmāṇaḥ paśyeyuḥ karmaṇāṃ phalam /
analyzed: yadi evam pāpa karmāṇaḥ paśyeyuḥ karmaṇām phalam

original: vameyuruṣṇaṃ rudhiraṃ marmasvabhihatā iva // Bc_14.20 //
analyzed: vameyuḥ uṣṇam rudhiram marmasu abhihatāḥ iva

original: ime 'nye karmabhiścitraiścittavispandasaṃbhavaiḥ /
analyzed: ime nye karmabhiḥ citraiḥ citta vispanda saṃbhavaiḥ

original: tiryagyonau vicitrāyāḥmupapannāstapasvinaḥ // Bc_14.21 //
analyzed: tiryagyonau upapannāḥ tapasvinaḥ

original: māṃsatvagbāladantārtha vairādapi madādapi /
analyzed: māṃsa tvac bāla danta artha vairāt api madāt api

original: hanyante kṛpaṇaṃ yatra bandhūnāṃ paśyatāmapi // Bc_14.22 //
analyzed: hanyante kṛpaṇam yatra bandhūnām paśyatām api

original: aśaknuvanto 'pyavaśāḥ kṣuttarṣaśramapīḍitāḥ /
analyzed: a śaknuvantaḥ pi avaśāḥ kṣudh tarṣa śrama pīḍitāḥ

original: go 'śvabhūtāśca vāhyante pratodakṣatamūrtayaḥ // Bc_14.23 //
analyzed: go śva bhūtāḥ ca vāhyante pratoda kṣata mūrtayaḥ

original: vāhyante gajabhūtāśca valīyāṃso 'pi durbalaiḥ /
analyzed: vāhyante gaja bhūtāḥ ca valīyāṃsaḥ durbalaiḥ

original: aṅkaśakliṣṭamūrdhānastāḍitāḥ pādapāṣṇibhiḥ // Bc_14.24 //
analyzed: aṅka śakliṣṭa mūrdhānaḥ tāḍitāḥ pāda pāṣṇibhiḥ

original: satsvapyanyeṣu duḥkheṣu duḥkhaṃ yatra viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: satsu api anyeṣu duḥkheṣu duḥkham yatra viśeṣataḥ

original: parasparavirodhācca parādhīnatayaiva ca // Bc_14.25 //
analyzed: paraspara virodhāt ca para adhīna tayā eva ca

original: khasthāḥ khasthairhi bādhyante jalasthā jalacāribhiḥ /
analyzed: kha sthāḥ kha sthaiḥ hi bādhyante jala sthāḥ jala cāribhiḥ

original: sthalasthāḥ sthalasaṃsthaiśca prāpya caivetaretaraiḥ // Bc_14.26 //
analyzed: sthala sthāḥ sthala saṃsthaiḥ ca prāpya ca eva itaretaraiḥ

original: upapannāstathā ceme mātsaryākrāntacetasaḥ /
analyzed: upapannāḥ tathā ca ime mātsarya ākrānta cetasaḥ

original: pitṛloke nirāloke kṛpaṇaṃ bhuñjate phalam // Bc_14.27 //
analyzed: pitṛ loke nirāloke kṛpaṇam bhuñjate phalam

original: sūcīchidropamamukhāḥ parvatopamakukṣayaḥ /
analyzed: sūcī chidra upama mukhāḥ parvata upama kukṣayaḥ

original: kṣuttarṣajanitairduḥkhai pīḍyante duḥkhabhāginaḥ // Bc_14.28 //
analyzed: kṣudh tarṣa janitaiḥ duḥkhaiḥ pīḍyante duḥkha bhāginaḥ

original: āśayā samatikrāntā dhāryamāṇāḥ svakarmabhiḥ /
analyzed: āśayā samatikrāntāḥ dhāryamāṇāḥ sva karmabhiḥ

original: labhante na hyamī bhoktuṃ praviddhānyaśucīnyapi // Bc_14.29 //
analyzed: labhante na hi amī bhoktum praviddhāni aśucīni api

original: puruṣo yadi jānīta mātsaryasyedṛśaṃ phalam /
analyzed: puruṣaḥ yadi jānīta mātsaryasya īdṛśam phalam

original: sarvathā śibivaddadyāccharīrāvayavānapi // Bc_14.30 //
analyzed: sarvathā śibi vat dadyāt śarīra avayavān api

original: ime 'nye narakaprakhye garbhasaṃjñe 'śucihrade /
analyzed: ime nye naraka prakhye garbha saṃjñe śuci hrade

original: upapannā manuṣyeṣu duḥkhamarchanti jantavaḥ // Bc_14.31 //
analyzed: upapannāḥ manuṣyeṣu duḥkham archanti jantavaḥ
